Hanangkü Joshua-i Israel am jat ieyei kübü jepü shennyak anpünyi nyükei thaitü,
jomphong kü, “Jordan yung jiamei
hatü hapai am shingvaishi nyangeihepü hük nyukahen. Ammei hühihathüi, ‘Hapa yaongthü lappü meheang?’ shei pheilei phephüshingkü,
ammi jom kü, ‘
Hanangkü Joshua-i epükei Israel ami dük.
Shao Joshua-i Vangpüshuwpü Pela paitü yaongpü ngongpathülei la toueipü yaong anpünyi thaiyei Jordan yung jiamei shüngei tuhteke. Hathü yaong shinnyih thahshi nyüke.
Mosai Joshua homei nanglakthü kü dükhen epü dükei mangkem thahshi ngongpathüi Vangpüshuwpü Pela paitü Jordan yung jiamei yaongshi nyuteke. Nanglakthüi shüshülangi yungdang homei heih.
Nanglakthü peü yungdang homei kemhinüng ngongpathüi Vangpüshuwpü Pela paitü nanglakthü yeiyei dai.
Mosai hupükei Reuben, Gad hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh jat ve-ow temtü Israel am shekü homei daiteke.
Hokhen shingvaishi ve-ow temtü veshan haja pinyi hükshing
Ha nyih
Hahepak kü
“Vangpüshuwpü Pela paipü ngongpathü kü Jordan yungyen leipü vamdaikei” shei ehen eshuohteke.
Hanangkü Joshua-i, “Jordan yung leipü vamdaikei” shei e,
hatü mechem
Shongpü len nyih anpabü kü nanglakthüi Jordan yung homei Jeriko kü heongphi viong Gilgalei baümtap veteke.
Hatü Jordan leipü houmpü yaong anpünyi Joshua-i Gilgalei shüngei tuh,
hatü büpai Israel am kü, “Pheilei ammei hühihathüi am kü, ‘Hathü yaong lappü meheang?’ shei pheshingkü,
‘Israel am kahvan kü Jordan yung homei daipeih’ shei etuh.
Jen yung homei mangkem thahshi
Büpai hapayü kahdoknyü kübü hangkuli peüi
Mechem Jordan heshüphi kü nyupü Amor ongthüi hatü Mediterranean Yungching yungkung kü nyupü Kanan ongthüi Israel am manghomkem thahshi
Hahepak kü
Hanangkü Joshua-i yaonglang yah-ei longkhoih ling hatü büpai Gibeah-Haaraloth shei epü shingei Israel am shuw japteke.
Ijip kübü vamei daipü bahathü hatü veshanthü peü jahpanei longteishingkü lemei peü didaikem; hanangkü Joshua-i jom kü shuw japteke.
Ijip kübü vamei daipü bahathü peü shuw japtüklangmao Ijip leipü vamei daipheikü jahpanei longteishingkü lemei bühpü bahathü kü shuw nejapi nyuteke.
i epü nebangpü nangkü Ijip leipü vamei daishingkü veshan vaihen yienmeishem peü mangdidaikem thahshi Israel am jahpanei vangbong pinyi hükshing longtei; mehenangkü
Hanangkü büpai jomei hühihathü jom nangjei longhü hatü Joshua-i hathü kü shuw japteke. Jom yendai lem kü shuw nejappü nangkü jom shaang thahshi nejapi nyuteke.
Mechem hapa denja pheihathü kü Joshua-i shuw jappa, hapa ma mangmei thahshi jom baümtapei nyu.
i Joshua kü, “Shinnyih ngei am Ijiplei aa vaihampü mongmang yaktüknyeih. Hanangkü shinnyih mü leitü hapa shingkü Gilgal shei nyükhen” shei e.
Mechem Israel am Gilgalei Jeriko kahji kü baümtap vetü nyupa, hapa len nyih anpüalipabü om kü Hompü Mo moteke.
Hapa Hompü Mo nyihphei jomi hapa Kanan kahdok kü vampü hahying ngouei hatü daw neshihpü aan shongpü shan vaishi hahteke.
Jomi kahdok kü vampü hahying hahpü nyihphei manna vüpü dohdai; hajük kü Israel ami manna nedang, shejao hapa bong jomi Kanan kahdok kü vampü hahying hahteke.

Mechem Joshua Jeriko yopailei nyupa, ngangahük kü büpai veishuohshingkü shennyak hük yanlu notü yaongshi ee. Joshua-i büpa touei heih-ei, “Nüngü hamphong khong kübü veshan hük hi vepa hük ang?” shei phe.
Hapa shennyaki, “Mepayao nevai, shejao ngeiyü
lei veshan mübüi jangei, “Nüngei la leipü lathuth huktüktuh; mehenangkü nüng yaongpü shingü daülangpü shing khih” shei e, hatü epükei Joshua-i lathuth huktük.
Shaang Jeriko chingnyü penyüsha shakhimong kemei Israel am neshühahhen shingvaishi küplang. Üpaiyao vamei nedaiaok nevaijü neshüaok.
i Joshua kü, “Veituh, ngei nüngei lak kü Jeriko, haleipü ong hatü veshanthü shuohtepih.
Veshanthü kemei hapa chingnyü shinei nyih kü chem shinhen. Hapakei nyih vok shinhen.
Ngongpa nyet ieyei mi vaung amit notü Vangpüshuwpü Pela shekü kamhen. Nyih nyetpabü kü chingnyü shinei ngongpathüi amit vüngyaki nyetpa shinhen.
Mechem ngongpathüi yüluei amit vüngpü danhenshang, nanglakthü peüi wongmü lenhen, hatü Jeriko chingnyü bham laamkahen, hatü veshanthü peü jiüshangi chingnyü mongei shühen” shei eteke.
Hanangkü Nunei cheha Joshua-i ngongpathü nyükei jomphong kü, “Amphongi
hatü büpai nanglakthü kü, “Sheshalei daituh hatü
Mechem Joshua-i nanglakthü kü shah eyei kempa, ngongpa nyeti amit nyet notü vüngyaki
Lahhilaong nopü veshanthü amit vüngpü ngongpathü shekü kam, hatü Vangpüshuwpü Pela pheikao veshanthü mü. Hapa hepak yangkemei amit vüngteke.
Shejao Joshua-i nanglakthü kü, “Ngei lentuh shei epü nyih mangngoi thahshi ammi men tedhüng nevaijü ngeü te-ankei, hatü shah te-e; hapheikü mon ammi lentuh” shei e.
Hanangkü
Joshua-i nepphei lomi pao hatü ngongpathüi
Ngongpa nyeti amit nyet notü
Hanangkü nyih nyipabü kao jomi chingnyü kü chem shin, hatü baümtapei leiyei paüm. Jomi nyih vok hapakei dük.
Nyih nyetpabü jom vangaihinüng layaongei daiyei aihük mü chingnyü kü nyetpa shin; hapa nyih mon jomi chingnyü kü nyetpa shinteke.
Nyetpabü shinshingkü mechem ngongpathüi amit vüngpa, Joshua-i nanglakthü kü, “Lentuh; mehenangkü
“Hapa chingnyü hatü halei nyupü lemphüli
Shejao ammi mangtükhen nyupü douthü meheyao teyah; ammi hapakei dükjema, ammi Israel amei baümtapei shanghah hatü ten koei leihen.
Hon, melangnyiam hatü nyiam peü
Mechem ngongpathüi amit vüngpa, shennyakthüi amit ngeü mü wongmü len, hatü bham laamdai; hanangkü shennyak peüi jiüshangi mongei shü, hatü jomi chingnyü kaamei yah.
Jomei yani chingnyülei nyupü nyüha, baha, hashih hatü behe peü jütük; jomi mohoh, mi, hatü gaduthüao jütük.
Joshua-i hahepak kü gühshuk deishihpü shennyak nyi kü, “Büm yubü Rahabei shemei shütuh hatü anji-i pinnyü kü lahpükei pinnyü hatü pinnyülei shem am peü müei ngailangkei” shei e.
Hanangkü jiji mongei shüei Rahab, chepa, chenyü, jeihinaüthü hatü aopü pinnyülei shem am peü ngailang. Jom müei deiyei Israel amei baümtap hao shing hükei tuh.
Jomi chingnyü hatü halei nyupü lemphüli awi haptük; hon hi ngin, melangnyiam hatü nyiam yungshongthü mon yah-ei leiyei

Shejao Joshua-i Rahab büm yubü, pinnyülei shem am peü yang; mehenangkü Jeriko chingnyü gühshukhen Joshua-i shompü shennyak nyi pinnyüi joei yangteke. Ha nyih mü leitü jomei shemong Israel kahdokei nyuei dai.
Hahepak kü Joshua-i hapakei vangeishuwei eteke:
“Hapa Jeriko chingnyü üpai leiyei linghen yaongnya,
büpa kü
Büpai laophülei hashong
lomohhütü mon hapa chingnyü chongnyiam linghen;
Laophülei hashong lomohhütü mon büpai hapa chingnyü penyüsha linghen.”
Hanangkü
Shejao Israel ami mangtükhen epü dou meheyao teyah shei

Shaang Joshua-i Jeriko leipü shennyak hanei Bethel heongphi Beth-Aven yopailei nyupü Ai chingnyülei shom, hatü jomphong kü, “Aongtuh hatü hapa kahmük gühshuktü leikei” shei eteke. Hanangkü shennyakthü aongei Ai chingnyü gühshukteke.

Jomi Joshua touei leiyei büpa kü, “Nanglak peü aonghen napü neshiü; haja nyi nevaijü jem hükshing aongjoong hapa Ai chingü hah-aokhen khih. Jom nanglak maani mon nyüke; hanangkü nanglak peü nyiueinangei te-anshih” shei eteke.
Hanangkü shennyak haja jem hükshing mon anshih; shejao Ai am kü nyemei nyaiteke.
Ai ami jom hapüanpüvok hükshing jütük. Ai ami Israel am chingnyü penyüsha kübü Shebarim thahshi changei shanei kahjidhongei jüteke. Israel am nyempai mong mahdai.
Hahepak kü Joshua-i laophülei ashak shaaktük, hatü om dhüshi
Hatü Joshua-i, “Oh
Oh

Kanan am hatü lebü kahmükthü kübü shennyakthüi hapa jung danlanghen, hatü jomi ham shonlanghen hatü hamei men kahdoknyü kübü thittükhen khih. Nüngei men longpü nyuhen shingvaishi nüngi mehe dükhenang?” shei e.

Israel am mang thahteke; jom kü ngei dükhen eshuohpü ngelei vangpüshuwpü mangtükteke. Jom kü ngei teyah, mangtüktuh shei epü dou hanei yah-ei nyüke; jomi gühteke; shahshem eteke; jomi hapa dou laophülei douthü mü tuh-ei nyüke.
Hanangkü Israel ami vepathü khüei neyangaoki nyemei nyaipü khih; hanangkü jomphongao mahhen shangteke. Ngei teyah shei epü dou amphongi nemangtükpü thahshi ngei am mü nenyuküpih!
Daituh, nanglakthü daütüktuh, hatü jom kü laophü nyingi ngenyih shingvaishi daütüktuh; mehenangkü
Nepnüng dhom mü jat jat peihen etuh.
Üpa shennyakei hapa gühdou danghenshang, büpa hatü shem am, hatü büpai angpü lemphüli aw kü jaktükhen; mehenangkü büpai
Nepnüng dhom mü Joshua-i Israel am jat jat peihü, hatü büpai Judah jat loukei ngai.
Büpai Judah jat kübü phang phang deiteke, hatü Zerah am phang loukei ngai. Hapheikü büpai Zerah am phang kübü mük mük deiteke, hatü Zimri am mük loukei ngai.
Büpai shao Zimri am mük kübü palom palom deiteke, hatü Judah jat kübü Zerahlei cheha Zimri, Zimrilei cheha Karmi, Karmilei cheha Akhan loukei ngai.
Hahepak kü Joshua-i Akhan kü, “Ngelei hapeü, Israel amei Kahvang kü müknyinshekhang shuohtuh hatü ngaiyei lahtuh. Nüngi mehe dükpa ha ngei kü eshih; ha ngei kü tejo” shei e.
“Hayü hingmei-üng! Ngei

Jeni yahpü douthü khongkü ngei Babylon amei bhagthuh meipü hük, ngin dok nyi hükshing, hatü hon dokbhao shei ahshi-üng mükhühshi eepü nangkü ngei hathü yahpeih. Hathüyü hamei ashakshemei kahdok shotü ngin peü mü phangei shihtü dungshi shepeih” shei Akhani e.
Hanangkü Joshua-i shennyak hanei shom, hatü jomphongi ashakshemei mokei heih, hatü douthü kemei ashakshem mongei kahdok shotü ngin peü mü phangei shihtü dungshi chongjateke.
Jomi ha shem leipü douthü yah-ei Joshua hatü Israel am peü touei dei, hatü

Hahepak kü Joshua hatü Israel am peüi Zerahlei cheha Akhan, ngin, bhagthuh, hon, büpalei hapeüthü, büpalei mohoh, gadu hatü mi, büpalei ashakshem hatü büpalei nyupü lemphü yah-ei Akhor Kahjilei deiteke.
Joshua-i, “Mehekei nüngi ham kü henüng shanghah koei peihüpa?” shei eteke.
Jomi Akhanei mahng kü yaong longi thaiyei chetphong hatü hathü shinnyih thahshi nyüke. Hanangkü ha nyih mü leitü hapa shing kü, “Shanghah Kahji” shei nyüknyüke.
Hahepak kü

Nüngi Jeriko hatü jomei ongpa kü dükshuohpükei Ai hatü haleipü ong kao dükeishuoh; shejao haleipü douhinang hatü yemhimakthü laophü laophü shing leihahtuh. Hapa ching ngaümphei phikü show lingtuh” shei eteke.
Hanangkü Joshua hatü veshanthü kemei Ai ching hahhen layaongei dai. Büpai hampathü haja hapüan je, hatü jomphong nyak kü,
hapa ngeükhüam shuoh-ei shomteke: “Amphongi hapa ching ngaümphei philei showtuh. Tailei tedai. Am peü thashimashi nyutuh.
Ngei hatü ngei mü daipüthü ching mongei shühen, hatü mechem sheleipükei jomi hamphong mü hoknüng heihkahenshang, hamphong nyaidaishuohhen.
Jomi ham kü changei ching kübü laoei vamkahen; mehenangkü jomi, ‘Hathüyü sheleipükei-üng jen kü nyemei nyainyu khih’ shei eteihen. Hanangkü mechem ham jom toueipü nyaiyei leikahenshang,
amphong show kübü paohen hatü ching hahhen. Mehenangkü
Mechem ammi hapa ching hahhenshang,
Hanangkü Joshua-i jomphong deishih, hatü jomphongi Bethel hatü Ai nyi aa kü Ai heshüphi kü show uo, shejao Joshua payü ha ya nanglakthü mü baümtapei paümteke.
Nepphei lomi Joshua-i veshanthü nyükei thaihü, hatü Israel am mübüthü mü Ai chingei aong.
Büpa mü nyupü veshanthü peü aongei chingnyü penyüsha yopailei ngoiyei Ai ching apshaphi kü jomphong hatü Ai aa kü kahji-i mon aatü baümtap veteke.
Joshua-i veshan haja nga hükshing mon Bethel hatü Ai ching heshüphi aa kü show uohüteke.
Jomi veshanthü shingnüngei show kü uohüei baümtapei nyupüthüi Ai ching apshaphi tap, hatü show kü uopüthüi heshüphi tapteke. Shejao ha ya Joshuayü kahjilei paümteke.

Mechem Ai ongpai ha eepa, büpa hatü ching kü nyupü shennyakthü peü nepnüng lomi Israel am mü thep ponghen Arabah shei epü shingei heih, shejao ngaümphei lemeipü ve vamei jüshuohhen shei büpai nenying.
Joshua hatü Israel am kemei nyempükei hu, hatü jomphong yingnyü philei mokdaishuoh.
Hanangkü ching kü nyupü shennyakthü peü nyükteitü thaiyei jom kü chang, hatü jomphongi Joshua kü changshing kü ching kübü khaatdaitü nyu.
Israel am kü changei nedai-i shennyak üpayao Ai nevaijü Bethelei nenyu. Jomi Israel am kü changei lüdaitü chingü apshi tuhphong.
Hahepak kü
Büpai phung notü lak haonghinüng show uopü veshanthü vamei shehongei heih hatü ching mongei shüei ching hah hatü aw hapteke.
Mechem Ai ami ngaümphei lemei yaakei veipa, vangmü dhaüshi ching kü aw aongdaitü eeteke. Sheyü jom yanglem neshiü; mehenangkü jahpan philei nyaidaipü Israel amao nyokei hoknüng leiteke.
Mechem Joshua hatü Israel ami show kü uopüthüi ching kü aw haongpü eepa, jom nyokei leiyei Ai am jütük.

Show uopü veshanthü-ao ching leipü jom mü hoknüng vamei heih; ngaümphei shelang kü Israel ami shümlangtü jom vepalei show kü shüteke. Israel ami hathü hükao aoei netuh, nevaijü yangdaipü hükao neshiü-i kemei jütükkem.
Shejao Ai ongpayü yemmü yepei Joshua touei leijateke.
Mechem Israel ami Ai am kemei kahjishongei changiteiyei jüpa, Israel am kemei Ai chingei aongei aopüthü peü jütük.
Ai am ha nyih mahpü nyüha baha peü shepei haja anpünyi nyuteke.
Mehenangkü Ai nanglakthü mangjükem thahshi Joshua-i phung notü Ai philei meeshi yaongpü lak nelei.
Israel ami yemhimakthü hatü haleipü douhinangthü peü Joshua homei
Joshua-i Ai ching haptüktü lavüngtoiyei yakphong, hatü shinnyih thahshi hapakei nyüke.

Joshua-i Ai amei ongpa pü hük kü shentü om dhüshi sheüphong, hatü vanghe shüshingkü büpai ngeükhüam shuoh-ei hapa mahng yah-ei chingei shüpü penyüsha touei yakphong, hatü ha shangkü yaong longi thaiyei shüngphong hatü ha shinnyih thahshi nyüke.
Hapheikü Joshua-i Ebal Kahshangei
hatü hapayü
Hammü Israel ami veishi Joshua-i Mosai nyangpü Mosa shahkung kübü yaong kü nyangteke.
Israel ami benha hatü bühü, jomei mübüthü, lakchongbüthü, hatü shahphenbüthü kemei
Hapheikü Shahkungnyü Laitap kü nyangei nyupü keiha moihiman hatü thaüvaüthü kemei Shahkung kübü Joshua-i ieteke.
Israel am khong nyüha, hashih hatü jom mü lakeiloiyei nyupüthü thaipü touei Mosai epü shahjük hükao Joshua-i ne-ie-i netuhphong.

Mechem Jordan yungdang heshüphi kahshang hatü kahshangla hatü Mediterranean yungkung kahjishong kübü Lebanon apshaphi thahshi nyupü Hit, Amor, Kanan, Perizz, Hiv hatü Jebus ongthüi Israel ami vehok neüpü jung danpa,
jomi Joshua hatü Israel am khüei hokhen shingvaishi thaiyei mongjemteke.
Shejao mechem Joshua-i Jeriko hatü Ai am kü dükshuohpü jung Gibeon ami danpa,
jomi büpa kü lawlüphen kon ling. Jomi hahying hanei tem, hatü jomei gadu kü dhoila ten jüm, hatü yiü shihpü phaishuwi thapei thüngtü ha shih,
shaakdaiphei lathuh thaptü thuh, hatü ashakten üm; jomi vandaipü hatü shaodaipü hahying mon kotü,
jomi Gilgal baümtap mongei shüei Joshua hatü Israel shennyakthü kü, “Hamphongü tailu kahmük leipü peiküpeih, hanangkü ham mü chingmei lingshah” shei eteke.
Shejao Israel shennyakthüi, “Mehekei hami am mü chingmei linghen? Üpai nyingpa, amü yopailei nyupü am vaihen aokpeih” shei e.
Jomi Joshua kü, “Hamphongü nüng chongphobüthü hih” shei e. Shejao Joshua-i, “Amphongü üamang? Meleipü peiküpa?” shei phe.
Hahepak kü jomi, “Hamphongü tailu kahmük leipü peiküpeih; mehenangkü hami
hatü Jordan heongphi kü nyupü Amor am Heshbon ong Sihon, hatü Ashtaroth kü vanglem lempü Bashan ongpa Og, nyi kü mehe dükshuohpa hami ha danpeih.”

Hamei mübüthü hatü hamei kahmük kü nyupü nanglakthüi hamphong kü, “Am yenlem kü hahhen yinghen temtü daiyei jom mü pongteituh hatü jom kü, ‘Hamü am chongphobüthü hih; hanangkü ham mü uwmeilem lingshah’ shei etuh” shei ephopeih.
“Mechem am mü pongteihen shingvaishi shem kübü hahying temei layaongpa, hamei hapa hahying shaamluki nyuhampeih. Shejao veihümao, shaangü vandai hatü shaodaiteke.
Hatü hami yiü-ü phaishuw ja kü shih-ei daipeih, shejao sheyü shaakdaiteke; hamei lathuh hatü ashakviha kemei tailu yenlem kü kampü nangkü chang leidaiteke” shei eteke.
Israel shennyakthüi jomphong leipü hahying hanei yah, shejao
Hatü Joshua-i Gibeon am mü uwmei lem ling, hatü jom yemmü tuh, hatü Israel am mübüthüi uwmei lem nyuhen shei vangeishuwteke.
Gibeon am mü uwmei lem lingtü nyih jem daipheikü Israel ami jomü yopailei nyupü am ja shei dan.
Hanangkü Israel am layaongei aongei nyih jempabü kü jom nyupü chingnyüthü: Gibeon, Kephirah, Beeroth, hatü Kiriath-Jearim ngoi.
Shejao Israel ami jom ching nehah-aok; mehenangkü
Shejao jomi, “
Jeni lahtükpü nangkü jom yemmü tuhhen; jeni lahtükpü mangtükjema Kahvangi jen hanghihühen.
Jom yemmü nyemnyu, shejao jomü jenei pü kakei, yung shohü-ei anghen” shei e. Hanangkü mübüthüi epükei tuhteke.
Hahepak kü Joshua-i Gibeon am kü nyükei, “Ammi ham yopailei nyuyaki ham tailu kahmükei nyunyüpeih shei eshi mehekei ammi ham kü lawlüppa?
Ammi hapakei dükpü nangkü Kahvangi am thaüvaüteke. Am ngelei Kahvangei shemei aa kei den kü pü kakpü hatü yung shopü nedohpih” shei e.
Jomi Joshua kü, “Hapa kahdok kü am shekü nyupü nanglakthü kemei thitei mahtüktü hapa kahdok am kü shuohhen shei
Hamü ammei lakmongei nyüpeih. Am kü mepa meiangke hatü jiüangke shei deih, ha ham kü dükshihma” shei eteke.
Hanangkü Israel amei lak kübü Joshua-i jom nejütüki yangei tuh.
Hapa nyih mü leitü Gibeon amü Israel am shing hatü

Shaang Jerusalem ongpa Adoni-zedeki Joshua-i Jeriko ching hatü haleipü ong kü dükpükei Ai ching hahtü chemjalak kü mangtük hatü haleipü ongpa-ao jütük, hatü Gibeon ami Israel am mü chingmei lingei nyunyuja shei dan.
Büpa hatü nanglakthüi ha kü longi nyem; mehenangkü ong nyupü lebü chingthü keiha Gibeon amü longpü chingnyü; hapayü Ai mü longshi hatü haleipü shennyakthü-ü hampathü mon nyuteke.
Hanangkü Jerusalem ongpa Adoni-zedeki Hebron am Hoham ongpa, Jarmuth am Piram ongpa, Lakhish ong Japhia, hatü Eglon ong Debir kü shah shomei,
“Gibeon ching hahnüng aongkütuh hatü ngei kü sheühshih; mehenangkü jomi Joshua hatü Israel am mü uwmei lem lingteke” shei eteke.
Hahepak kü Amor am ongpathü jom nga– Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lakhish hatü Eglon shei thaitü veshanthü kemei aongei shing lingtü hahteke.
Gibeon ami Gilgal baümtapei Joshua kü shah shomei, “Ammei chongphobüthü teyakphong. Lomi aongei ham yangshih; mehenangkü phaüshang kahdok leipü Amor ongthü thaitü ham khüei hokhen temnyüke” shei e.
Hanangkü Joshua-i büpalei veshanthü, hampathü-ao omshi mütü Gilgal baümtap kübü layaongei aong.
i Joshua kü, “Nüngi jom kü tenyem; ngei nüngei lak kü jom shuohtepih. Jom üpayao am khüei neyaongaokpih” shei e.
Vangnyak Gilgal kübü aongei Joshua hatü veshanthüi vangphashi ngangahük kü hahtükteke.
i hathü Israel am touei longi nyemhü. Israel ami Gibeonei jom longi jü, hatü Israel ami Beth-Horonei daipü lemyangkü jom changei shanei Azekah hatü Makkedah thahshi jüteke.
Jomphong Israel am kü nyemei Beth-Horon kübü Azekah thahshi nyaihepak kü
Ha nyih
“Oh vanghenyü, Gibeon touei,
Oh lennyü, Aijalon kahji touei yaongdaituh.”

Hanangkü Israel ami vepathü mangneü thahshi vanghenyü yaongdai hatü lennyü shinei nedai. Hapayü Jashar Laitap kü nyangei nyüke. Vanghenyü vangshang jiam kü yaongdai, hatü nyih hükshing vanghe neshüi nyuteke.
i hangkulei shah bangpü hapa nyih kei mechemao shelei nenyu, hatü ha nyih mü leitü nenyu. Hingmei
Hapheikü Joshua-i Israel am peü müei Gilgal baümtapei lei.
Hahepak kü Amor am ongpathü nga nyaiyei daiyei Makkedahlei yaongsha hükei joshi dangteke.
Mechem Amor am ongthü Makkedah yaongshalei joshi dangteke shei Joshua kü eshuohpa,
Joshua-i e, “Yaong longpü hük ngowei deiyei yaongsha kü hathü nedidaihen mü dhüh-eishuoh; hatü halei shennyak hanei yomphongtuh,
shejao amphong payü hatouei tenyu; ammei vepathü kü changei daituh, hatü ngaümpheilei müshi changei jütuh; jom laophülei chingei te-anshih; mehenangkü
Mechem Joshua hatü Israel ami kempü vaishi jüpa, shejao haneipa nyaiyei daiyei chingnyü penyüsha mongei shüdai.
Veshanthü kemei Makkedahlei Joshua touei meishi leiyei ngoikemteke hatü üpaiyao Israel am khüei shah phahükao ne-e.”
Hahepak kü Joshua-i, “Yaongsha aptuh hatü ongpathü jom ngaphen ngei touei deikei” shei e.
Hanangkü yaongsha aptü haleipü Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lakhish hatü Eglon amei ongthü müei deijateke.

Mechem jomi ongpathü Joshua touei müei deijapa, Joshua-i Israel am kemei nyük, hatü büpa mü daipü veshanthü kü, “Yopailei heihkei, hatü ha ongthülei üng kü ammei la-i shouptuh” shei e. Hanangkü jom heih-ei üng kü la-i shoupteke.
Hahepak kü Joshua-i jomphong kü, “Am tenyem nevaijü tehan. Am wongkoh monglongtuh. Ammi hokpü vepathü peü kü
Hapheikü Joshua-i ongpathü jü, hatü pü nga kü jomphongei mahng om dhüshi sheüphong.
Vanghe shüshingkü Joshua-i ngeükhüam shuoh, hatü hathülei mahng yah-ei shelei jom jopü yaongshalei yakphong; jomi yaong longpü yah-ei deiyei yaongsha kü dhühphong hatü ha shinnyih thahshi nyüke.
Ha nyih Joshua-i Makkedah ching hahteke. Büpai hapa chingnyü hatü haleipü ong hatü shennyakthü hükao aoei netuh-i jütükkem. Büpai Jeriko ongpa kü dükshuohpükei Makkedah ongpa kao dükshuohteke.
Hapheikü Joshua hatü veshanthü kemei Makkedah kübü Libnahlei heih, hatü Libnah ching hahteke.
i hapa ching hatü haleipü ongpa Israel amei lak kü shuoh; jomi hükao aoei netuh-i shennyak peü jütükkem. Büpai Jeriko ongpa kü dükshuohpükei hapa ongpa kao dükshuohteke.
Shao Joshua hatü veshanthü kemei Libnah kübü heih-ei Lakhish ngoi, hatü hapa ching shümtü hahteke.
i Lakhish am Israel amei lak kü shuoh; büpai Libnah am kü dükshuohpükei hükao aoei netuh-i nyih nyipabü kü jütükkem.
Hahepak kü Gezer am Horam ongpai Lakhish am kü sheühhen aong, shejao Joshua-i büpa hatü büpalei veshanthü neü, hatü hükao aoei netuh-i jütükkem.
Lakhish kübü Joshua hatü veshanthü Eglonlei heih, hatü jomi hapa ching shümei shennyakthü jü.
Jomi ha nyih-üng hapa ching hah, hatü büpai Lakhish am kü dükshuohpü keiha shennyakthü peü jütükkem.
Hapheikü Joshua hatü veshanthü Eglon kübü Hebronei aong hatü jomi hapa ching hah.
Jomi hapa ching hahshingkü haleipü ongpa, ching am peü jütük; büpai Eglon am kü dükshuohpükei shennyak hükao aoei netuh-i jütük.
Hapheikü Joshua hatü veshanthü peü Debir lemei nyokei leiyei hapa ching hah.
Büpai hapa ching, haleipü ongpa hatü hapa yopai leipü chingthü kemei hahtük; büpai Hebron am hatü Libnah hatü haleipü ongpa kü dükshuohpükei Debir hatü haleipü ongpa kao dük.
Hanangkü Joshua-i phaüshang kahmük hatü Negeb, heshüphi kahshangla hatü kahji kahshang kemei hah. Büpai hükao yemmü aoei netuh-i jütükkem.
Joshua-i Kadesh-Barnea kübü Gaza thahshi hatü Goshen kübü Gibeon moidoithü kemei hahtük.
Joshua-i hathü ong kemei hatü jomei kahmükthü ve shanhük kü hahtükkem; mehenangkü
Hapheikü Joshua hatü veshanthü kemei Gilgal baümtapei leidai.
Mechem Hazor ongpa Jabini Israel am aokpü dangpü jung danpa, büpai Madon ongpa Jobab, Shimron ong hatü Akhshaph ong,
hatü apshaphi phaüshang kahmük kübü ongthü hatü pehephi Khinneroth kü Arabah Kahshangla kü, hatü heshüphi Naphoth-Dor kü,
heshü hatü heongphi kü nyupü Kanan am, Amor am, Hit am, Perizz am, hatü phaüshang kahmük kü nyupü Jebus am, hatü Mizpah kahdok Hermon Kahshangla kü nyupü Hiv am touei shah shom.
Jomi jomei veshanthü kemei hatü vehok koyei hatü koyei kharithü yungching bhihhiphang kei ienüng neaoki vam.
Hapa ongpathü kemei jomei veshanthü khong hük vaihütü jomi chem kü Israel am mü hokhen shingvaishi Merom yungyenei baümtap veteke.
Hanangkü Joshua-i büpalei veshanthü peü mütü Merom yungyenei heih-ei ngangahük kü vepathü jüteke.

i jom Israel amei lak kü shuoh; Israel ami jom jü, hatü Longpü Sidon kübü Misrephothmaim thahshi hatü heongphi Mispeh kahji thahshi changei shan. Jomi hükao yemmü netuh-i mangjükem thahshi nedoh-i hokteke.
i epükei Joshua-i jom kü dük; büpai vehok koyeithülei laphei chah langtük hatü koyei kharithü aw kü jaktük.
Hapheikü Joshua-i nyokei leiyei Hazor hah hatü haleipü ongpa jü. Hazor-ü lebü ongchingthü peü mü wong kohpü ongching nyuteke.
Jomi haleipü shennyakthü hükao yemmü netuh-i jütük hatü hapa chingnyü awi haptük.
Shejao Joshua-i Hazor awi shamtükpü mü lenei Israel ami shangtao kü nyupü chingnyüthü neshamtük.
Israel ami laophü shingvaishi haleipü douhinang hatü yemhimak kemei shetei leidai, shejao shennyakthü kemei hükao yemmü aoei netuh-i jütükkem.
i büpa chongphopü Mosa kü epükei, Mosai Joshua kü e, hatü
Hanangkü Joshua-i ha kahdokthü kemei yah: Phaüshang kahmük, Negeb kemei, Goshen kahmük kemei, heshüphi kahjishong, Arabah hatü Israel amei kahshangthü mü kahjishongao omshi,
Halak Kahshang kübü Seir philei heihdaipü Hermon Kahshang phangkü Lebanon kahji Baal-gad thahshi yahteke. Büpai jomei ongthü kemei yepei lei, hatü deh-ei jütükkem.
Joshua-i jomei ongthü mü hepak luangi hokteke.
Gibeonei nyupü Hiv am mü lenei üamiyao Israel am mü chingmeivangmei nenyu; kemei mü hokteke.
i Mosa kü epükei phahji neshiüi bhanghili mahtükhen, chemjalak kü jütükhen shingvaishi Israel am mü khüei hokhen
Hahepak kü Joshua daiyei phaüshang kahmük: Hebron, Debir, Anab, Judah hatü Israel phaüshang kahmükthü kü nyupü Anakim am kemei jütükkem.
Israel kahdok kü Anakim am hükao aoei netuh; maani mon Gaza, Gath hatü Ashdod kü aoei nyuteke.
i Mosa kü epükei Joshua-i kahdok kemei yah; hatü Joshua-i Israel jat ieyei kü hapa kahdok mükjüp hanei shuoh. Hapheikü mon kahdok kü hokpüheipü dohteke.
Hathüyü Israel ami neütükpü hapa kahdok kü nyupü ongthü khih, hatü jomei kahdok Jordan heongphi, Arnon kahji kübü Hermon Kahshang thahshi heongphi Arabah peü omei yahteke.

Amor am Sihon ongpa, büpai Heshbonei chong vaitü Aroer kübü Arnon kahji jung hük kübü hapa kahji jiam thahshi, hatü Ammon amei viong Jabbok yungyen ngoishi; hapayü Gilead kahdok jiam thahshi vanglem lemteke.
Büpai Khinneroth yungching heongphi Arabah kübü Dipü Yungching heongphi Beth-Jeshimoth hatü pehephi kü Pisgah Kahshangla thahshi vanglem lemteke.
Bashan am Og ongpa, Rephaim am khongkü shoumpü ong, büpai Ashtaroth hatü Edrei kü chong vaitü vanglem lemteke.
Büpai Hermon Kahshang, Salekah, hatü Bashan kemei Geshur viong thahshi, hatü Maakah hatü Gilead kahdok jiam kübü Heshbon ongpa Sihonei viong thahshi vanglem lemteke.
chongphobü Mosa hatü Israel ami jom neütük, hatü hapa kahdok Reuben, Gad hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh phang kü jomei kahdok vaihen shuoh.

Joshua hatü Israel ami Jordan heshüphi Lebanon kahji Baal-gad kübü pehephi Seir kü Halak Kahshang thahshi kü nyupü ongthü neütük, hatü jomei kahdok Joshua-i Israel am kü jat jat aimü hantü jomei lompü vaihen shuohtük.
Hapa kahdokthü kü phaüshang kahmük, heshüphi kahshangla, Arabah kahjishong, jahpan hatü Negeb, Hit, Amor, Kanan, Perizz, Hiv hatü Jebus amei kahdokthü omshi nyuteke.
Israel ami hathü chingnyüthü kübü ongthü neütükteke: Jeriko ong hük, Ai ong (Bethel yopai kübü) hük,
Jerusalem ong hük, Hebron ong hük,
Jarmuth ong hük, Lakhish ong hük,
Eglon ong hük, Gezer ong hük,
Debir ong hük, Geder ong hük,
Hormah ong hük, Arad ong hük,
Libnah ong hük, Adullam ong hük,
Makkedah ong hük, Bethel ong hük,
Tappuah ong hük, Hepher ong hük,
Aphek ong hük, Lasharon ong hük,
Madon ong hük, Hazor ong hük,
Shimron-Meron ong hük, Akhshaph ong hük,
Taanakh ong hük, Megiddo ong hük,
Kadesh ong hük, Karmel leipü Jokneam ong hük,
Naphath-Dor leipü Dor ong hük, Gilgal leipü Goiim ong hük,
Tirzah ong hük– peüshep ongpathü hapüanpühük nyuteke.
Mechem Joshua viüei vangbong longi daipa,
Shaang mangyahpü kahdok hathü nyüke: Philistia hatü Geshur amei kahdokthü kemei,
‘Ijip kü heongphi Shihor kübü apshaphi Ekron viong thahshi, hathü kü Kanan am shei enyüke; halei Philistia am ongthü, Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath hatü Ekron kü nyüke’, hatü Avvim amei kahdokthü,
apshaphi kü Kanan kahdok kemei, Sidon kü Mearah kübü Amor kahdok Aphek thahshi,
hatü Gebal amei kahdok, hatü heongphi kü Lebanon kemei, Hermon Kahshang pehephi Baal-gad kübü Lebo-Hamath thahshi nyüke” shei e.
“Phaüshang kahmük kü nyupüthü Lebanon kübü Misrephothmaim, ha lappai Sidon am kemei, ngei Israel am toueipü changtükhen; ngei nüng kü epükei kahdok mon Israel am kü jomei lompü vaihen haneishuoh.
Hanangkü hapa kahdok jat shü kü hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh jat kü haneishuoh” shei eteke.
Bhaosheipü Manasseh phang, Reuben hatü Gad phangthüi Jordan heongphi kü
Hapayü Aroer kübü Arnon kahji jung, hatü hapa kahji jiam kübü chingnyü, hatü Medeba kahji kübü Dibon ngoishi,
hatü Heshbonei vanglem lempü Amor am Sihon ongpalei chingnyüthü kemei Amor amei viong thahshi;
hatü Gilead omei, Geshur hi Maakah amei kahdok omei, Hermon Kahshang peü hatü Bashan kemei Salekah thahshi;
hatü Rephaim ongching kü shomei Ashtaroth hatü Edrei kü vanglem lempü Og ongpalei ongching kemei omei yahteke. Mosai jom neütü changtük, hatü jomei kahdokthü yahteke.
Shejao Israel ami Geshur hatü Maakah nanglakthü nechangtük; hanangkü jom shinnyih thahshi Israel am mü chem kü nyuei dainyüpeih.
Shejao büpai Levi am phang kü mükjüp nehan; mehenangkü
Mosai Reuben jat kü phang phang aimü mükjüp hapakei hanteke:
Aroer kahdok kübü Arnon kahji jung, hatü hapa kahji hanteke: Aroer kahdok kübü Arnon kahji jung, hatü hapa kahji jiam kübü chingnyüthü, hatü Medeba kahji kemei heih-ei,
Heshbon hatü hapa kahji kübü chingnyüthü kemei, Dibon, Bamoth-Ball, Beth Baal-meon,
Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mephaath,
Kiriathaim, Sibmah, hatü kahjishong Zereth-shahar,
Pisgah kahshong Beth-Peor, hatü Beth-Jeshimoth,

hatü kahji kübü chingnyüthü peü hatü Heshbonei vanglem lempü Amor am Sihon ongpalei ongchingthü kemei shuoh. Mosai Sihon hatü büpa mü sheühteiyei vanglem lempü Midian am Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, hatü Reba hathü neütük.
Vehok kü jüpüthü mü omei Israel ami phongyomteipü Beorlei cheha Balaamao jütük.
Reuben amei viongü Jordan yungkung nyuteke. Hathü chingnyü chinghathüyü Reuben amei mükjüp phang phang kü hanpü nyuteke.
Mosai Gad jat kao phang phang aimü mükjüp hanteke.
Jomei kahdokü Jazer, Gilead amei chingnyüthü kemei, Rabbah kü apshaphi Aroer thahshi Amon amei kahdok hükkeishing;
hatü Heshbon kübü Ramath-Mizpeh hatü Betonim, hatü Mahanaim kübü Debir kahdok ngoishi;
hatü kahjilei Beth-Haram, Beth-Nimrah, Sukkoth hatü Zaphon mü Heshbon am Sihon ongpalei ongching aopü kemei, Jordan apshaphi Khinnereth yungching dohpü ngoishi omei shuoh.
Hathü chingnyü chinghathüyü Gad amei mükjüp phang phang kü hanpü nyuteke.
Hapayü Mosai bhaosheipü Manasseh jat kü, Manassehlei hühihathü kü phang phang aimü mükjüp shuohteke:
Jomei kahdok Mahanaim kübü Bashan thahshi, Bashan am Og ongpalei ongching kemei Bashan leipü Jair am nyushing kemei, ching pejem,

Gilead kahdok hükkeishing hatü Ashtaroth hatü Edrei, Bashan kü Og ongpalei ongchingthü kemei omei shuoh. Hathüyü Manassehlei cheha Makirlei hühihathü, Makir kü phaakpü hühihathü phang kü hanpü mükjüp nyuteke.
Hapayü Jordan homei Jeriko heongphi kü Moab kahjilei nyushi Mosai hanshuohpü mükjüp nyuteke.
Shejao Levi am phang kü Mosai mükjüp nehan; büpai jom kü epükei
Shaang hathüyü Israel ami Kanan kahdokei dangpü mükjüpthü nyuteke, hatü hathüyü Eleazar ngongpa, hatü Nunei cheha Joshua, hatü Israel jatthü kü mübüthüi jom kü hanteke.
Jat shü mü bhaoei kü
Mosai jat nyi mü bhaoei kü Jordan apshaphi kü jomei mükjüp hanshuoh, shejao lebüthü kü kei Levi am phang kü mükjüp nehan;
Mehenangkü Josephei hapeüthü Manasseh hatü Ephraim shei jat nyi vamteke. Levi ami nyuhen chingthü hatü yemhimakthü kü het ühhen phaü mü lenei kahdok mükjüp nedang.
Hanangkü
Shaang Gilgalei nyushi Judah am shennyakthü Joshua touei pei, hatü Kenizz am Jephunnehlei cheha Kalebi büpa kü, “Kahvang shennyak Mosa kü Kadesh-Barnealei nyushi ji nang
chongphopü Mosai ngei Kadesh-Barnea leipü kahdok thümnüng shompü hepak kü ngei nyübüh vangbong pinyi nyuhampeih, hatü ngei hingshangpü shah-om koei leipeih.
Shejao ngei mü daipü küphüthüi nanglakthülei mong maanhüpeih; shejao ngei payü mong kempai
Hanangkü ha nyih Mosai ngei kü lah-ei, ‘Nüngei la-i shouppü kahdok kü den kü nüng hatü nüngei hapeüthülei mükjüp vaihen; mehenangkü nüngi
Israel am jahpanei longteipü hepak kü büpai Mosa kü hapa epü nyih kübü shinnyihpai ngei vangbong pinyipünga ngoishi
Mosai ngei shompü nyih kei-üng ngei shinnyih thahshi wong kohshi nyüpeih; ngei ha hepak kü kei-üng shaangao hoknüng daiaokhen mü wong kohshi nyüpeih.
Hanangkü ha nyih
Hahepak kü Joshua-i büpa kü moihimanshuoh hatü Jephunnehlei cheha Kaleb kü Hebron kahdok mükjüp vaishi shuoh.
Hanangkü shinnyih thahshi Hebronü Kenizz am Jephunnehlei cheha Kalebei mükjüp lei; mehenangkü büpai
Shelei Hebron kü Anakim am longpü shennyak Arbalei men aimü Kiriath-Arba shei nyükhamteke.
Hapheikü hapa kahdok vehok kübü nyiumei dang.
Judah jat kü phang phang aimü hanpü kahdokü Edom viong kübü pehephi Zin yingnyü dohpü ngoishi nyuteke,
hatü jomei pehephilep viongü Dipü Yungching pehephi dohpü kübü pangei,
Akrabbimei aongpü lem pehephi homei Zin thahshi hatü Kadesh-Barnea pehephi thahshi aongei nyuteke. Hapheikü hapayü Hebron peih-ei Addar thahshi hatü Karka philei nyokei leiyei nyuteke.
Hapheikü shao Azmon homei heih-ei Ijip mü viong kübü yungyen phungei aongei Mediterranean yungching kü leanshi nyuteke. Hapayü pehephi kü Judah amei viong nyuteke.
Heongphi kü viongü Dipü Yungching kübü Jordan yungsho thahshi nyu, hatü apshaphi kü viongü yungching kübü Jordan yungsho;
hatü Beth-Hoglah thahshi hatü Beth-Arabah apshaphi kübü Reubenei cheha Bohan Yaongnyü kü leanshi nyuteke.

Hapheikü shao viong Debir thahshi Akhor kahji kübü Gilgal apshaphi lemei nyokei leiyei Adummimei aongpü lem pehephi kahji kü dangteishi nyuteke. Ha kübü nedoh-i En-Shemesh yungyen kü phungei aongpü En-Rogel kü leanshi nyu.

Hapheikü viongü Ben-Hinnom kahji kübü Jebus chingnyü (hapayü Jerusalem) pehephi kahshang thahshi nyu. Hatoueipü shao viong aongdaipü Rephaim kahji heongphi dohpü Hinnom kahji heshüphi kübü shangtao thahshi nyu.
Shangtao kübü Neptoah yungyen thahshi heih-ei Ephron Kahshang kübü chingthü kü peiyei Baalah (hapayü Kiriath-Jearim) thahshi yiüei nyuteke.
Hapheikü hapayü Baalah kübü Seir Kahshang thahshi heshü philei kaokei Jearim kahshang (hapayü Kesalon) heongphi kahshong mü hetei nedoh-i yiüei Beth-Shemesh hatü Timnah peih-ei;
Ekron heongphi kahshong thahshi yiüei Shikkeron philei nyokei leiyei, Baalah Kahshang peih-ei Jabne-el thahshi yiüei yungching mü viong dohteke.
Heshüphi viongü yungching yungkung aimü nyuteke. Hathüyü Judah nanglakthü mükhiphangthü kü shinpü viong.
Kalebi hatoueipü Anakei hapeüthü jom jem, Sheshai, Ahiman hatü Talmai hathü changtük.
Haleipü büpai Debirlei nyupüthü mü hoknüng aong (Debirlei men sheleiyü Kiriath-Sepher shei nyuteke),
hatü Kalebi, “Üpai Kiriath-Sepher ching hah-aokhenshang ngei büpa kü ngelei yiükha Akhsah mü shem yemhühen hih” shei e.
Kenazlei cheha Othniel, Kalebei chenaüi hapa ching hah; hanangkü Kalebi büpalei yiükha Akhsah büpa mü shem yemhü.
Nyih hük mechem pinnyü Othniel touei peipa, pinnyüi chepa kü kah hük yahshih shei yütuh shei büpa kü eteke. Pinnyü gadu dokshang leipü shühjashingkü chepa Kalebi pinnyü kü, “Mehe napa?” shei phe.
Pinnyüi büpa kü, “Ngei kü thintho hük yahshih; nüngi ngei Negeb kahdokei nyuhen mü hanphopai ngei kü yungkuk hük yahshih” shei phe. Hanangkü Kalebi pinnyü kü yungkuk dokhimai shei shuohteke.
Hapayü Judah jat phangthü kü shuohpü mükjüp khih:
Pehe dohpü Edom amei viong philemei Judah jat amei chingnyüthü hathü nyuteke: Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kinah, Dimonah, Adadah,
Kedesh, Hazor, Ithnan,
Ziph, Telem, Bealoth,
Hazor-Hadattah, Kerioth-Hezron (hapayü Hazor),
Amam, Shema, Moladah,
Hazar-Gaddah, Heshmon, Beth-Pelet,
Hazar-Shual, Beer-Sheba, Biziothiah,
Baalah, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Khesil, Hormah,
Ziklag, Madmannah, San-Sannah,
Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain, hatü Rimmon: peüshep jila hapüshü mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Heshüphi kahshangla kübü chingthüyü, Eshtaol, Zorah, Ashnah,
Zanoah, En-Gannim, Tappuah, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Sokoh, Azekah,
Shaaraim, Adithaim hatü Gederah (nevaijü Gederothaim) jila anpüali mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Zenan, Hadashah, Migdalgad,
Dilan, Mizpeh, Jokthe-el,
Lakhish, Bozkath, Eglon,
Kabbon, Lahmam, Kitlish,
Gederoth, Beth-Dagon, Naamah hatü Makkedah: jila anpüvok mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Libnah, Ether, Ashan,
Iphtah, Ashnah, Nezib,
Keilah, Akhzib hatü Mareshah: jila kukshü mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Ekron hatü hapalei jila hatü chingthü;
Ekron heshüphi hatü Ashdod yopai leipü jilathü mü chingthü omei;
Ashdod hatü hapa kü shinpü jila hatü chingthü; hatü Gaza hatü hapa kü shinpü jila hatü chingthü Ijip viong hatü Mediterranean yungching yungkung ngoishi nyuteke.
Phaüshang kahmük kü, Shamir, Jattir, Sokoh,
Dannah, Kiriath-Sannah (hapayü Debir),
Anab, Eshtemoh, Anim,
Goshen, Holon, hatü Giloh jila anpühük mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Arab, Dumah, Eshan,
Janim, Beth-Tappuah, Aphekah,
Humtah, Kiriath-Arba (hapayü Hebron), hatü Zior: jila kukshü mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Maon, Karmel, Ziph, Juttah,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoah,
Kain, Gibeah, hatü Timnah: jila an mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Halhul, Beth-Zur, Gedor,
Maarath, Beth-Anoth, hatü Eltekon: jila vok mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Kiriath-Baal (hapayü Kiriath-Jearim), hatü Rabbah: jila nyi mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Jahpanei Beth-Arabah, Middin, Sekakah,
Nibshan, Hüm Chingnyü, hatü En-Gedi: jila vok mü chingthü omei nyuteke.
Shejao Judah nanglakthüi Jerusalemei nyupü Jebus am nechangtükaok; hanangkü shinnyih thahshi Jubus am Judah am mü Jerusalemei nyunyüpeih.

Josephei hapeüthü kü hanpü kahdokü Jeriko yopai leipü Jordan kübü pangei Jeriko kü heongphi yungthü thahshi, hatü hatoueipü aongdaipü jahpan kü shüei Jeriko kübü aongdaipü phaüshang kahmük Bethel ngoishi;
hatü Bethel kübü Luz thahshi, hapayü Ark am nyupü Ataroth kahdok ngoishi nyuteke.
Hapheikü shao Japhlet amei kahdok heshüphi lemei shadaipü maipa Beth-Horon hatü Gezer thahshi shaei Mediterranean yungching kü leanshi nyuteke.
Hapakei Josephei hapeüthü Manasseh hatü Ephraim jat nyi-i mükjüp dangteke.
Hapayü Ephraim jati phang phang aimü dangpü mükjüp: Jomei kahmük viong heongphi lemei Ataroth-Addar kübü Dokpa Beth-Horon,
hatü ha kübü Mediterranean yungching kü leanshi apshaphi kü Mikhmethath thahshi nyuteke; hatü hatouei heongphi kü viongü Taanath-Shiloh lemei peih-ei Janoah heongphi ngoishi nyüke.
Hapheikü viongü shao Janoah kübü Ataroth hatü Naarah lemei yiüdaipü Jeriko kü hetei Jordan thahshi nyüke.
Tappuah kübü viongü Kanah yungyen heshüphi lemei heih-ei Mediterranean yungching kü leanshi nyüke. Hapayü Ephraim jat phang phang kü hanpü mükjüp nyuteke.
Hapa kü Manasseh phang kü shuohpü mükjüp kü Ephraim am phang kü hayaoha shuohpü jilathü hatü chingthüao omei nyuteke.
Shejao jomi Gezerlei nyupü Kanan am nechangtük; shinnyih thahshi Ephraim nanglakthü mü Kanan am nyunyüpeih shejao aanyak kei dou dükhüei angnyüpeih.

Hapheikü Manasseh jat kü kahdok hanteke; mehenangkü büpayü Josephei hashongpa nyuteke. Manassehlei hashongpa Makir, Gileadei chepa kü Jordan kü heongphi Gilead hatü Bashan hanteke; mehenangkü büpayü hampa meipü nyuteke,
hatü aopü Manasseh jat kü Abiezer, Helek, Asriel, Shekhem, Hepher hatü Shemida phangthü kü kahdok hanteke. Hathüyü Josephei cheha Manasseh kü phaakpü baha hapeüthü hanpü khih.

Shaang Manassehlei cheha Makir, Makirlei cheha Gilead, Gileadei cheha Hepher, Hepherlei cheha Zelophehadei baha hapeüthü nenyu, shejao yiükhathü mon nyu, hatü hathüyü büpalei yiükhathülei men khih: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah hatü Tirzah.
Jomi ngongpa Eleazar hatü Nunei cheha Joshua hatü mübüthü touei peiyei, “Hamei jeihinaüthü mü chemi ham kao mükjüp shuohhen
Jordan apshaphi Gilead hatü Bashan nyi mü Manasseh jati kahdok phaihan an dangteke;
Mehenangkü Manassehlei yiükhathüi bahathü kei mükjüp dangteke. Gilead kahdokü aodaipü Manasseh phangthü kü shuohteke.
Manassehlei kahdokü Asher kübü Shekhem heongphi Mikhmethath ngoishi nyu; hapheikü hatoueipü viong pehephi kübü shadaipü En-Tappuah shennyakthü nyushing omei nyuteke.
Tappuah kahdokü Manassehlei omei nyu, shejao Manasseh viong kü nyupü Tappuah jilayü Ephraim amei nyuteke.

Hapheikü viongü Kanah yungyen thahshi yiüei nyu. Yungyen pehephi kü nyupü jilathüyü Manassehlei kahdokei nyulangmao Ephraim amei jilathü nyuteke. Hapheikü Manasseh ammei viongü yungyen apshaphi aimü phungei heih-ei Mediterranean yungching kü leanshi nyuteke.
Pehephi kahdokü Ephraim amei hatü apshaphiyü Manasseh amei; heshüphilep kü yungchingü jomei viong; apshaphi kü Asher am thahshi, hatü heongphi kü Issakhar am ngoishi nyuteke.
Issakhar hi Asher amei kahdok kon mongei Manasseh amei Beth-Shean, Ibleam hatü Dor nanglakthü, Endor, Taanakh hatü Megiddo hatü jom kü ngeihpü shonpü jilathü nyuteke (jempabüyü Naphath nyüke).
Shejao Manasseh ami hathü jilathü kü nyupü nanglakthü nechangtükaok, hanangkü Kanan ami nedoh-i hapa kahdok kü nyuei dai.
Shejao mechem Israel am wong koh-ei leipa, jomi Kanan am kemei nechangtüki jom shingvaishi ngaüngei dou dükhü.
Josephei hühihathüi Joshua kü, “Mehekei nüngi ham kü kahdok mükjüp phaihan hük mon yahphopa? Hamü shennyak longi ahshi nyüke; mehenangkü
Joshua-i jangei, “Am shennyak longi ahdaijema hatü Ephraim phaüshang kahmük am kü longi maandaijema, Perizz hatü Rephaim phaü ami aongei daühahtuh” shei e.

Josephei hühihathüi jangei e, “Phaüshang kahmükü ham shingvaishi nechangang; mehenangkü Kanan am üamphong Beth-Shean hatü hapalei chingthü, hatü Jezreel kahji kü nyunya, jom peülei nyiam koyei khari nyüke”.
Shejao Joshua-i Joseph phang Ephraim hatü Manasseh kü, “Amü shennyak longi ahshi hatü wong kohshi nyüke. Amü kahdok phaihan hük mon danghen nevai,

shejao phaüshang kahdokao ammei vaihen, hapayü phaü mon vailangmao ammi phaü daüeitüktü viong dohpü thahshi yahtuh; mehenangkü nyiami lingpü koyei khari nyulangmao hatü jom wong kohlangmao ami Kanan am changtükaokhen” shei eteke.
Hapheikü Israel am khong kemei Shilohlei thai, hatü halei ashakshem veteke. Jomi vehok neü, hatü kahdok jom phangkü tuh.
Israel am khongkü shao kahdok mükjüp mangdangpü jat nyet nyuteke.
Hanangkü Joshua-i Israel am kü, “
Jat ieyei kübü shennyak jem baong jetuh. Ngei jomphong phaümük doknüng shomhen, hatü jom peüi mükjüp meshük yahhüpa ha nih-ei nyanghen hatü jom peü ngei touei nyokei leikahen.
Jomi kahdokü shing nyet vaishi hanhen, Judah amü jomei kahmük pehephi kü-üng nyuhen, hatü Joseph amü jomei kahdok apshaphi kü-üng nyuhen.
Kahdok shing nyet vaishi hanpü nang meishi nih-ei nyangtü ngei touei hathü deiyei haütü
Shejao Levi amü am kei kahdok nedanghen; mehenangkü jomei mükjüpü
Shennyakthüi phaümük doknüng layaongei daishingkü Joshua-i jom kü, “Daituh hatü phaümük dokei leikei hatü hapa nih-ei nyangtuh. Hapheikü ngei touei nyokei leikei hatü ngei am shing
Hanangkü shennyakthü layaongei kahmük doknüng dai. Jomi phaishuw kü hapa nang nih-ei shing nyet kübü jilathü nyangtü Joshua yemei Shiloh paümtapei lei.
Hahepak kü Joshua-i Shilohlei
Benjamin phang phang aimü phong hetteke. Jom kü hanpü kahdokü Judah hatü Joseph jat nyi aa kü nyu:
Apshaphi kü jomei viongü Jordan mü pangei heihpü apshaphi Jeriko kahshong peih-ei phaüshang kahmük heshüphi kü heih-ei Beth-Aven yingnyü kü leanshi nyu.
Hatoueipü Luz (hapayü Bethel) kahshong pehephi homei maipa Beth-Horon pehephi kahshang kü Ataroth-Addar thahshi shaei nyu.

Hapheikü shao viong lebü lemei daipeyü Beth-Horon mü khangteishi nyupü pehe philei nyupü kahshang kübü pehephi kü heshü lemei nyokei lei, hatü hapayü Judah amei jila Kiriath Baal (hapayü Kiriath-Jearim) kü peiyei nyu. Hapayü heshüphi viong lem nyu.
Pehephi kü viongü Kiriath-Jearim haolei pangei Neptoah yung bhaoshing kü peiteke.
Viongü Rephaim kahji apshaphi Ben-Hinnom kahji kü dangteishi kahshangla sheetei sha, hatü shao viongü Jebus amei kahshong pehephi kü Hinnom kahji thahshi shadaipü En-Rogel ngoishi nyu.
Hapayü shao apshaphi kü nyokei En-Shemesh hatü Adummimei aongpü lem kü khangpü Geliloth thahshi, hatü Reubenei cheha Bohan Yaong thahshi nyu.
Hapayü Beth-Arabah kahshong apshaphi kübü nedoh-i heihpü Arabah thahshi yiüei nyu.
Hapayü shao Beth-Hoglah kahshong apshaphi kübü heihdaipü Jordan yungsho kü Dipü Yungching apshaphi yungnuk kü peiyei nyu. Hapayü pehephi viong nyuteke.
Heongphi kü Jordan yungyen mü jomei viong nyu. Hapayü Benjamin jat kü phang phang aimü hanteipü viong lemthü nyu.
Benjamin jat kü phang phang aimü dangpü chingnyüthüyü hathü nyuteke: Jeriko, Beth-Hoglah, Emek-Keziz,
Beth-Arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,
Avvim, Parah, Ophrah,
Kephar-Ammoni, Ophni hatü Geba jila anpünyi mü jomei chingthü nyuteke.
Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,
Mizpeh, Kephirah, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,
Zela, Haeleph, Jebus amei chingnyü (hapayü Jerusalem), Gibeah hatü Kiriath jila anpüali mü jomei chingthü nyu. Hathüyü Benjamin jat phang phangei mükjüp nyuteke.
Nyipabü phongü Simeon am jat phang phang aimü hetteke; jomei mükjüpü Judah amei kahdok mong kü nyuteke.
Hapa kü Beer-sheba, Sheba, Moladah,
Hazar-Shual, Balah, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,
Ziklag, Beth-Markaboth, Hazar-Susah,
Beth-Lebaoth, hatü Sharuhen: jilathü anpüjem mü jomei chingthü omei nyuteke;
Ain, Rimmon, Ether hatü Ashan: jilathü ali mü jomei chingthü omei nyuteke,
hatü Baalath-Beer, Negeb leipü Ramah thahshi shonei nyupü jila hatü chingthü peü omei nyu. Hapayü phang phang aimü Simeon am jatei mükjüp nyu.
Simeon jatei mükjüpü Judah amei kahdok kübü hanei shuoh; mehenangkü Judah amei kahdokü longi longshi nyu. Hanangkü Simeon amü Judah amei kahdok mong kü mükjüp dangteke.
Jempabü phongü Zebulun am jat kü phang phang aimü hetteke. Jomei mükjüp viongü Sarid ngoishi;
hatü hapa viongü heshüphi lemei ongei Maralah ngoishi, hatü Dabbesheth kü leanei, hatü Jokneam heongphi kahji ngoishi nyu.
Sarid kübü viongü heongphi lemei heih-ei Khisloth-Tabor ngoishi, hatü haleipü Daberath hatü Japhia thahshi nyu.
Heongphi kü haleipü nedoh-i shadaipü Gath-Hepher hatü Eth-Kazin, hatü Rimmonei yiüpü lem kü Neah philei lepei leishi nyu.
Apsha philei viongü Hannathon lemei nyokei leiyei Iphtah-el kahji mü doh-ei nyu.
Ha mü chemi Kattath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah, hatü Bethlehem omei jilathü anpünyi mü jomei chingthü omei nyuteke.
Hapayü Zebulun jat amei mükjüp phang phang aimü dangpü jila hatü chingthü khih.
Alipabü phongü Issakhar jat kü phang phang aimü hetteke.
Jomei kahdokü Jezreel, Kesulloth, Shunem,
Hapharaim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kishion, Ebez,
Remeth, En-Gannim, En-Haddah, hatü Beth Pazzez nyuteke.
Jomei viongü Tabor, Shahazumah hatü Beth-Shemesh kü leanshi, hatü Jordan mü doh-ei jilathü anpüvok mü jomei chingthü omei nyu.
Hapayü Issakhar jati phang phang aimü mükjüp dangpü jila hatü chingthü khih.
Ngapabü phongü Asher jat kü phang phang aimü hetteke.
Jomei viongü Helkath, Hali, Beten, Akhshaph,
Allammelekh, Amad, hatü Mishal omei nyu. Heshüphi kü viongü Karmel hatü Shihor-Libnath kü leanshi nyu.
Hapayü shao heongphi kü Beth-Dagon lemei nyokei leiyei Zebulun hatü Iphtah-el kahji kü leanshi, hatü apshaphi kü Beth-Emek hatü Neiel kü leanshi hatü Kabul kü laknyong lemei peih-ei yiüshi nyu.
Hapayü shao Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, Kanah hatü Longpü Sidon thahshi nyu.
Hapheikü viongü Ramah lemei nyokei leiyei penyü showtükpü Tyre chingnyü ngoishi; hapheikü viongü Hosah lemei nyokei leiyei Mediterranean yungching kü leanshi nyu.
Hapa kü Mahalab, Akhzib, Ummah, Aphek, hatü Rehob: jilathü hapünyi mü jomei chingthü omei nyuteke.
Hapayü Asher jati phang phang aimü mükjüp dangpü jila hatü chingthü khih.
Vokpabü phongü Naphtali jat kü phang phang aimü hetteke.
Jomei viongü Heleph hatü Zaanannim longkham pünyü kübü Adami-Nekeb hatü Jabne-el homei heihdaipü Lakkum thahshi heih-ei Jordan kü leanshi nyu.
Hapa viongü Aznoth-Tabor homei heshü lemei heih-ei Hukkok ngoishi nyu. Pehephi kü Zebulun, heshüphi kü Asher hatü heongphi kü Jordan kü leanshi nyu.
Penyü showtükpü chingnyüthüyü Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Khinnereth,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edrei, En-Hazor,
Iron, Migdal-el, Horem, Beth-Anath hatü Beth-Shemmesh nyuteke. Jilathü anpüshü mü jomei chingthü omei nyuteke.
Hapayü Naphtali jati phang phang aimü mükjüp dangpü jila hatü chingthü khih.
Nyetpabü phongü Dan jat kü phang phang aimü hetteke.
Jomei kahdokü Zorah, Eshtaol, Ir-Shemesh,
Shaalabbin, Aijalon, Ithlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Bene-Berak, Gath-Rimmon,
Me-Jarkon hatü Joppa lemei meepü Rakkon omei nyu.
Shejao Dan ami jom kü hanshuohpü kahdok neyah-aokpü nangkü jomi Leshemei aongei jom mü hokei shennyakthü jütüktü kahdok yah. Halei jom chingchingei nyu, hatü hapa shing kü jomei bü men Dan shei men.
Hapayü Dan jati phang phang aimü mükjüp dangpü jila hatü chingthü khih.
Mechem jomi mükjüp vaishi kahdok hanteiyei tempa, Israel ami jom mü chemi Nunei cheha Joshua kao mükjüp hük han.
i epü keiha, jomi büpa kü büpai yiüpükei, phaüshang kahmük Ephraimei Timnath-Serah shei epü jila shuoh, hatü büpai ching agei halei nyu.
Hapayü ngongpa Eleazar hatü Nunei cheha Joshua hatü Israel jat mükhiphang ieyei kübü mübüthüi phongyomei
Hapheikü
“Ngei Mosa homei epü keiha,
shennyak hanei-i nenyingi ngangahük kü shennyak hük jütükjü büpa halei daiyei bhüh yempü am kübü yanghen shingvaishi shojo ching jeyei tuhhen etuh” shei e.

Shennyak jütükpü shennyaki hathü shojo ching pe shadenei yaonghen, hatü halei nyupü behethü kü mehe vampa, ha nang nih-ei ehen; hapheikü ching mongei müei shühen, hatü büpa kü shing hük shuoh-ei jom mü nyuhen.
Bhüh yempü ami büpa jühen changei peilangmao jomi hapa shennyak yepei neshuohhen; mehenangkü büpai laophülei chingyowpa nenyingi jütükteke hatü shelei nedanteipü meheyao neshiü.

Hapa shennyakü khong touei shah mangphen thahshi hatü ha hepak kü chongphopü ngongpa mangdi thahshi büpa hapa chingei nyuhen. Hapheikü büpa laophülei shem yemei mepa shing leipü daipa, halei nyokei leihen aok.
Hanangkü jomi phaüshang kahdok Naphtali kü Galilei Kadesh, hatü phaüshang kahdok Ephraimei Shekhem, hatü phaüshang kahdok Judahlei Kiriath-Arba (hapayü Hebron) jeyei tuh.
Jordan yungdangei Jeriko heongphi lemei Reuben jat amei kahji yingnyülei Bezer, Gad amei kahdok kü Gileadei Ramoth, hatü Manasseh amei kahdok kü Bashanei Golan shei jeyei tuh.
Israel am nevaijü lakei loipü am üpai nenyingi hanei am jütükhenshang hathü shojo ching hükei daiyei nyuhen, hatü khong touei yaongei shah mangphen thahshi bhüh yempü ami büpa jühen neaok.
Hahepak kü Levi phangthü kü mübüthü ngongpa Eleazar hatü Nunei cheha Joshua hatü Israel jat kü phang phang kü mübüthü touei peiyei,
jomi Kanan kahdok Shilohlei hathü kü, “
Hanangkü
Shongpü phongü Kohath am phang kü hetteke. Aaron ngongpalei hühihathü Levi am kü Judah jat Simeon hatü Benjamin amei kahdok kübü jila anpüjem shuoh.
Aopü Kohathlei hühihathü kü Ephraim, Dan hatü bhaosheipü jat Manasseh jatthü phang kübü jila an shuoh.
Gershonei hühihathü kü phang phang aimü Issakhar, Asher, Naphtali hatü Bashanei nyupü bhaosheipü Manasseh jatthü phang kübü jila anpüjem shuoh.
Merarilei hühihathü kü phang phang aimü Reuben, Gad hatü Zebulun jatthü leipü jila anpünyi shuoh.
Hanangkü Mosa homei
Judah hatü Simeon jat nyi kübü shuohpü kahdok hathü khih,
hatü hathü jilathüyü Aaronei hühihathü Levi am phang Kohath kübü phaakpüthü kü shuoh; mehenangkü shongpü phongü jom kü hetteke.
Jomphongi jom kü Judah amei phaüshang kahmükei Kiriath-Arba (hapayü Hebron) hatü ha kü shinpü phaümük yemhah shing omshi shuohteke. (Arbayü Anakim amei chebü nyuteke).
Shejao chingnyü kü shinpü kah hatü chingthüyü jomi Jephunnehlei cheha Kaleb kü shuoh.
Jomi Hebron (Shojo ching khongkü hük) mü lenei ngongpa Aaronei hühihathü kü yemhimak het hahhen phaümük omshi Libnah,
Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juttah hatü Beth-Shemesh shei hapa jat nyi kübü jila kukshü shuohteke.
Benjamin amei kahdok kübü jom kü Gibeon, Geba,
Anathoth hatü Almon mü yemhimak kü het ühhen phaümük hatü jila ali omshi shuoh.
Aaronei hühihathü kü jilathü mü yemhimak het hahshing phaümük omshi anpüjem nyu.
Levi am phang aopü Kohathlei hühihathü kü Ephraim jat amei kahdok kübü jilathü hanshuohteke.
Ephraim phaüshang kahdokei jomi Shekhem, (Shojo ching khongkü hük) hatü Gezer,
Kibzaim hatü Beth-Horon shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila ali omshi shuohteke.
Jomi Dan jat amei kahdok leipü Elteke, Gibbethon,
Aijalon, hatü Gath-Rimmon shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila ali omshi dangteke.
Bhaosheipü Manasseh jat leipü jomi Taanakh hatü Gath-Rimmon shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila nyi omshi shuoh.
Hathü jila an hatü yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük peü aopü Kohathlei hühihathü kü shuoh.
Levi am phang Gershonei hühihathü kü bhaosheipü Manasseh jat ami Bashan leipü Golan (Shojo ching khongkü hük) hatü Be-Eshterah shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila nyi omshi shuoh.
Issakhar amei kahdok kübü Kishion, Daberath,
Jarmuth hatü En-Gannim shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila ali omshi shuoh.
Asher amei kahdok kübü Mishal, Abdon,
Helkath hatü Rehob shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila ali omshi shuoh.
Naphtali amei kahdok kübü Galil leipü Kedesh, (Shojo ching khongkü hük), Hammoth-Dor hatü Kartan shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila jem omshi shuoh.
Gershonei hühihathüi jila peüshep anpüjem mü yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük omshi dangteke.
Levi am phang aopü Merarilei hühihathüi Zebulun amei kahdok kübü Jokneam, Kartah,
Dimnah hatü Nahalal shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila ali omshi shuoh.
Reuben amei kahdok kübü Bezer, Jahzah,
Kedemoth hatü Mephaath shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila ali omshi shuoh.
Gad amei kahdok kübü Gilead leipü Ramoth (Shojo ching khongkü hük), Mahanaim,
Heshbon hatü Jazer shei yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük mü jila ali omshi shuoh.
Aopü Levi am phang Merarilei hühihathüi jila anpünyi dangteke.
Israel amei lak kübü Levi ami yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük omshi dangpü jilathü peüshep pinyipüshet nyuteke.
Jila ieyei kü yemhimak yemhah shing phaümük shonei nyu; hapa keiha jila peü kü nyu.

Chebü chepa kü lahpükei
i Israel am phang kü lahpü meipüthü hükao neshai-i peü jiüei dhaümteke.
Hapheikü Joshua-i Reuben, Gad hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh jat nyükei jomphong kü,
Nyuyang kübü shaang thahshi kü ammi ammei jeihinaüthü mechemao netuhphong, shejao

Hapheikü Joshua-i jom kü moihimantü leishih, hatü jom jomei shemei leidai.
Bhaosheipü Manasseh jat kü Mosai Bashanei kahdok shuoh, hatü bhaosheipü jat kü Joshua-i Jordan yung heshüphi lemei jeihinaüthü mü kahdokü shuohteke. Mechem Joshua-i jom leishihpa, büpai jom kü,
“Mop longi koei yemhimak longi müei, hon, ngin, melangnyiam, nyiam hatü ashakviha longi koei shemei leituh, hatü vepa leipü aetpü mopthü ammei jeihinaü mü hanteituh” shei moihimanei etü leishihteke.
Hanangkü Reuben, Gad hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh am Israel am mü yanei Kanan kahdok Shiloh kübü
Mechem jom leiyei Kanan kahdok Jordan yopailei Geliloth ngoipa, hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh jat, Reuben hatü Gad jatthüi Jordan heshüphi kü moidü longpü hük ling.
Mechem jomi Israel kahdok lemei Jordan yopailei Kanan viong Gelilothlei moidü hük lingteke shei Israel ami danpa,
Israel am khong kemei Shilohlei jom mü khüei hokhen thaiteke.
Hahepak kü Israel ami Gilead kahdokei bhaosheipü Manasseh, Reuben, Gad jatthü touei ngongpa Eleazarlei cheha Phinehas shom.
Büpa mü jomi Israel jatthü mükhiphang hanpü ieyei kübü mübü hükbaong jeyei jom an shomteke.
Mechem jomi Gilead kahdokei heih-ei bhaosheipü Manasseh jat, Reuben hatü Gad jatthü mü pongteipa, jomi hathü kü,
Peorlei nyushi thahpü mangi mong nehamang je?

Ammei kahdok nedaüang shei deihjema,
Mechem Zerahlei cheha Akhani douthü kemei mangtüktuh shei epü nebangi dükpai mang thahpa, hapa mangi Israel am khong kemei neponghah-angpü je? Büpalei mang nangkü büpa mon nemahangpih’ ” shei e.

Ammi
Hapheikü Joshua-i Israel am kemei Shekhemei thaihü; büpai Israel am behethü, mübüthü, shahphenbüthü hatü lakchongbüthü kemei nyük, hatü jom peü Kahvang touei pei.
Joshua-i nanglakthü peü kü e, “
Shejao ngei ammei pa Abraham hapa kahdok yungdang leipü yahei Kanan kahdokei müei leiyei büpa kü hühihathü longi shuohpeih. Ngei büpa kü Isak;
hatü Isak kü Jakob hatü Esau shuohpeih. Ngei Esau kü phaüshang kahdok Seir shuohpeih, shejao Jakob hatü chehathü kemei Ijiplei yiüdaipeih.
Hapheikü ngei Mosa hatü Aaron nyi shompeih, hatü Ijip am kü ngei mehe dükshuohpa, ha chami jom hanghihüpeih; hapheikü ngei am müei daipeih.
Mechem ngei ammei bühipa Ijip leipü müei daipa, Ijip ami koyei khari hatü veshanthü Hakla Yungching thahshi ambü ampa kü changei shapeih.
Mechem jomi
Jordan heong philei nyupü Amon amei kahdokei ngei am müei leipeih. Jomi am mü hokteke shejao ammei lak kü ngei jom shuohpeih. Ngei am toueipü jom mahtükpeih, hatü ami jomei kahdok yahpeih.
Mechem Moab ongpa, Zipporlei cheha Balaki Israel am khüei hokhen tempa, büpai am kü thaüvaühen shingvaishi Beorlei cheha Balaam nyükhen shompeih.
Shejao ngei Balaami epü kü nebang; hatü büpai leiyei am kü moihimanpeih; hapakei ngei büpalei lak leipü am yangei tuhpeih.”
Hapheikü am Jordan yung homei Jerikolei peipeih. Amor am, Perizz am, Kanan am, Hit am, Girgash am, Hiv am, hatü Jebus ami keiha Jeriko amiyao am mü hokpeih, shejao ngei ammei lak kü jom shuohpeih.
Ngei am toueipü jom hatü Amor am ongpa nyi changtükhen shingvaishi ngei am she kü nyahngi shompeih; hapayü ammei yani nevaijü lahhilaongi nevaipih.
Ammi mechemao lem-ow netükpü kahdok hatü nyüei nelingpü chingnyüthü ngei am kü shuohpeih, hatü shaang amphong halei nyunyüke; ammi nesheipü kü haleipü nyalingngupai hatü olive betjük ammi hahnyüke.

Nanglakthüi Joshua kü, “Hami
Hanangkü ha nyih Joshua-i nanglakthü mü vangteishuwteipü ling, hatü Shekhemei büpai shahkungnyüthü lingei shuoh.
Joshua-i hathü shah Kahvangei shahkungnyü laitap kü nyangteke, hatü büpai yaong longpü hük yah-ei
Joshua-i nanglakthü peü kü, “Veituh, hapa yaongü jen kü denpü hük.
Hathü ekempheikü Joshua-i nanglakthü laophü laophülei kahdok yemei leishihtük.
Hapheikü
hatü jomi büpa Gaash Kahshang apshaphi phaüshang kahdok Ephraimei laophülei mükjüp kahdok Timnah-Serahlei mahng vüphong.
Israel ami Joshua yemmü nyupü thahshi, hatü Joshua phei kü nyupü behethü üami Israel am shingvaishi

Israel ami Ijip leipü koei anpü Josephei vang Shekhemei cheha Hamorlei hapeüthü leipü Jakobi lop kho hük shuohtü shakpü kahdok Shekhemei dungphongteke. Hapayü Josephei hühihathülei mükjüp kahdok vaiteke.
Aaronei cheha Eleazar-ao didai, hatü büpalei cheha Phinehas kü shuohpü phaüshang kahdok Ephraimei Gibeah jilalei jomphongi büpalei mang vüphong.
Joshua didaipheikü Israel ami
“Judah am shong daituh; ngei jomei lak kü hapa kahdok shuohtüktih” shei
Judah ami jomei jeihinaü Simeon am kü, “Ham kü shuohpü kahdokei chemi aongshah, hatü Kanan am khüei hokshah, shao hamao am mü aongkahen” shei e. Hanangkü Simon am jom mü dai.
Hapheikü Judah am aongei hok, hatü
Halei jomi Adoni-bezek heüei büpa khüei hok, hatü Kanan hatü Perizz am neütük.
Adonibezek laongei lüdai, shejao jomphongi büpa kü changei daiyei yep, hatü lakphiennyü hatü laphiennyü dehtükteke.

Hahepak kü Adoni-bezeki, “Ngelei nükdü phangei ongthü pejempüan jomei lakphiennyü hatü laphiennyü dehtüktü nükkuk homei hahshi nyuhampeih. Ngei mehe hathü kü dükshuohpa, shaang Kahvangi ha ngei kü nyokei yahphopü khih” shei e. Jomphongi büpa Jerusalemei yah-ei lei, hatü büpa halei didai.
Judah ami Jerusalem ching hah, hatü omei yahteke. Jomi haleipü shennyakthü jütüktü ching kü aw haptük.
Hapheikü Judah ami phaüshang kahmük Negeb hatü pehephi kahshangla kü nyupü Kanan am mü hokhen dai.
Judah ami Hebronei nyupü Kanan am mü (shelei jom kü Kiriath-Arba shei nyükhamteke) hokhen dai, hatü Sheshai, Ahiman hatü Talmai am neütükteke.
Haleipü shao Judah ami Debir (shelei jom kü Kiriath-Sepher shei nyükhamteke) ching hahhen aong.
Hahepak kü Kalebi, “Üpai Kiriath-Sepher ching hah-ei neüaokhenshang ngelei yiükha Akhsah mü büpa shem yemhühen” shei e.
Kalebei chenaü Kenazlei cheha Othnieli hapa ching hah-ei neüteke. Hanangkü Kalebi büpalei yiükha Akhsah büpa kü doi deishihteke.

Mechem nyih hük pinnyü Othniel am shemei yiük dhiüpa, Othnieli pinnyü kü ampa kü kahdok yükütuh shei nyeanteke. Mechem pinnyü gadu dokshang leipü shühjapa, Kalebi pinnyü kü, “Nüng mehe napa?” shei phe.
“Ngei kü thintho hük yahshih; nüngi ngei kü yahphopü Negebü yung neshiüpü kahdok khih; hanangkü ngei kü yungkukthü yahshih” shei eteke. Hanangkü Kalebi yungkuk dokpa hatü maaipa nyiphen shuoh.
Mosalei shembünyülei chepalei hühihathü Ken am Jeriko leipü Arad yopai leipü Negebei nyupü Judah amei koshoya kahdokei nyuhen shingvaishi Judah am mü chemi aong. Halei jom Amalek am mü nyuteke.
Judah am chenaü Simeon am mü aongei Zephahlei nyupü Kanan am neütük, hatü hapa chingnyü chemjalak kü mangtük. Hanangkü hapa ching kü Hormah shei nyük.
Judah ami Gaza, Ashkelon hatü Ekron chingnyüthü mü kahmükao omei yah.
Mosai lahpükei Hebronü Kaleb kü shuoh, hatü büpai haleipü Anakei chehathü phang jem changtük.
Shejao Benjamin ami Jerusalemei nyupü Jebus shennyakthü nechangtük; hanangkü ha nyih mebü Benjamin amü Jebus shennyakthü mü shinnyih ngoishi chemi nyunyüke.
Ephraim hatü Manasseh jat nyi-i Bethel (shelei hapa kü Luz shei nyükhamteke) chingnyü hah, hatü
Mechem jomi Bethel kahdok kü gühshuk shompa,
gühshuk peipüthüi chingnyü mongeipü shennyak hük vamja-i ee, hatü jomi büpa kü, “Ham kü hapa chingnyü mongei shühen lem hushih hatü hami nüng kü meheyao ten nedükpih” shei e.
Hanangkü büpai jom kü chingei aonghen lem hushuoh, hatü jomi hapa chingnyü hah, shejao jomi hapa shennyak hatü jom shem am peü yangei tuh.
Hanangkü hapa shennyak Hit kahdokei daiyei chingnyü hük ling, hatü hapa kü Luz shei men, hatü shinnyih thahshi hapa men nyüknyüke.
Manasseh jati Beth-Shean, Taanakh, Dor, Ibleam hatü Megiddo chingnyüthü kü nyupü nanglakthü nechangtük; Kanan am nedoh-i halei nyu.
Mechem Israel am wong koh-ei leipa, jomi Kanan am kü ngaüngei douwong dükhü shejao kahdok kübü payü nechangtük.
Ephraim jati Gezer chingnyü kü nyupü Kanan am nechangtük shejao Kanan amao jom mü chemi Gezerlei angteke.
Zebulun jati Kitron hatü Nahalol chingnyü nyi kü nyupü nanglakthü nechangtük, shejao jom mü chemi Kanan amao angteke, hatü ngaüngei jomi dou dükhü.
Asher jati Akko, Sidon, Ahlab, Akhzib, Helbah, Aphek hatü Rehob chingnyüthü kü nyupü nanglakthü nechangtük.
Asher ami halei nyupü Kanan am nechangtükpü nangkü jom mü chemi angteke.
Naphtali jati Beth-Shemesh hatü Beth-Anath chingnyü nyi kü nyupü nanglakthü nechangtük, shejao halei nyupü Kanan am mü chemi nyu, shejao ngaüngei jomei dou dükhü.
Amor ami Dan jat kahjilei neyühah-i phaüshang kahmükei tuh.
Amor ami nedoh-i Aijalon, Shaalbim hatü Heres Kahshangei nyu, shejao mechem Ephraim hatü Manasseh jat nyi wong koh-ei leipa, Amor amü ngaüngei jomei dou dükhü.
Amor amei viongü Akrabbim lembaong kübü aongpü Sela peih-ei nyuteke.
Shaang
Ammi hapa kahdok kü nyupü nanglakthü mü vangpüshuwpü teling. Ammi jomei moidüthü bentüktuh shei etepih, shejao ammi ngei epü nebang. Mehekei ammi hapakei dükpa?
Hanangkü shaang ngei am kü eshah, ngei hathü am toueipü nechangtükhen, shejao jom ammei vemang leihen, hatü jomei kahvangthü ammei aethitai vaihen” shei eteke.
Mechem
Hanangkü hapa shing kü Bokhim shei men, hatü hatouei jomi
Mechem Joshua-i Israel am yanshihpa, jom laophü laophülei mükjüp kahdok yahhen leikemteke.
Joshua yemmü nyupü thahshi hatü Israel am shingvaishi
Nunei cheha Joshua,
Hanangkü jomi büpa Gaash Kahshang apshaphi phaüshang kahmük Ephraim kü büpalei mükjüp kahdok Timnah-Heres shei epü shingei mahng vüteke.
Hapa denshat kübü shennyakthü peü didai, hatü denja pheihathüi Israel am shingvaishi
Hahepak kü Israel ami
Jomi
Jomi
Hanangkü Israel am khüei
Israel am vehok kü daishan ieyei
Hahepak kü
Shejao jomi shahphenbüthülei shah-ao nebang, shejao jom nying kü lebü kahvangthü mü mükbongjuyungei hathü kü khümteke.
Mechem
Shejao mechem shahphenbüthü didaikempa, jomi lebü kahvangthü phei müei hathü kü khümei jomei bühipa mao nemeipüba lemnyong kü kam, hatü nemeipü lem, douten yakphonghen jomi nemong.
Hanangkü
Joshua didaishingkü tuhphongpü jatthü hükao ngei jom toueipü nechangtükpih.
Chebü chepa kei ngelei lem kü nemühen hi mühenshang dokhen shingvaishi ngei hathü noteihen” shei eteke.
Hanangkü
Hathüyü Kanan kü vehok hokpü chemao mangnyingpü Israel am kü dokhen shingvaishi
Büpai hathüyü Israel am denja pheihathü shelei vehok hokpü nenyingpüthü kü nyuhhen shingvaishi dükteke.
Hathüyü Philistia am vanglem lempüthü nga: Kanan am, Sidon am, Hiv am peü Lebanon Kahshang kü Baal-hermon kahshang kübü Lebo Hamath thahshi nyupüthü shiüteke.
Jomü Mosa homei chebü chepa kü
Hanangkü Israel ami Kanan am, Hit am, Amor am, Perizz am, Hiv am hatü Jebus am mü nyu,
hatü jomi jomei yiük yah, hatü jomei yiükhathü doi deishih hatü jomei kahvangthü kü khümteke.
Israel ami
Hanangkü
Shejao mechem Israel ami
lei laangha yiüei büpa kü bak, hatü büpa vehokei dai, hatü
Hanangkü Kenazlei cheha Othniel mangdi thahshi vangbong pinyi kahmük kü chingmeivangmei nyuteke.
Israel ami shao
Amon hatü Amalek am mü khaaitü büpai Israel am neütüktü jomi Jeriko ching omei yahlang.
Hanangkü Israel ami Moab am Eglon ongpa chongphoei vangbong anpüshet nyuteke.
Shejao mechem Israel ami
Shaang Ehudi nyonghidah kü nah kohpü yanlu hük feet hük mü bhaoei ling, hatü büpai hapa lakdah philei ashak mongei phümteke.
Büpai Eglon ongpa kü bom shuoh; Eglonü longi nitshi nyuteke.
Ehudi hapa bom shuohpheikü büpai hapa kopüthü kü shemei leidaihen eteke.

Shejao Ehudi Gilgal yopai leipü yaongnaüya touei lei, hatü Eglon touei nyokei leiyei, “Oh Ongpa, ngei nüng kü ehen shahjo shahhing hük nyüpeih” shei e. Hanangkü ongpai chongphobüthü kü chem biendaishih shei eshuohpü nangkü jom peü vamdaikem.
Ongpa monha vüngmakpü jaandokpa ongshemei uoshi nyushingkü Ehudi büpa yopailei heihei, “Nüng kü Kahvang leipü shahjang hük nyüpeih” shei eshuohshingkü ongpai büpalei uoshing leipü yaongjashingkü,
Ehudi büpalei lakdahphi bhagphangei phümpü yanlu tukei ngaiyei ongpalei vom kü hümteke.
Yan hak mü metao omshi shüteke, hatü ngaümpheilei peiteke; Ehudi yan netuklang hatü ha cheüi jümlangteke.
hatü Ehud chingshelei vamtü shak lemei sha latphongtü lüdai.
Büpa lüdaipheikü chongphobüthü peiyei veishuohshingkü jaandokpa shemshathü küpei lattüktü eeteke. “Maaipa dungnukei shüei nyiumei nyaaishang” shei jomi etei.

Hanangkü jomi baong yemshing ngoishi danei nyuteke, shejao mechem büpai dungnuk sha ne-api nyudaishuohpa, jomi sabi yah-ei shem apei shüei veishuohshingkü jomei ongpa aangshungei diyei shükshi chongjateke.
Jom danei nyupü hepak kü Ehudü lüdaitü nyu. Büpa yaong lajei lemei heih-ei Seirah lemei lüdai.
Mechem büpa om leipa, büpai phaüshang kahmük Ephraimei amit vüng, hatü büpai mütü Israel am kahshang leipü leiteke.
“Ngei phei mükei! Mehenangkü
Hahepak kü jomphongi wong kohpü Moab veshanthü haja an hükshing jütük; shennyak hükao neyang.
Hapa nyih Israel ami Moab am neütük, hatü kahmük kü vangbong büali thahshi chingmeivangmei nyuteke.
Haphei kübü shahphenbüyü Anathlei cheha Shamgar nyuteke. Büpai Israel am yang, hatü büpai mohoh atpü lüngi Philistia am kho vok jüteke.
Ehud didaipheikü Israel ami shao
Hanangkü
Mehenangkü Jabinü nyiam khari kho shü angteke, hatü büpai Israel nanglakthü shangkü longi mangshi hatü nemei-i vangbong kukha thahshi vanglem lem. Hahepak kü Israel ami
Hahepak kü Lappidothlei chenyüha Deborahyü thibü nyuteke, hatü pinnyüi Israel amei shahphenteke.
Pinnyüi Ephraim amei phaüshang kahmük Ramah hatü Bethel nyi aa kübü Deborah amei palm pü phangei uoteihamteke, hatü Israel ami shahphenhahhen shingvaishi pinnyü touei peihamteke.
Nyih hük pinnyüi Naphtali kü nyupü Kadesh chingnyü leipü Abinoamei cheha Barak kü nyükei büpa kü, “
Jabinei veshan mübü Sisera, am khüei hokhen shingvaishi Kishon yungyenei büpalei koyei khari hatü veshanthü müei deiphahen, hatü ngei ammei lak kü büpa shuohhen.
Hahepak kü Baraki pinnyü kü, “Nüng ngei mü daiküjü mon ngei daihen hih, nüng ngei mü nedaiküjema, ngei nedaipih” shei e.
Deborah-i, “Meiteke” shei e. “Ngei nüng mü daishahma, shejao vehok aokpü menmeiyü nüngei nevaikahen; mehenangkü
Baraki Naphtali hatü Zebulun jat nyi kübü shennyak haja an nyük, hatü jom büpa phei müei dai, hatü Deborah-ao büpa mü dai.
Shaang, Ken am Heber, lebü Ken am, Mosalei cheshongpa Hobabei hühihathü mü yanei Kedesh yopailei Zaanannim püyingei ashakshem veteke.
Mechem Abinoamei cheha Barak Tabor Kahshangei aongteke shei Sisera-i danpa,
Sisera-i nyiam khari kho shü hatü büpa mü nyupü veshanthü peü nyükei Harosheth-Haggoyim kübü Kishon yungyen thahshi shom.
Hahepak kü Deborah-i Barak kü, “Daituh,
Mechem Baraki büpalei veshanthü mütü thepju kü heihpa,
Baraki kharithü hatü veshanthü Harosheth Haggoyim thahshi changtük. Siseralei veshanthü hükao ne-ao-i jütükkem.
Sisera nyemei daiyei Ken am Heberlei chenyüha Jaelei shemei peijateke; mehenangkü Hazor amei ong Jabin hatü Ken am Heber phang nyi aa kü chingmei nyu.
Jaeli Sisera mü pongteinüng heih, hatü büpa kü, “Longpüba, shem mongei shüdaikei, tenyem” shei e. Hanangkü büpa shem mongei shü hatü pinnyüi büpa kü ashaki jümtü jophong.
Hahepak kü büpai pinnyü kü, “Ngei yung leangke, yinghen yung yahshih” shei e. Pinnyüi amma shihpü phaishuw khong apei yinghen yung shuoh, hatü shao jotük.
Hahepak kü büpai pinnyü kü, “Shadenei yaongtuh, hatü shennyak hanei peiyei üpayao nyüla shei phephüjü neshiü shei etuh” shei eteke.
Sisera longi nyiupü nangkü shidai. Hahepak kü Jaeli kaoklak hatü pü noei nenmü shüei büpalei shangba kü hattü kahmongei dungtük hatü büpa didai.

Mechem Baraki Sisera yemei peijapa, Jael vamei büpa mü pongei, “Shükühümao, nüngi yempü shennyak huphüshah” shei e. Hanangkü büpa pinnyülei shemei shüei veishingkü shangba kü püi hattü Sisera jüei chongjateke.
Hanangkü ha nyih
Kanan ong Jabin mangjü thahshi Israel am wong kohpüba leiteke.
Hapa nyih Deborah hatü Abinoamei cheha Barak nyi-i hapa kesho lokteke:
“Mechem Israel am hokhen tempa,
nanglakthüi lanei shuohpeih;
Bangtuh, Oh ongpathü, kenhingei bangtuh,
Oh vanglem lempüthü!
hatü ngeü meipai kesho lokhen.
hatü Edom kahdok kübü vamei nüng daipa, kahdoknyü jenteke,
hatü kahdoknyü nyaüdai, hatü phumi vang keihüteke.
Sinailei vamei hupü
Anathlei cheha Shamgar hatü Jaelei nyihthü kü,
koyeithü kahdok homei nepeih,
yendaiouhampüthüi keülem kü daihampeih.
Israel amei jilathü vüngmaki leidaipeih,
Oh Deborah, nüng mangvam shekü;
Nüng Israel amei hümlungnyü vaishi vampeih.
Mechem Israel ami kahvang jathü jehahpa,
kahmük kü vehoki maei nyuteke,
Israel am shennyak haja pinyi khongkü vehok
phunglang nohen neshiüi leidai.
Ngelei mongdangü Israel am haüpü wongpüthü mü,
hatü lanei shuohpü nanglakthü mü nyuhampeih,
Hapa jung etuh, amphong gadu shola kü,
hatü ashak chetlüpü kü uopüthü,
hatü lem kü kampüthü.
Bangtuh! nyahhinyiu ngeü mü yungkuk shinei
hatü Israel hampathüi vehok neüpü jung enyüke.
chingnyü penyüsha thahshi peiteke.
Paotuh, paotuh, Deborah, paotuh, kesho loktuh!
Paotuh, Oh Barak, Abinoamei cheha,
shennyakthü wüpküpei mülangtuh.
Hahepak kü haüpü wongpüthü jomei mübüthü touei,
Jom Ephraim leipü kahjilei heih,
nüng pheikü Benjamin jat hatü hapa nanglakthü müteke.
Makir kübü mübüthü yiüteke,
hatü Zebulun leipü lakchongbüthü vamteke.
Issakhar kübü mübüthü Deborah mü dai,
Hih, Issakhar am Barak mü kahjilei mokteke.
Reuben ami shahphen neyah-aoki
mong üathamaei nyuteke.
Mehekei jom mithü ngaümpheilei nyupa?
Hih, Reuben jat hanteitü nyu;
jomi shahphen neyah-aoki mong üathamaei nyuteke.
Gad am jat Jordan heong philei nyu,
Dan am jahas touei nyu.
Asher jatü yungching yungkung kü nyuteke.
Shejao Zebulun hatü Naphtali am
nanglakthüi thepju kü yangnyu lanei shuohteke.
Taanakhlei, Megiddo yungyen touei ongpathü peiyei hokteke,
Kanan ongthü hokteke, shejao jomi hon hi ngin yah-ei neleiaok.
Vangsho lithilenthüi jom
kamshingkü Sisera khüei hokteke.
Kishon yung bhümei jom maoei shanlang,
Mokpü Kishon yungnyü büngi jom wong mü maoeishanlang.
Hahepak kü koyeithü phaukteiyaki,
kahdok kü la shoupei peiteke.
Meroz am thaüvaütüktuh, halei nyupüthü shahyaki
thaüvaütüktuh shei
Mehenangkü jomphongi
büpa khüambakei hokhen nepei.
Peü mü moihimanpeyü
ashak shemei nyupü Ken am Heberlei chenyüha Jael khih.
Sisera-i pinnyü kü yung yüteke,
shejao pinnyüi amma shuoh;
Pinnyüi nükshung kü amma cheü shihtü shuoh.
Pinnyüi lak phihükei phaaknyong,
lak hük lemei kaoklak noteke.
Pinnyüi Sisera kü hattü
büpalei shangjing ngümtük, pinnyüi büpalei shangba nihtük.
Büpa doei shateke;
büpa pinnyülei la tüngei shükteke;
Büpa doei shükpü shingei büpa di.
Siseralei hümlungnyüi ümha shaden homei vei;
Mükyang yungdaitü shadenei chiyei,
mehekei koyei leiküpü ladhaok ngeü nedannya;
mehekei om pheinya yo shei eteke.
Nyühathü khongkü peü mü
nahpü shennyaki pinnyü kü eteke,
Jomi vehok kü yahpü douhinang,
hatü veshan pabüm ieyei nela hük nevaijü nyi;
Sisera shing shemmei ashak,
hatü onglanyü shing üng kü ngeihhen hiupü ashak hanteiyei shiühen.
Hanangkü nüngei vepathü
hapakei mahkemhen, Oh Ongpa!
Shejao nüng kü bampüthü vanghenyü keiha nyahen!
Hatü kahdok kü bong pinyi thahshi chingmeivangmei nyu.”
Shao Israel nanglakthüi
Midian amü Israel am mü wong kohpüba nyuteke; hanangkü Israel amü Midian am kü nyemei kahshangthü kü hatü yaongsha kü joshing yemei joteke.
Mechem Israel ami sheili sheijahen, Midian am hatü Amalek am hatü heongphi kübü lebü jatthüi jom khüei hokhen peiteke.
Jomphongi jomei kahdokei peiyei baümtap vetü Gaza shinpü thahshi sheili kemei mangtük, hatü Israel am shingvaishi yemlem mi, mohoh, hatü gadu meheyao netuhphongi shemtük.
Jomphongü shaüshouk peipükei yemhimak hatü ashakshem koei pei; jom hatü ut ieyei neaoki pei, hatü kahmük kemei mangtük.
Midian am homei Israel am longi tao, hatü Israel ami
Hahepak kü Israel ami Midian am khüei
i Israel am kü thibü hük shomei jomphong kü, “
ngei amphong Ijip amei lak kübü, hatü am kü shüveipüthülei lak kübü yangpeih hatü ngei jom changtüktü am kü hapa kahdok shuohpeih.
Ngeiyü
Hahepak kü
lei phongshan büpa touei peiyei, “Wongkoh monglongpü hampa,
Gideoni jangei, “Shejao longpüba,
Hahepak kü
Gideoni jangei, “Shejao
i büpa kü, “Nüngi aokhen hih; mehenangkü ngei nüng mü nyukahen, hatü nüngi Midian am peü ngümtükhen” shei e.
Gideoni jangei, “Nüngi ngei kü bamei deihjema, ngei mü shah eteipeyü nüng khih shei nyinghen shingvaishi nyangeihepü hük hushih.
Ngei moila koei peiyei nüng touei mangshuoh thahshi nüng hatoueipü telüdai” shei e.
Hatü
Hanangkü Gideoni shemei leiyei yum cheha hük jü, hatü atta dok an yah-ei daw neshihpü aan lingteke. Büpai hapa phai mühdow kü shih, hatü haoyung dük hük kü shihtü koei daiyei hathü
lei phongshani büpa kü, “Phai hatü aan hapa yaong shangkü haütuh hatü ha shangkü haoyung langeishuoh” shei e. Gideoni hapakei dükteke.
Hahepak kü
Hapheikü mechem Gideoni hapayü
Shejao
Hatouei Gideoni
Ha ya
hatü hapa shangtao kü
Hanangkü Gideoni büpalei chongphobüthü jom an mütü
Mechem jom ching am dhomi lomi paoei veipa, Baal kahvangei moidü, hatü Asherah kahvangei lajei bentüktü halei vepü moidü shangkü nyipabü mohoh chebaong jakshi eeteke.
“Ha üpai dükpa?” shei jom jom phetei. Jomi yemshingkü Joashlei cheha Gideoni dükpü khih shei dangteke.
Hahepak kü ching ami Joash kü, “Anha hatouei müei deikei, jütükhen hih; mehenangkü büpai Baal kahvangei moidü hatü hatoueipü Asherah kahvangei lajei bentükteke” shei e.

Shejao Joash-i büpa mü shah dakteipüthü kü, “Amphongü Baal kahvang khüambakei yaonghen je? Amphongi büpa yanghen je? Üami büpa khüambakei yaongnya, vangngai shekü dikemhen. Baal-ao kahvang vaijema, büpa laophü nyingi nyemyang; mehenangkü bentükpü moidüyü büpalei khih” shei e.
Hanangkü ha nyih mü leitü Gideon kü, “Jerubbaal” shei nyük; mehenangkü Joash-i, “Baal kahvang büpa nyingi nyemyang, mehenangkü bentükpü moidüyü büpalei khih” shei eteke.
Hahepak kü Midian am, Amalek am hatü heongphi kübü jatthü kemei thaitü Jordan yungdang homei heih-ei Jezreel kahjilei baümtap veteke.
lei laangha Gideon kü pei, hatü büpai amit vüngei Abiezer am phang büpa phei mühen nyük.
Büpai Manasseh amei kahmük kemeilei phongmokbüthü shomei hokhen daikei shei nyük, hatü büpai Asher, Zebulun hatü Naphtali am peü touei phongmokbü shom hatü jomphongao büpa mü daiyei om.
Hahepak kü Gideoni Kahvang kü, “Israel am yanghen shingvaishi nüngi ngei noteihen hih shei epeih.

Meiteke, ngei nüng kü hahshü shingei inyaipü mimum haüshi tuhphahen; nepnüng dhom mü veishingkü mimum kü mon nyien hetei, lebü kahdok üvah-i chongküjema, nüngi epükei Israel amü ngei homei yanghen khih shei ngei nyinghen” shei eteke.
Hingmei-üng ha vam. Mechem Gideoni nepnüng dhom mü paoei hapa mimum yüpshuohpa, chilimji hük maei nyienyung vamteke.

Hahepak kü Gideoni Kahvang kü, “Chingmeilemlingei ngei kü mang tükshih; ngei shao shah hük eshah. Hapa mimumi-üng shao chem dokei veishah. Shaangü mimum mon üvah-i tuhphongtü kahdok mon shieyei tuhshih” shei e.
Ha ya Kahvangi hapakei dük: Mimum mon üvah-i tuhtü kahdok peü nyieni shiedaitü chongjateke.
Hapheikü Jerubbaal (hapayü Gideon) hatü büpalei veshanthü dhom mü lomi paoei Harod yungkukei baümtap ve, hatü Midian amei baümtapü Moreh Kahshang phangei kahji kü jom kü apshaphi lemei shiüteke.
i Gideon kü, “Midian am neühen shingvaishi nüng mü nyupü veshanthüyü ngei keyü ahshi ahteke; jomphongi jomei wongi neüpeih shei deihhen hatü ngei kü dhüm neshuohhen.
Üami nyemei deihnya, nyokei shemei leidaituh; aopüthü Gilead Kahshangei nyuhen eyeishuoh” shei e. Hanangkü haja kukha nyokei shemei leidaitü haja an mon aoteke.
Hahepak kü
Hanangkü Gideoni shennyakthü yungyenei müei yiü. Halei
Yei-i laiyei yingpüthü jom kho jem nyuteke, shejao aopüthü peü aümei shatü yingteke.
Hahepak kü
Hanangkü Gideoni jom kho jem mon büpa mü tuhtü lebüthü kemei jomi yahpü hahying hatü amitthü yahlangtü shemei nyokei leishihtük. Midian amei baümtapü jom phangkü kahjilei nyu.
Ha ya-üng
Nüngi hapa hahhen nyemjema, nüngei chongphobü Purah müei baümtapei yiütuh,
hatü jomphongi mehe eteikahen ha bangtuh, hatü hapheikü mon nüngi jom hahhen monglongkahen” shei e. Hanangkü Purah jiji vepathülei baümtap junghükphi thahshi yiü.
Midian am, Amalek am hatü heongphi kübü jat shennyakthü shoukthü kei kahjilei yaüshi hatü jomei utthüyü yungching bhihhiphang kei eeteke.

Mechem Gideoni hapa shing ngoipa, küphü hüki küphü hük kü mangh eteijapü büpai dan, hatü büpai mangh hük, “Barley aungi lingpü toilangpü aan hük ngowei shaei Midian amei baümtapei shüteke, hatü hapai baümtap kü sheü, hatü baümtap shakhimong leiyei bendai-i manghküpeih” shei ejapü danteke.
Hatü büpalei küphü hüki, “Hapayü lebü nevai, shejao Israel am Joashlei cheha Gideoni jen hahhen nang manghpü khih! Büpalei lak kü Kahvangi Midian am hatü veshanthü kemei shuohtükteke” shei ejateke.
Mechem Gideoni hapa mangh eteipü hatü hapa tetpü danpa, büpai
Büpai shennyak kho jem khong jem vaishi han, hatü jom peü kü amit hatü dük kong kü mongei nyak-aw hükbaong shihtü shuoh.
Büpai jomphong kü, “Mechem ngei baümtap jung hük ngoikahenshang, ngei kü veituh, hatü ngei mehe dük, hapakei düktuh.
Mechem ngei hatü ngei mü nyupüthüi amit vüngkahenshang amphongiyao baümtap shinei amit vüngtuh, hatü ‘
Hanangkü Gideon hatü büpa mü nyupü shennyak kho hük kemei baümtap jung phihükei nyak jiam shekü veyompüthü jeitei pheikü peiyei jomi amit vüng, hatü jomei lakei nopü dükthü bhaoteke,
hatü lebü khong kemei aihük mü dükteke. Jom peüi nyak-aw laknyong lemei no, hatü amit lakdah lemei notü, “
Mechem jomi laophü yaongpü shingei baümtap shinei yaongshi nyupa, baümtap mongeipü shennyakthü kemei nyemei vaüyaki nyaidaikem.
Mechem jomi amit kho jem vüngpa,
Hapheikü Naphtali, Asher hatü Manasseh shennyakthü kemei nyük, hatü jomphongi Midian am kü changei sha,

hatü Gideoni Ephraim phaüshang jatthü kemei kü phongmokbüthü shomei, “Peikei, hatü Midian am khüei hokshah, hatü Jordan yungyen kübü Beth-Barah yungyen thahshi tapshah” shei e. Hanangkü Ephraim am shennyakthü kemei nyükei Jordan yungyen kübü Beth-Barah yungyen thahshi tapteke.

Jomi Midian am mübü Oreb hatü Zeeb nyi yemmü yep. Jomi Orebü Oreb yaongei jü, hatü Zeebü Zeeb amei yiü bhitshingei jü. Jomi Midian am changei dai hatü Oreb hi Zeeb nyilei shangjing Jordan homei Gideon kü koei leijateke.
Hapheikü Ephraim ami Gideon kü, “Midian am mü hoknüng daishingkü mehekei nüngi ham kü nethongpa? Nüngi mehekei ham kü hapakei nonya?” shei jomi longi büpa kü langmaanteke.
Shejao büpai jomphong kü, “Ngei mehe dükaokpa hayü mekei etü amphongi dükpü mü shetteiaokhenang? Ephraim amei betjükdhei thaipeyü Abiezer amei betjükngong vaümpü mü meipü nevaipü je?
Kahvangi Midian am mübü Oreb hatü Zeeb nyi ammei lak kü shuohteke. Ammi dükpü mü shetteijü ngei mehe hayaoha dükaokpa?” shei eteke. Büpai mechem hapakei eshuohpa, jomphong mongshihpü meidai.
Hahepak kü Gideon hatü büpalei veshanthü kho jem Jordan yung homei dai. Jomi longi nyiudaijao nedoh-i vepathü changei dai.

Mechem jomphong Sukkoth ngoipa, büpai jom kü, “Chingmeilemlingei ngei mü daipüthü kü hahying shuohtükütuh; mehenangkü jom aeipai hemdaiteke, shejoong nedoh-i Midian am Zebah hatü Zalmunna ongpa nyi phei changei dainyüpeih” shei e.
Shejao Sukkoth am mübüthüi, “Mehekei hami nüngei veshanthü kü hahying shuohhenang? Shaangkei Zebah hi Zalmunna nyi mangyeppü je?” shei e.
Hanangkü Gideoni, “Meiteke, mechem
Hatoueipü büpa Penuel lemei aongei aihük mü jom kao phe, shejao Penuel ami Sukkoth ami epükei-üng eshuohteke.
Hanangkü büpai Penuel am kü, “Ngei mechem aokpü dangei leihen, ngei hapa shangdü bentükhen” shei e.
