Hezekiah-i jangei, “She philei vangdhüm laang lakham an daipü-üng yopüba” shei e. “Ngaümphei phileiang lakham an nyemlei” shei e.
Isaiah-i
Hahepak kü Baladanei cheha, Babylon ongpa Merodakh-Baladani Hezekiah ongpa tüngpü danei büpai Hezekiah kü lai hük hatü thintho hük shom.

Hezekiah-i phongmokbüthü ombomei yah, hatü büpai jomphong kü dou tuhpü shem leipü hon hi ngin, melivungla, meipü mainga hatü lahhilaong kemei hushuohteke. Hezekiah ongpai jomphong kü nehupü dou mepayao büpalei ongshem nevaijü ongching kü nenyu.
Hahepak kü Isaiah thibüi Hezekiah ongpa touei peiyei, “Hathü shennyakthüi mehe ephopa, hatü jomphong meleipü peipa?” shei phe.
Hezekiah-i jangei, “Jomphongü tailu kahmük Babylon leipü peipü khih” shei e.
Thibüpai büpa kü, “Nüngei shem leipü jomi mehe mehe eepa?” shei e. Hezekiah-i, “Ngelei shemei nyupü lemphüli jomi eetepih; ngei jom kü nehupü shemei meheyao nenyupih” shei jangei e.
Hahepak kü Isaiah-i Hezekiah kü, “
Nüngei shemei nyupü lemphüli, ambü ampa den kübü shinnyih thahshi thaiyei tuhpü douthü kemei Babylonei koei lüdaihen nyihthü ngoikünyüke; mepayao aoei netuhpih shei
Nüngi bühhahpü hapeüthü hanei müei deilanghen; jomphongü Babylon ongpalei ongshemei ban tüktüktü chongphoei nyuhen” shei e.
Hahepak kü Hezekiah-i Isaiah kü, “
Hezekiah-i dükpü dou lemphüli, büpai lingpü yungkuk hatü chingnyülei yunglem laetei yung shanpü hathü kemei Judah Ongthülei Büshah Laitap kü nyangei nyüpeih.
Hezekiah di, hatü cheha Manasseh-i büpa kü jeiyei ong vaiteke.
Manasseh-i Judah amei ong vaishingkü büpa nyübüh bong anpünyi nyu, hatü büpai Jerusalemei bong pinyipüanpünga vanglem lem. Chenyülei menü Hephzibah nyuteke.
Israel am leishingkü
Büpai chepa Hezekiah-i mangtükpü vaümchongthü ne leiyei ling; büpai Baal kahvang kü khümhen moidüthü hatü Asherah lajeithü Israel ongpa Ahabi lingpükei ling. Büpai lithathü peü kü khüm.
i, “Jerusalemei ngei kü khümtuh” shei epü
Phopshem chingshe nyiphenei büpai lithathü kü khümhen moidüthü ling.
Büpai cheha aw kü jakei moila shuoh. Büpai phongyom hingletpü, lashüh tetpü dou dük, hatü yimpi laang mü shah eteipü am, hatü tetpüvanpü am kü pheyeiyuei nyu. Büpai
“Israel jat anpünyi kübü ngei jepü hapa Jerusalem Phopshemei ngei kü khümtuh shei

Jomi-üng kenhingei ngei jom kü epü peü dükjema, hatü ngelei chongphobü Mosa homei jom kü shuohpü shahkungnyüthü kemei noteijema ngei jomei bühipa kü shuohpü kahdok leipü hajük kü Israel am nenyaiteihüpih” shei
Shejao nanglakthüi ha nebang. Manasseh-i nyeishi mang dük; hanangkü Israel am peishingkü
“Judah amei ongpa Manasseh-i hathü jiühitnalaipü mang thahteke. Büpai büpa shekü nyupü Amor ami dükpü mao nyeishi mang dük, hatü büpalei lajeithü homei Judah am mang thahhü.
Hanangkü
Ngei Samaria khüei shetpü vü, hatü Ahab am shem khüei shetpü lüngi ngei Jerusalem kao shethen. Ngei Jerusalemü shennyak hüki dükhi-üm vaüei thittüktü dhongdhongi haüphongpükei tuhphonghen.
Ngelei mükjüp yahhen aopü nanglakthüao yaktükhen, hatü jomei vepathülei lak kü shuohtükhen. Jomphongü jomei vepathülei lak kü aonghen, hatü jomei kahmük kübü lemphüli aetlanghen;
mehenangkü jomei bühipa Ijip kübü vamei leipü nyih kübü shinnyih thahshi jomi ngei touei mang dük, hatü ngei mongshih vamhüteke” shei
Büpai Judah am mang thahhüei
Manasseh-i dükpü lemphüli, büpai dükpü mang omshi Judah Ongthülei Büshah Laitap kü nyangei nyüpeih.
Manasseh di, hatü ongshem leipü Uzza pemongei büpalei mahng vüteke, hatü cheha Amoni büpa kü jeiyei ong vaiteke.
Amon ong vaishingkü büpalei nyübüh bong hapünyi nyu, hatü büpai Jerusalemei bong nyi vanglem lem. Chenyülei menü Meshullemeth, Jotbah leipü Haruzlei yiükha nyuteke.
Büpai chepa Manasseh-i dükpükei
Chepai kampü lem peü kü büpa kam, chepai keiha lajeithü chongphoei khümteke.
Büpai
Amonei lakchongbüthü büpa khüei phaüshah show, hatü büpa ongshemei jütük.
Hahepak kü Judah nanglakthüi Amon khüei yaongpü shennyakthü peü jütük, hatü jomphongi büpa kü jeiyei cheha Josiah ong vaihü.
Amoni dükpü lemphüli Judah Ongthülei Büshah Laitap kü nyangei nyüpeih.
Amonü Uzza pemongei büpalei mahngchongei vüteke, hatü cheha Josiah büpa kü jeiyei ong vaiteke.
Josiah ong vaishingkü büpalei nyübüh bong shet mon nyu, hatü büpai Jerusalemei bong hapüanpühük vanglem lem. Chenyülei menü Jedidah, Bozkath am Adaiahlei yiükha nyuteke.
Büpai
Büpai vanglem lempü bong anpüshetpabü kü Josiah ongpai büpalei laknyangbü Shaphan, Azaliahlei cheha, Meshullamei chehü
“Hilkiah ngongchong touei aongtuh, hatü shaden yombüthüi nanglakthü leipü thaipü lop büpai iehütuh.
Phopshem lingpüthü kü veihen shingvaishi jepü shennyakthü kü hapa lop shuohtuh, hatü jomi hapa lop
mistrithü, shem vepüthü hatü yaong bappüthü kü shuohhütuh, hatü jomi hapa lopi phopshem linghen taukta hatü shangei lingtükpü yaongthü shakhütuh.
Shejao jomei lak kü shuohtükpü lop nangkü itteihen napü neshiü; mehenangkü jomi shahhing kü düknyüke” shei e.
Shaphani Hilkiah ngongchong kü ongpalei shah shuohhen heih, hatü Hilkiah-i büpa kü, “Ngei
Hapheikü laknyangbü Shaphani ongpa touei leiyei büpa kü, “Nüngei chongphobüi Phopshem leipü lop yah-ei Phopshem lingpü dou kü veipüthü kü shuohtoja” shei e.
Laknyangbü Shaphani ongpa kü, “Ngongchong Hilkiah-i ngei kü laitap hük yahphopeih” shei e, hatü Shaphani ongpa touei hapa wongmü ieteke.
Mechem ongpai hapa Shahkungnyü Laitap leipü shahthü danpa, büpai laophülei ashakviha shaak,
hatü Hilkiah ngongchong, Shaphanei cheha Ahikam, Mikaiahlei cheha Akhbor, Laknyangbü Shaphan hatü ongpalei chongphobü Asaiah hathü kü ongpai ngeükhüam shuoh-ei e,
“Daituh, hatü ngei, nanglakthü hatü Judah am kempü shingvaishi hapa dangpü Lai kü mehe enya, hapa

Hanangkü Hilkiah ngongpa, Ahikam, Akhbor, Shaphan hatü Asaiah hathüi phopshem leipü ashakviha kü veiteipü Harkaslei cheha Tikvah, Tikvahlei cheha Shallumei chenyüha Huldah thibüla touei pei. Pinnyü-ü Jerusalem shingja philei nyu.
Pinnyüi jomphong kü, “
Mehenangkü jomi ngei yakphongtü lebü kahvangthü kü moila shuoh-ei khümpeih, hatü jomei laki lingpü lajeithüi ngei mongshihhüpeih; hanangkü ngei mongshihpü aw kei bahhen, hatü hapa nemethen.
Shejao
nüngi mong lepei,
Ngei hapa shing kü koei peihen shanghah nüngei müki ne-eehüpih; ngei nüngü chingmeivangmei kü dihühen’ ” shei e. Jomi ongpa touei hapa shahjang koei leiteke.
Hapheikü ongpai Judah hatü Jerusalem kü nyupü behethü peü chemi nyükei thaihü.
Büpai
Ongpai shemnyü touei yaongtü

Hapheikü ongpai Hilkiah ngongchong hatü sheühteipü ngongpathü, hatü Phopshem shaden yompüthü kü Phopshem mongeipü Baal kahvang, Asherah nyüha kahvangthü, hatü lithathü kü khümshingkü noteipü douhinangthü ngaikei shei ngeükhüam shuoh. Büpai hathü Jerusalem haolei Kidron Kahjilei deiyei aw kü jaktük, hatü hapalei depla Bethelei dei.

Judah ongthüi Judah jilathü hatü Jerusalem shonei vaümchongthü, Baal kahvang, vanghe, lennyü, kahdoknyüthü hatü lithathü kü ayingshü jakei khümhen shingvaishi jepü ngongpathü peü ngongpa dousho kübü dohtük.
Büpai
Büpai Phopshemei büm yupüthülei yow bentük; halei nyühathüi Asherah nyüha kahvang kü khümhen ashak dakhamteke.

Büpai Judah leipü ngongpathü peü müei dei, hatü ngongpathüi ayingshü jakei moila shuohteipü moidüthü peü Geba kübü Beer-sheba thahshi sheihtük. Chingnyülei shüshingkü laknyongphi lemei chingnyü kü governor vaihampü Joshua-i lingpü shadenei shüpü lem touei nyupü moidüthü peü bentük.
Hathü ngongpathü kü Jerusalemei
Josiah ongpai Ben-Hinnom Kahjilei nyupü Topheth metouei lebü kahvangthü kü khümteipa, hapa shing sheihtük; hanangkü üpaiyao hatouei Molekh kahvang kü laophülei hapeü aw kü jakei moila neshuoh-aok.
Judah ongthüi vanghe kü khümhen shingvaishi daütüktü
Ahazlei dokpa dung-am adokei Judah ongthüi lingpü moidüthü, hatü

Israel amei ongpa Solomoni Sidon amei jiühitnalaipü Astartes nyüha kahvang, Moab amei jiühitnalaipü Kemosh kahvang, Ammon amei Molekh kahvang, hathü kü khümhen shingvaishi Jerusalem heongphi kü hatü Olive Kahshang pehephi kü vepü moidüthü peü sheihtük.
Josiah ongpai yaong shemnyüthü nihtükkem, Asherah nyüha kahvangei lajeithü bapei yaktük, hatü büpai hapa shingthü kü shennyakei vangi matük.
Nebatei cheha Jeroboami Bethelei lingpü moidü, mepa homei Israel am mang thahhü, büpai hapayao bentük. Büpai vaümchongthü awi haptük hatü khih mü nihtük hatü Asherah kahvangao aw kü jaktük.

Hapheikü Josiah-i shineileyei veishingkü shangching philei büpai mahngchong eeyei büpai haleipü vangtaothü yah-ei moidülei hapa sheihhühen shingvaishi jak. Hapayü Kahvangei shah Kahvang shennyak homei yeihshi eyei nyupü jiühühen dhaümteke.

Ongpai, “Ngei eepü mahngchong yaongü meheang?” shei phe. Hahepak kü chingnyü leipü shennyakthüi, “Hapayü Bethel leipü moidü kü eelaei epü, mepa dou nüngi shaang dükpa, hapa jung teteivanei epü Judah leipü peipü Kahvang shennyakei mahngchong khih” shei e.
Josiah-i, “Hapakei nyemnyu; üpaiyao büpalei vangtao tenüngtük” shei eteke. Hanangkü jomi büpalei vangtao hatü Samaria leipü peipü thibüthülei vangtao hapakei neyaktüki hatouei tuh.
Büpai Bethelei dükpü keiha Josiah-i Israel ongthüi Samaria chingthülei lingpü vaümchongthü, mepai
Josiah-i hapa vaümchongthü leipü ngongpathü moidü shangei jü hatü jomphong shangkü shennyakei vangtaothü jakteke. Hapheikü büpa Jerusalemei nyokei leidai.
Josiah ongpai nanglakthü peü kü, “Vangpüshuwpü lai kü nyangei nyupükei
Israel kü shahphenbüthüi müpü nyihthü, nevaijü Israel hatü Judah kü ongthüi vanglem lempü mepa hepak kao hapa keipü Hompü Mo nehahham;
shejao Josiah ongpai vanglem lempü bong anpüshetpabü kü Jerusalemei

Ngongchong Hilkiah-i Phopshemei dangpü lai kü nyangei nyupü shahkungnyüthü dükhen shingvaishi Josiah ongpai Jerusalem hatü Judah kahdok peü leipü laang kü shah eteipü, lashüh dokpüthü hatü shemongei khümteipü kahvang, lajeithü, hatü kung amei jiühitnalaipü douhinang peü yaktükkem.
Mongdang, laangha hatü wong kempai Mosa Shahkung kü nyupükei jiüshi dükei
Shejao Manasseh ongpai dükpü mang nangkü

Hanangkü, “Ngei Israel am changtükpü keiha, ngei Judah amao changtükhen, hatü ngei Jerusalem hatü ngei jepü Chingnyü yaktükhen, hatü ‘Ngei kü khümhen shing’ shei ngei epü hapa Phopshemao yaktükhen” shei
Josiah-i dükpü lebü douthü, hatü büpai dükpü douthü kemei Judah Ongthülei Büshah Laitap kü nyangei nyüpeih.

Josiah ong vaipü nyih kü Ijip ong Pharaoh Neko-i Euphrates yungyen thahshi Assyria am kü sheühhen aong. Josiah ongpai büpa mü ponghen heih; mechem Pharaoh Neko-i büpa Meggodolei heüpa, büpai büpa jütük.

Büpalei chongphobüthü Megiddo leipü büpalei mahng koyei khari kü shihtü Jerusalemei leiyei büpalei mahngchongei vüteke. Hapa kahdok kübü nanglakthüi Josiah-lei cheha Jehoahaz ong vaihen je, hatü chepalei shing kü ong vaihüteke.
Mechem Jehoahaz Judah amei ong vaipa, büpalei nyübüh bong hapüjem nyuteke, hatü büpai Jerusalemei lenyang jem ong vaiteke. Chenyü-ü Libnah am Jeremiahlei yiükha Hamutal nyu.
Chebü chepa ami dükpükei büpai

Mechem Pharaoh Neko-i büpa Hamath kahdok Riblahlei khoklat kü tuhpa, büpai vanglem lempü dohdaipeih; hanangkü büpa Jerusalemei vanglem nelemaok, hatü Judah am kü ngin dok 3, 000 hon dok 30 bom yüei yahhampeih.
Pharaoh Neko-i Josiahlei cheha Eliakim chepa Josiahlei shing kü jeiyei ong vaihü, hatü büpa kü Jehoiakim shei men jeiteke. Shejao Pharaoh Neko-i Jehoahaz Ijiplei müei yiü, hatü halei büpa di.
Ijip ongpai yüpü bom shuohhen shingvaishi Jehoiakimi nanglakthü kü laophü laophü kü mop peipü aimü hon hatü ngin shathai thaiteke.
Jehoiakim vanglem lemei chongpang shingkü büpa bong hapünga behe nyu; büpai Jerusalemei bong anpühük ong vaiteke. Chenyü-ü Rumah am Pedaiahlei yiükha Zebidah nyu.
Chebü chepa ami dükpü keiha büpai
Jehoiakim Judah kü ong vaipü hepak kü Babylon am Nebukadnezzar ongpa peiyei Judah hah, hatü bong jem thahshi büpa phangkü angteke. Hapheikü büpa mong yeiyaei Nebukadnezzar khüei yaong.
i büpa khüei Babylon am, Aram am, Moab am, Ammon am shom.
Hingmei, Manasseh-i thahpü mangthü hatü büpai dükpü douthü nangkü
hatü nyeinya vaishi büpai mang neshiüpü iy longi yenhü. Mehenangkü büpai Jerusalemü mang neshiüpü iy yenpai mahü, hatü
Jehoiakimi dükpü lemphüli Judah ongthülei Büshah Laitap kü nyangei nyüpeih.
Jehoiakim didaipheikü cheha Jehoiakini büpa kü jeiyei ong vaiteke.
Ijip ongpai jomei kahdok leipü nedai; mehenangkü Babylon ongpaiyao Ijip amei kahmük Ijip Kahji kübü Euphrates Yung thahshi peü yahlangtü nyu.
Jehoiakin ong vaipü hepak kü büpa nyübüh bong anpüshet nyu, hatü büpai Jerusalemei lenyang jem vanglem lem. Chenyü-ü Jerusalem am Elnathanei yiükha Nehushta nyu.
Chepai dükpü keiha büpai
Büpalei hepak kü Babylon am Nebukadnezzar ongpalei lakchongbüthü aongei Jerusalem shüm,
hatü büpalei lakchongbüthü ching shinei show lingei tuhphongtü Nebukadnezzar büpa nyingi Jerusalem Chingnyülei shü,

hatü Jehoiakin ongpa, chenyü, chongphobüthü, büpalei lakchongbüthü hatü ongshem leipü lakchongbüthü peü Babylon am touei shakei vam. Nebukadnezzar vanglem lempü bong shetpabü kü büpai Jehoiakin khoklatei yepei küp,
hatü
Büpai Jerusalem am kemei: lakchongbüthü, veshanthü peü hatü lahhinei dou dükaokpüthü peüshep haja an thahshi wüpküpei deilang. Peü mü taopathü mon Judahlei nedeihah-i tuhphong.
Nebukadnezzar ongpai Jehoiakin ongpa Babylon wüpküpei yah-ei dai. Büpai Jehoiakinei chenyü, chenyüha, lakchongbüthü kahmük kü mübü shennyakthü peü müei dai.
Nebukadnezzari Babylonei shongnyü shennyakthü jom haja nyet, lahhinei dou dükaokpüthü jom haja hük, hatü veshan vaiaokhen den ngoipü shennyakthü peü wüpküpei müei dai.
Nebukadnezzari Jehoiakinei chepa naü-eepa Mattaniah kü Zedekiah shei men jeitü Judahlei ong vaiyei tuhteke.
Zedekiah vanglem lemei chongpangpü hepak kü büpa nyübüh bong hapühük nyu, hatü büpai Jerusalemei bong anpühük vanglem lem. Chenyü-ü Libnah am Jeremiahlei yiükha Hamutal nyuteke.
Chepa Jehoiakimi dükpü keiha büpai
Jerusalem hatü Judah nanglakthü kü

Zedekiah ongpai Babylon ongpa Nebukadnezzar ongpa khüei yaong. Hanangkü Nebukadnezzari büpalei veshanthü mütü peiyei Zedekiah-i vanglem lempü bong shüpabü lenyang an mü nyih anpabü kü Jerusalem hah; jomi ching shinei shümhen bham ling.
Hanangkü hapa chingnyü Zedekiah-i vanglem lempü bong anpühükpabü bong thahshi shüm.
Lenyang alipabü nyih shüpabü kü hapa chingnyülei shaühile longpü vam, hatü shennyakthüi hahhen meheyao neshiüi nyu.
Babylon am ching shinei nyulangmao ongpalei pe yopailei bham nyi kübü peshaden homei bham benei ongpa hatü veshanthü peü yanüng nyaidaikem. Jom Arabah lemei nyaiyei dai,
shejao Babylon am veshanthüi ongpa kü changei daiyei Jeriko Kahjilei büpa yep, hatü veshanthü büpa yakphongtü yandaikem.
Riblah chingnyülei Nebukadnezzar touei Zedekiah yepei lei, hatü halei büpa hanghihühen shahphen shuoh.
Zedekiah-i veishi chehathü peü jü; Nebukadnezzari Zedekiahlei mük luktüktü nyiamvüi shatü Babylonei müei dai.
Babylon ongpa Nebukadnezzari vanglem lempü bong anpüshü mü lenyang nga mü nyih nyetpabü kü ongpa yompü veshan mübü, Nebuzaradan, Babylon ongpalei lakchongbü Jerusalemei pei.
Büpai Jerusalem moilashem, ongshem hatü Jerusalemei nyupü shemthü peü awi haptük. Shongnyü shemthü peü awi haptük.
Nebuzaradani mütü veshanthüi Jerusalem shinpü bhamthü peü mangtük.
Nebuzaradani chingei tuhphongpü nanglakthü, neaoknethangpü shennyakthü peü wüpküpei müei dai.
Shejao büpai taopathü hanei nyalingngupai kah linghen hatü kahthü linghen tuhphong.
Babylon ami
Jomphongi dük, hoklak, moidü leipü awnih hokteipü shung, awmi tükteipü nyiam, hatü Phopshemei noteipü melangnyiami lingpü douthü peü shetei leidai.
Hapa veshan mübüi chilimji hatü awtao hokteipü shung, hon hatü ngin yah-ei lingpü douhinang kemei shetei leidai.
Solomoni
Shemnyü ieyei shaopü kü feet hapünyet nyu. Shemnyü ieyei kü melangnyiami shemnyü ju kü feet ali mü bhaoei shih, hatü hapa shinei pomegranat betjük ow lingei shihteke.
Ha mü lenei Nebuzaradani Seraiah ngongchong, Zephaniah ngongpa, dousho kü nyipabü shongnyü shennyak, hatü shaden yompü jom jem yepei dai.

Chingnyülei nyupüthü khong kübü veshanthü kü lakchongbü hük, hatü ongpa kü shahnying ebüthü jom nga yepei dai. Kahmük kü nyupü nanglakthülei men nyangteipü veshan mübülei laknyangbü hatü lebü shongnyü shennyak pejem thahshi müei dai.
Nebuzaradani jom müei Riblahlei Babylon ongpa touei müei pei.
Hamath kahdok Riblahlei ongpai jom kü üp, hatü jütük.
Hanangkü Judah am laophülei kahdok leipü wüpküpei dai.
Babylon am Nebukadnezzari Ahikamei cheha, Shaphanei chehü, Gedaliah Judah kü governor vaiyei tuh, hatü büpai Babylonei müei nedeipü shennyakthü kü veihen dou shuohteke.

Mechem Judah am lakchongbüthü, hatü Babylon am touei shakei nevampü veshanthüi Gedaliah-i governor vaihen Babylon ongpai jeteke shei danpa, jomi Mizpahlei Gedaliah touei pei; jomphongü Nethaniahlei cheha Ishmael, Kareahlei cheha Johanan, Netophah leipü Tanhumethlei cheha Seraiah, hatü Maakahlei cheha Jaazaniah hatü jomei shennyakthü shiüteke.

Gedaliah-i hathü hatü jomei shennyakthü kü lah-ei, “Babylon am lakchongbüthü kü tenyem; hapa kahdokei nyutuh, hatü Babylon ongpa chongphotuh, hatü meheyao nevai-i meishi-üng nyushasha hih” shei büpai eteke.

Shejao hapa bong len nyetpabü kü Nethaniahlei cheha, Elishamalei chehü Ishmael, ongsha ongshem kübü shennyak hük, büpa mü shennyak an mütü Mizpahlei heih-ei Gedaliah jü, hatü Mizpahlei büpa mü nyupü Judah hatü Babylon am jütükkem.
Hahepak kü Israel am shemmei, taoha, veshan lakchongbüthü peü Babylon am kü nyemei Ijiplei yiüdaikem.

Judah am Jehoiakin ongpa wüpküpei küpshi nyupü bong hapüanpünyetpabü len anpünyi, nyih hapünyetpabü kü Evil-Merodakh-i Babylon kü ong vaiyei chongpangpü bong Judah am Jehoiakin ongpa khoklat leipü veteke.
Büpai büpa kü shinshangei dük, hatü Babylon wüpküpei nyupü ongthü peü mü büpa kü dhüm kohpü uoshing shaopü shuoh.
Hanangkü Jehoiakini khoklatei owpü ow tuhtüktü aopü büpalei nyihthü kemei kü ongpalei nükdülei chengei hahying.
Nyihjeih ongpai Jehoiakin kü büpa nyupü thahshi hahying shuoh.
Adam, Seth, Enosh, Kenan,
Mahalalel, Jared,
Enokh, Methuselah, Lamekh,
Noah, Noahlei hapeüthü: Shem, Ham hatü Japheth hathü nyu.
Japhethlei hapeüthü: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshekh, hatü Tiras nyu.
Gomerlei hapeüthü: Ashkenaz, Riphath hatü Togarmah nyu.
Javanei hapeüthü: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, hatü Rodanim nyu.
Hamei hapeüthü: Kush, Mizraim, Put hatü Kanan am nyu.
Kushlei hapeüthü: Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raamah, hatü Sabteka nyu. Raamahlei hapeü nyi: Sheba hatü Dedan.
Kushlei cheha hük Nimrod nyu; büpa kahdoknyü kü vehokbü longpü leiteke.
Mizraim amei hühihathüyü Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,
Pathrusim, Kasluhim, hatü Kaphtorim (haleipü Philistia am vampeih) hathü nyuteke.
Kananei hashongpayü Sidon, haphei kü Heth,
Jebus, Amor, Girgash,
Hiv, Ark, Sin,
Arvad, Zemar, hatü Hamath hathü nyu.
Shemei hapeüthü: Elam, Asshur, Arpakhshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, hatü Meshekh nyu.
Arpakhshadlei cheha Shelah, hatü Shelahlei cheha Eber nyu.
Eberlei cheha nyi nyu: Hükei menü Peleg, mehenangkü büpalei hepak kü kahdoknyü hangku hanteke, hatü chenaüei menü Joktan nyu.
Joktanei chehayü Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ophir, Havilah hatü Jobab nyu. Hathü kemei Joktanei hapeüthü nyu.
Shem kübü Abram thahshi bülem hapakei: Shem, Arpakhshad, Shelah,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Terah,
hatü Abram (hapayü Abraham).
Abrahamei hapeü nyi: Isak hatü Ishmael.
Ishmaelei yeshangthü jom anpünyi-i jat anpünyi kü shangjing leipeih. Ishmaelei hashongpa Nebaioth, hapheikü Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphish hatü Kedemah. Hathüyü Ishmaelei yeshangthü nyuteke.
Abrahamei yiükphü Keturah-i bühpü yeshangthü: Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak hatü Shuah. Jokshanei hapeüthü: Sheba hatü Dedan.
Midianei hapeüthü: Ephah, Epher, Hanokh, Abida hatü Eldaah. Hathü kemei Keturahlei hühihathü nyupeih.
Abrahamei cheha Isak nyu. Isakei cheha Esau hatü Jakob.
Esaulei hapeüthü: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam hatü Korah nyu.
Eliphazlei hapeüthü: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, hatü Amalek.
Reuelei hapeüthü: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, hatü Mizzah nyu.
Seirlei hapeüthü: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer hatü Dishan.
Lotanei hapeüthü: Hori hatü Homam. Timnayü Lotanei chenya nyuteke.
Shobalei hapeüthü: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi hatü Onam. Zibeonei hapeüthü: Aiah hatü Anah.
Anahlei hapeü: Dishon. Dishonei hapeüthü: Hemran, Eshban, Ithran, hatü Keran.
Ezerlei hapeüthü: Bilhan, Zaavan hatü Jaakan Dishanei hapeüthü: Uz hatü Aran.
Israel am mepa ongiyao vanglem manglem shekü Edom kahdokei vanglem lempü ongthü: Beorlei cheha Bela hatü büpalei chingnyüyü Dinhabah nyu.
Mechem Bela didaipa, Bozrah am Zerahlei cheha Jobabi büpa jeiyei ong vai.
Mechem Jobab didaipa, Teman kahdok leipü Husham büpa jeiyei ong vai.
Mechem Husham didaipa, Bedadlei cheha Hadad, üpai Moab kahdokei Midian am neütükpa, büpai jeiyei ong vai. Büpalei chingnyü kü Avith shei nyükteke.
Mechem Hadad didaipa, Masrekah leipü Samlah-i büpa jeiyei ong vai.
Mechem Samlah didaipa, Euphrates yung Rehoboth leipü Saul-i büpa jeiyei ong vai.
Mechem Saul didaipa, Akhborlei cheha Baal-Hanani büpa jeiyei ong vai.
Mechem Baal-Hanan didaipa, Hadadi büpa jeiyei ong vai. Büpalei chingnyü kü Pai shei nyük, hatü chenyühayü Me-zahabei yiükha Matred, Matredlei yiükha Mehetabel shei menpü nyu.
Hadad didai. Edom am jatthü hapakei nyu: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel hatü Iram. Hathüyü Edom am jatthü nyuteke.
Hathüyü Jakobei hapeüthü nyuteke: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar, Zebulun,
Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad hatü Asher.
Judahlei hapeüthü: Er, Onan, hatü Shelah. Hathü jom jemü Kanan am Bath-Shualei yiükha-i bühpü hapeüthü nyuteke. Judahlei hashongpa Er-ü
Judahlei chehalei nyüha Tamar-i Perez hatü Zerah nyi büh. Judahlei hapeüthü peüshep jom nga nyu.
Perezlei hapeüthü: Hezron hatü Hamul.
Zerahlei hapeüthü: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol, hatü Dara– peüshep jom nga nyu.
Karmilei hapeü: Akhar, büpai vehok hepak kü yahpü douthü
Ethanei cheha: Azariah.
Hezron kü bühjapü hapeüthü: Jerahmeel, Ram hatü Kaleb.
Ramü Amminadabei chepa, Amminadabü Nahshonei chepa, Judah nanglakthülei mübü.
Nahshonü Salmonei chepa, Salmonü Boazlei chepa,
Boaz-ü Obedei chepa, Obed-ü Jesselei chepa.
Jesseyü hashongpa Eliab, nyipabü Abinadab, jempabü Shimea,
alipabü Nethanel, ngapabü Raddai,
vokpabü Ozem hatü nyetpabü David hathülei chepa nyuteke.
Jomphongei nyahinaüthüyü Zeruiah hatü Abigail nyi nyu. Zeruiah-i bühpü yeshang jemü Abishai, Joab hatü Asahel nyu.
Abigail-ü Amasalei chenyü hatü chepayü Ishmael am jat Jether nyu.
Hezronei cheha Kalebei chenyüha Azubah-i yiükha hük meni Jerioth büh. Hathüyü pinnyü-i bühpü yeshangthü: Jesher, Shobab, hatü Ardon.
Azubah didaipheikü Kalebi Ephrath mü shem yem hatü pinnyüi Hur bühteke.
Hur-ü Urilei chepa, hatü Uriyü Bezalelei chepa nyu.
Pheishi Hezroni Makirlei yiükha, Gileadei chehü mü shem yem, (büpa nyübüh vangbong pejem nyushi pinnyü mü shem yemteke) hatü pinnyüi Segub bühteke.
Segub-ü Jairlei chepa nyu hatü büpai Gilead kahdok kü jila hapüjem shak kü vanglem lemei nyu.
Shejao Geshur hatü Aram ami Jair amei chingthü hatü Kenath kü shonpü chingthü pejem thahshi neüei hahtük. Hathüyü Gileadei chepa Makirlei hühihathü nyuteke.
Hezron didaipheikü cheha Kalebi chepai tuhphongpü vaümnyü Ephrath mü shem yem hatü yeshang hük meni Ashhur bühteke. Büpayü Tekoa shennyakthülei pa nyuteke.
Hezronei cheha Jerahmeelei hapeüthü: Hashongpa Ram, hapheikü Bunah, Oren, Ozem hatü Ahijah.
Shao Jerahmeelei lebü nyüha hük meni Atarah shei nyu; pinnyü-ü Onamei chenyü nyu.
Jerahmeelei hashongpa Ramei hapeüthü: Maaz, Jamin hatü Eker.
Onamei hapeüthü: Shammai hatü Jada. Shammailei hapeüthü: Nadab hatü Abishur.
Abishurlei chenyühayü Abihail nyu; pinnyüi Ahban hatü Molid nyi bühteke.
Nadabei hapeüthü: Seled hatü Appaim. Seledü hapeü netuhphongi didai.
Appaimei hapeüthü: Ishi, Sheshanei chepa, hatü Sheshanü Ahlailei chepa nyu.
Shammailei chenaü Jadalei hapeüthü: Jether hatü Jonathan. Jether-ü hapeü netuhphongi didai.
Jonathanei hapeüthü: Peleth hatü Zaza. Hathüyü Jerahmeelei hühihathü nyuteke.
Sheshanei hapeüthüyü yeshang nenyu-i yiükhathü mon nyu. Büpa mü Ijip am chongphobü hük meni Jarha shei nyu.
Büpai laophülei yiükha Jarha mü shem yemhü hatü pinnyüi Attai bühteke.
Attaiyü Nathanei chepa, Nathanü Zabadei chepa,
Zabadü Ephlalei chepa, Ephlal-ü Obedei chepa,
Obed-ü Jehulei chepa, Jehuyü Azariahlei chepa,
Azariah-ü Helezlei chepa, Helezü Eleasahlei chepa,
Eleasah-ü Sismailei chepa, Sismaiyü Shallumei chepa,
Shallumü Jekamiahlei chepa, hatü Jekamiah-ü Elishamalei chepa nyuteke.
Jerahmeelei chenaü Kalebei hapeüthü: Hashongpa Mesha, büpayü Ziphlei chepa nyu, hatü büpayü Mareshahlei chepa hatü büpayü Hebronei chepa nyuteke.
Hebronei hapeüthü: Korah, Tappuah, Rekem hatü Shema.
Shemayü Rahamei chepa, Rahamü Jorkeamei chepa nyu. Rekemü Shammailei chepa nyu.
Shammailei hapeü-ü Maon, hatü Maonü Beth-Zurlei chepa nyuteke.
Kalebei yiükphü Ephah-ü Haran, Moza hatü Gazez hathülei chenyü nyu. Haranei yeshang hük Gazez shei mentü nyu.
Jahdailei hapeüthü: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, hatü Shaaph.
Kalebei yiükphü Maakahyü Sheber hatü Tirhanah nyilei chenyü nyu.
Pheishi pinnyüi yeshang nyi büh: Shaaph, büpayü Madmannahlei chepa, hatü Shevayü Makbenah hatü Gibealei chepa nyu. Kalebei yiükhayü Akhsah nyuteke.
Hathüyü Kalebei hühihathü: Ephrathahlei hashongpa Hurlei hapeüthü: Shobalü Kiriath-Jearimei chepa,
Salmayü Bethlehemei chepa, hatü Hareph-ü Beth-Gaderlei chepa nyu.
Kiriath-Jearimei chepa Shobalei hühihathü: Haroeh, Menuhothlei nyupü hükkeishing,
hatü Kiriath-Jearim phangthü mü sheishowpü: Ithri, Puth, Shumath, hatü Mishra. Ha kübü Zorath hatü Eshtaol am phaakei vam.
Salmalei hühihathü: Bethlehem, Netophath, Atroth-beth-joab, hatü Manahath am mü sheishowpü Zor am phang nyu.
Tirath, Shimeath, hatü Sukath hathüyü Jabezlei nyupeih; jomü nyangpü kü longi nahpü am nyupeih. Jomü Rekhab phang mü yiükyah lashompü Hamath leipü peipü Ken am nyuteke.
Hathüyü David Hebronei nyushi bühjapü hapeüthü: Jezreel am Ahinoami bühpü hashongpa Amnon; nyipabüyü Karmel am Abigaili bühpü Daniel;
jempabüyü Absalom, Geshur am Talmai ongpalei yiükha Maakah-i bühpü; alipabü kü Haggith-i bühpü Adonijah;
ngapabü kü Abitali bühpü Shephatiah, hatü vokpabü chenyüha Eglah-i bühpü Ithream nyuteke.
Hathü jom vokü David Hebronei vangbong nyet mü lenyang vok vanglem lempü hepak kü büh. Davidi Jerusalemei vangbong hapüanpüjem thahshi vanglem lem,
hatü halei bühpü hapeüthü: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan hatü Solomon. Hathü jom aliyü Ammielei chenaü Bathsheba-i bühteke.
Shao Ibhar, Elishua, Eliphelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, hatü Eliphelet– peüshep jom shü nyuteke.
Davidei yiükphüthüi bühpü hapeüthü mü lenei hathüyü büpalei hapeüthü nyu, hatü Tamar-ü jomphongei chenaü nyüha nyuteke.
Hapayü Solomon ongpalei hühihathü pahiha dheanpü: Solomonei cheha Rehoboam, Abijah, Asa, Jehoshaphat,
Jehoram, Ahaziah, Joash,
Amaziah, Azariah, Jotham,
Ahaz, Hezekiah, Manasseh,
Amon, Josiah.
Josiahlei hapeüthü: Hashongpa Johanan, nyipabü Jehoiakim, jempabü Zedekiah, alipabü Shallum.
Jehoiakimei hapüthü: cheha Jehoiakin, hatü Zedekiah.
Hathüyü Jehoiakinei hühihathü Babylon ami wüpküpei müei daipüthü: cheha Shealtiel,
Malkiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama hatü Nedabiah.
Pedaiahlei hapeüthü: Zerubbabel hatü Shimei. Zerubbabelei hapeüthü: Meshallum hatü Hananiah. Shelomith-ü jijilei naüpeü (nyüha) nyuteke.
Shao lebü hapeü nga thahshi nyu: Hashubah, Ohel, Berekhiah, Hasadiah hatü Jushab-Hesed.
Hananiahlei hühihathü: Pelatiah hatü Jeshaiah. Jeshaiahyü Rephaiahlei chepa, Rephaiahyü Arnanlei chepa, Arnanü Obadiah hatü Shekaniah nyilei chepa nyuteke.
Shekaniahlei hühihathü: Shemaiahyü cheha hatü büpalei hüpeüthü: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah hatü Shaphatpeüshep jom vok nyu.
Neariahlei hapeüthü: Elioenai, Hizkiah hatü Azrikampeüshep jom jem nyu.
Elioenailei hapeüthü: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah hatü Ananipeüshep jom nyet nyuteke.
Hathüyü Judahlei hühihathü: Perez, Hezron, Karmi, Hur hatü Shobal.
Shobalei cheha Reaiahyü Jahathlei chepa, hatü Jahath-ü Ahumai hatü Lahad nyilei chepa nyu. Hathüyü Zorath am phangthü nyuteke.
Hathüyü Etamei hapeüthü: Jezreel, Ishma, hatü Idbash. Jomei chenaü kü Hazzelelponi shei men.
Penuel-ü Gedorlei chepa, hatü Ezer-ü Hushahlei chepa nyu. Hathüyü Bethlehemei chepa Ephrathahlei hashongpa Hurlei hühihathü.
Tekoalei chepa Ashurlei nyüha nyi Helah hatü Naarah shei nyu.
Naarah-i Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni hatü Haahashtari büh. Hathüyü Naarahlei hühihathü nyu.
Helahlei hapeüthü: Zereth, Izhar, Ethnan,
hatü Koz, büpayü Anub hatü Zobebah hatü Harumei chepa Aharhel phangthülei chepa nyuteke.
Jabez-ü büpalei jeihinaüthü mü nyeinya dhüm kohpü shennyak nyu. Chenyüi büpa kü Jabez shei men; “Mehenangkü ngei longi tüngpü eeyei büpa bühpeih” shei e.

Jabez-i Israel Kahvang kü, “Oh Kahvang, nüngi ngei kü moihimanshih hatü ngelei kahmük viong dahüshih! Nüngei laklu wong longpü ngei mü chongkei hatü ngei shanghah vongshüh peü kübü nüngi yangshih!” shei phop, hatü büpai mehe yiü, ha Kahvangi büpa kü shuoh.
Shuhahlei chejei Kalebü Mehirlei chepa nyu. Mehir-ü Eshtonei chepa nyu.
Eshtonü Beth-Rapha, Paseahlei chepa, hatü Tihinnah-ü Nahashlei chepa nyu. Hathüyü Rekah am shennyakthü nyuteke.
Kenazlei hapeüthü: Othniel hatü Seraiah. Ohnielei hapeüthü: Hathath hatü Meonothai.
Meonothaiyü Ophrahlei chepa nyu. Seraiah-ü Joabei chepa, Joab-ü Ge-Harashimei chepa.
Jephunnehlei cheha Kalebei hapeüthü: Iru, Elah hatü Naam. Elahlei hapeü: Kenaz.
Jehallelelei hapeüthü: Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria hatü Asarel.
Ezrahlei hapeüthü: Jether, Mered, Epher hatü Jalon. Hathüyü Pharaohlei yiükha, Meredlei nyüha Bithiah-i bühpü hapeüthü: Miriam, Shammai hatü Eshtemoalei chepa Ishbah büh,
hatü büpalei Judea am nyüha-i Gedorlei chepa Jered, Sokolei chepa Heber, Zanoahlei chepa Jekuthiel büh.
Hodiah-i Nahamei chenaü mü shem yem, hatü Garam amei chepa Keilah hatü Maakath amei chepa Eshtemoa büh.
Shimonei hapeüthü: Amnon, Rinnah, Ben-Hanan, hatü Tilon. Ishilei hapeüthü: Zoheth hatü Ben-zoheth.
Judahlei cheha Shelahlei hapeüthü: Er-ü Lekahlei chepa. Laadah-ü Mareshahlei chepa, Mareshah amü nyemin ashak dakpü am, jomü Beth-Ashbealei nyupeih;
hatü Kozebalei nyupü Jokim am Joash hatü Saraph ami Moab am mü shem yemtü Lehemei nyupeih. (Hathüyü aivang den mebü nyangei tuhpü eenyüke.)
Jomphongü Netaim hatü Gederahlei nyupü dük shükbü am nyu; jomi halei nyuei ongpa shing dou dükteke.
Simeonei hapeüthü: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah hatü Shaul;
Shallumü Shaulei chepa, chehüyü Mibsam, büpalei hüshomü Mishma nyu.
Mishmalei hühihathü: chehayü Hammuel chehüyü Zakkur, büpalei hüshomü Shimei.
Shimeilei yeshang anpüvok, yiükha vok nyu, shejao büpalei jeihinaüthülei hapeüthü longi nenyupü nangkü jom phangü Judah am kei nanglak longi nenyu.
Jomü Beer-sheba, Moladah, Hazar-Shual,
Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
Beth-Markaboth, Hazar-Susim, Beth-Biri hatü Shaaraimlei nyu. Davidi ong vaihen chongpangpü thahshi hathüyü jomei jilathülei nyu.
Jomei chingthüyü Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tokhen hatü Ashanjila nga,
hatü Baalah thahshi hathü jilathü kü chingthüi shontü nyu. Hathüyü jom nyupü shingthü, hatü jomi bülem kemei nyangei tuh.
Meshobab, Jamlekh, Amaziahlei cheha Joshah,
Joel, Jehu Joshibiahlei cheha, Seraiahlei chehü, Asielü hüshom,
Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
hatü Shemaiahlei cheha Shimri, Shimrilei cheha Jedaiah, Jedaiahlei cheha Allon, Allonlei cheha Shiphi, hatü Shiphilei cheha Ziza nyu.
Men nyangei nyupü shennyakthüyü jomei phangthülei mübüthü nyuteke. Jom shemdep longi da,
hatü jomi jomei mithü shing het ühshing phaümük yemei Gedor ngoishi heongphi kahji lemei dai.
Jomi kahcheü kohpü phaümük, shinghiphei changshi hatü nenmü chingmeivangmei kü nyupü kahdok dang. Shelei hatoueiyü Ham am shennyak nyuhamteke.

Judah am Hezekiah ongpa hepak kü halei men nyangei nyupüthü peiyei Ham hatü Meun am ching hah, hatü jom kemei mahtükkemtü shinnyih thahshi jom halei nyüpeih. Hapheikü jomi hathülei shing kü jom uodai; mehenangkü halei jomei mithü shing het ühhen phaü changshi nyuteke.
Hatü Simeon am phang jom kho nga thahshi Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, hatü Ishilei cheha Uzziel hathüi mütü phaüshang kahmük Seir hahteke.
Jomi nemah-i nyushuohpü Amalek am kemei jütüktü jom halei nyuei daipeih.

Jakobei hashongpa Reubenei hühihathü. “Mehenangkü Reubeni chepalei yiükphü hük mü mükbongjuyungpü nangkü jeiyongpa heanü Joseph kü shuohtükpeih. Hanangkü bülem itpülei büpayü bühpü aimü jeiyongpa hean kü itei nenyangnyih,
hatü Judah amao jeihinaüthü khongkü wong kohpüba hatü vanglem lempü jom kübü vamjao jeiyongpa heanü Joseph kü shuohtükpeih.”
Jakobei hashongpa Reubenei hapeüthü: Hanokh, Pallu, Hezron hatü Karmi.
Joelei hapeüthü bü kü hü dheanpü bülem: Shemaiah, Gog, Shimei,
Mikah, Reaiah, Baal,
Beerah, büpayü Assyria ongpa Tiglath-Pileseri wüpküpei müei deilangpeih. Beerah-ü Reuben phang kü mübü hük nyuteke.
Reuben jat bülem nyangpü kü hathü phang mübüthü nyangei nyüke: Jeiel, Zekhariah,
hatü Bela, hathüyü Azazlei hapeüthü hatü Shemalei hüpeüthü Joel phang am. Jomü Aroer kübü Nebo hatü Baal-Meon thahshi nyu.
Heongphi kü jomi bhih kahdok kübü heihdaipü Euphrates yungyen thahshi kahdok kaamteke; mehenangkü Gilead kahdokei jomei yemhimakthü longi da.
Saul ongpa hepak kü jomi Hagar am hahteke hatü jom jütüktü Gilead heongphi kahdok kemei kaamlang.
Gadlei hühihathü Bashan kübü heihdaipü Salekah thahshi Reuben am mü dheanei nyu.
Joel amü peü mü longpü phang, Shapham am nyipabü, hapheikü Janai hatü Shaphat amü Bashanei nyu.
Shemdep aimü jomei phangthü hapakei: Mikhael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jakan, Zia hatü Eber peüshep jom nyet.
Hathüyü Hurilei cheha Abihailei hapeüthü nyuteke hatü jomei bühipathüyü hapakei: Abihail, Huri, Jaroah, Gilead, Mikhael, Jeshishai, Jahdo, Buz.
Abdielei cheha Ahi, Gunilei chehüyü jomei phang kü shangjing nyu.
Gad amü Gilead, Bashan hatü haleipü jilathü hatü Sharon kahdokthülei nyu.
Hathü bülem kemei Judah ongpa Jotham hatü Israel ongpa Jeroboam nyilei hepak kü nyangei tuhteke.
Reuben, Gad hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh jat hathülei veshanthü 44, 760 thahshi ii, yanlu hatü lahhilaong mekei nohen meishi nyuh-ei mantüktü nyuteke.
Jomi Hagar, Jetur, Naphish hatü Nodab jatthü khüei hok.
Hathü khüei hokhen shingvaishi Kahvangi jom kü sheüh, hatü Kahvangi Hagar hatü jom kü khüambakpüthü peü jomei lak kü shuoh; mehenangkü jomi vehok shingkao Kahvang kü len, hatü büpai jom kü jang.
Jomi Hagar amei yemhimakthüut haja 50, 000, mi 250, 000, hatü gadu 2, 000 yahteke. Jomi shennyak 100, 000 thahshi yepei lei,
hatü vehokpa Kahvangei vaipü nangkü vepathü longi jüteke, hatü wüpküpei mangdai thahshi jomi hapa kahdokei nyu.
Bhaosheipü Manasseh amü nanglak longi da; jomü Bashan kahdok kübü Baal-hermon, Senir hatü Hermon Kahshang thahshi chingchingei nyu.
Hathüyü jomei phangthü kü shangjingthü nyuteke: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah hatü Jahdiel. Jomphongü monglongpü veshan, men-e shennyak hatü phangthü kü shangjingthü nyuteke.
Shejao jomi chebü chepalei Kahvang touei mang thah, hatü Kahvangi jom toueipü mangtükpü hapa kahdokei nyupü nanglakthülei kahvangthü kü khümteke.

Hanangkü Israel Kahvangi Assyria am Pul (Tiglath-Pileser) ongpa vamhü hatü Reuben, Gad hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh am jat wüpküpei müei dai. Büpai hathü Halah, Habor, Hara hatü Gozan yungyenei ha nyih mü pangei tuhteke.
Levilei hapeüthü: Gershon, Kohath hatü Merari.
Kohathlei hapeüthü: Amram, Izhar, Hebron hatü Uzziel.
Amramei hapeüthü: Aaron, Mosa, hatü Mariam. Aaronei hapeüthü: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar hatü Ithamar.
Eleazarlei hühihathü bü kü hü dheanpü hapakei: Phinehas, Abishua,
Bukki, Uzzi,
Zerahiah, Meraioth,
Amariah, Ahitub,
Zadok, Ahimaaz,
Azariah, Johanan,
Azariah, (Jerusalemei Solomoni vepü Phopshemei ngongpa vaishi büpai chongphopeih),
Amariah, Ahitub,
Zadok, Shallum,
Hilkiah, Azariah,
Seraiah, hatü Jehozadak.
i Nebukadnezzar homei Judah hatü Jerusalem am wüpküpei shomshingkü Jehozadakao shomtükpeih.
Levilei hapeüthü: Gershon, Kohath hatü Merari.
Hathüyü Gershonei hapeüthü: Libni hatü Shimei.
Kohathlei hapeüthü: Amram, Izhar, Hebron hatü Uzziel.
Merarilei hapeüthü: Mahli hatü Mushi. Hathüyü laophülei bühipa aimü nyangpü Levi am phangthü nyüke.
Hathüyü Gershonei hühihathü bü kü hü dheanei nyangpü: Libni, Jahath, Zimmah,
Joab, Iddo, Zerah, Jeatherai.
Hathüyü Kohathlei hühihathü bü kü hü dheanei nyangpü: Amminadab, Korah, Assir,
Elkanah, Ebiasaph, Assir,
Tahath, Uriel, Uzziah hatü Shaul.
Elkanahlei hapeüthü: Amasai hatü Ahimoth.
Hathüyü Ahimothlei hühihathü bü kü hü dheanei nyangpü: Elkanah, Zophai, Nahath,
Eliab, Jeroham, Elkanah.
Samuelei hapeüthü: Hashongpa Joel hatü nyipabü Abijah.
Merarilei hühihathü bü kü hü dheanei nyangpü: Mahli, Libni, Shimei, Uzzah,
Shimea, Haggiah hatü Asaiah.
Phopshemei Vangpüshuwpü Pela koei leipheikü Davidi kesho nyahhai lokhen jepü shennyakthü.
Solomoni Jerusalemei phopshem mangve shekü hathüi ashakshemei kesho lokei chongphoteke. Jom kü tempü vanglem aimü hathüi laophülei dousho dük.
Hathüyü laophülei hapeüthü mü chemi chongphopüthü: Kohath am kübü: kesho lokbü Heman, Joelei cheha. Jomei bülem ieyei leipü Jakob thahshi hapakei: Heman, Joel, Samuel,
Elkanah, Jeroham, Eliel, Toah,
Zuph, Elkanah, Mahath, Amasai,
Elkanah, Joel, Azariah, Zephaniah,
Tahath, Assir, Ebiasaph, Korah,
Izhar, Kohath, Levi, Jakob.
Asaph-ü Heman mü nyipabü sheühteipü kesho mübü nyuteke. Jomei bülem Levi thahshi ieyei leipü hapakei: Asaph, Berekhiah, Shimea,
Mikhael, Baaseiah, Malkijah,
Ethni, Zerah, Adaiah,
Ethan, Zimmah, Shimei,
Jahath, Gershon, Levi.
Ethanü Merari phang kübü jempabü kesho mübü nyuteke. Jomei bülem Levi thahshi ieyei leipü hapakei: Ethan, Kishi, Abdi, Mallukh,
Hashabiah, Amaziah, Hilkiah,
Amzi, Bani, Shemer,
Mahli, Mushi, Merari, Levi.
Jomei Levi am küphüthü peü kü phopshemei lebü doushothü dükhen hanteke.

Shejao Aaron hatü büpalei hühihathüi Kahvang chongphobü Mosai epükei Israel am shingvaishi Longi Daülangpü Shingei dükhen epü vanglem keiha jakpü moila shuohpü moidü hatü ayingshü moidülei moila shuohteke.
Hathüyü Aaronei hühihathü: Eleazar, Phinehas, Abishua,
Bukki, Uzzi, Zerahiah,
Meraioth, Amariah, Ahitub,
Zadok hatü Ahimaaz.
Hathü shingü Aaronei hühihathü Kohath am phang kü nyuhen shuohpü kahdok viongmangyong nyüke; mehenangkü shongpüba phong jom kü hetteke.
Jom kü Judah kahdok Hebron mü shinpü phaümük shuoh.
Shejao chingnyü kü shinpü kah hatü chingthüyü Jephunnehlei cheha Kaleb kü shuoh.
Hanangkü Aaronei hühihathü kü Hebron (shojo ching), Libnah, Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Hilen, Debir,
Ashan, hatü Beth-Shemesh mü hapa kü shinpü phaümükthü shuoh.
Benjamin am jat leipü jom kü, Geba, Alemeth hatü Anathoth mü phaüthü omshi shuoh. Kohath am phangthü kü hanpü jilathü peüshep anpüjem nyu.
Aopü Kohath am phang kü bhaosheipü Manasseh amei jilathü an thahshi phong kü hetpü aimü shuoh.
Gershon am phang kü Issakhar, Asher, Naphtali hatü Bashanei nyupü Manasseh jat amei jilathü anpüjem thahshi shuoh.
Merari am phang kü Reuben, Gad hatü Zebulun jatthü leipü jila anpünyi shuoh.
Hanangkü Israel ami Levi am kü hathü jilathü hatü phaümükthü shuoh.
Judah, Simeon hatü Benjamin jatthü leipü jilathü sholei men shuoh-ei nyupükei shuohteke.
Kohath am phang hanei kü Ephraim jat amei jilathü hanei shuoh.
Ephraim phaüshang kahmük leipü jom kü shojo ching Shekhem, Gezer,
Jokneam, Beth-Horon,
Aijalon, hatü Gathrimmon mü yemhimak het yemhah shing phaümük omshi shuoh,
hatü bhaosheipü Manasseh jat leipü jom kü Aner hatü Bileam nyi mü yemhimaki het yemhah shing phaümük omshi shuoh.
Gershon am kü hathü jilathü mü yemhimak het yemhah shing phaümük omei hapakei shuoh: Heongphi Manasseh am jat kübü Bashan leipü Golan, hatü Ashtaroth shuoh.
Issakhar am jat kübü Kedesh, Daberath,
Ramoth hatü Anem.
Asher am jat kübü Mashal, Abdon,
Hukok hatü Rehob shuoh.
Naphtali am jat kübü Galil leipü Kedesh, Hammon, hatü Kiriathaim shuoh.
Aopü Merari am phang kü hathü jilathü hatü yemhimak het yemhah shing phaümük shuoh: Zebulun am jat kübü Rimmono, hatü Tabor.
Jeriko haolei Jordan yungyen heongphi kü Reuben am jat kübü Bezer kahjishong, Jahzah,
Kedemoth hatü Mephaath shuoh.
Gad am jat kübü Gilead leipü Ramoth, Mahanaim,
Heshbon hatü Jazer shuoh.
Issakharlei hapeüthü: Tola, Puah, Jashub, hatü Shimronpeüshep jom ali.
Tolalei hapeüthü: Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam, hatü Shemuel. Jomphongü Tola am phang shemdep ieyei kü shangjing hatü veshanthü nyu. David ongpa hepak kü jom bhei-ie 22, 600 nyu.
Uzzilei hapeüthü: Izrahiah. Izrahiahlei hapeüthü: Mikhael, Obadiah, Joel, hatü Isshiah. Jom ngaphen shangjingthü nyuteke.
Jomei nyüha hatü hapeüthü longi nyupü nangkü veshan dousho kü shennyak 36, 000 shuohhen aokshi nyu.
Issakhar jat kübü bülem aimü shem amthü veshan dousho kü shüaokhen nanglak itshuohjü jom 87, 000 thahshi nyu.
Benjaminei hapeüthü jom jem: Bela, Beker hatü Jediael.
Belalei hapeüthü: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth hatü Iri. Jomphongü phang kü shemdep ieyeilei shangjing hatü veshanthü nyu. Veshan dousho kü shüaokhen mü jomei nanglak 22, 034 nyu.
Bekerlei hapeüthü Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth hatü Alemeth. Jom peü Bekerlei hapeüthü nyu.
Veshan dousho kü shüaokhen mü jomei nanglak 20, 200 nyu.
Jediaelei hapeü: Bilhan. Bilhanei hapeüthü: Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Kenaanah, Zethan, Tarshish hatü Ahishahar.
Jediaelei hapeüthü peü shemdep kü shangjingthü nyu. Veshan dousho kü shüaokhen mü jomei nanglak 17, 200 nyu.
Shuppim hatü Huppim amü Irlei hühihathü nyu, hatü Hushim amü Aherlei hühihathü nyu.
Naphtalilei hapeüthü: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer hatü Bilhahlei cheha Shallum.
Manassehlei hühihathü: Aramea am yiükphüi bühpü yeshang Asriel hatü Makir nyi nyu. Makiryü Gileadei chepa nyu.
Makiri Huppim hatü Shuppim nyi shingvaishi nyüha yah. Büpalei chenaüei (nyüha) menü Maakah nyu. Makirlei nyipabü hapeü-ü Zelophehad nyu, hatü büpalei yiükha mon nyu.
Makirlei chenyüha Maakah-i yeshang nyi büh hatü jomi naü nyi kü Peresh hatü Sheresh shei men. Pereshlei yeshang nyi Ulam hatü Rakem shei nyu.
Ulamei hapeü: Bedan. Hathüyü Makirlei cheha, Manassehlei chehü Gileadei hühihathü nyuteke.
Gileadei chenaü (nyüha) Hammoleketh-i Ishhod, Abiezer hatü Mahlah hathü büh.
Shemidalei hapeüthü: Ahian, Shekhem, Likhi, hatü Aniam.
Ephraimei hühihathü bü kü hü dheanei nyangpü: Shuthelah, Bered, Tahath, Eleadah, Tahath,
Zabad, Shuthelah. Shuthelah mü lenei Ephraimei hapeü nyi nyu: Ezer hatü Elead nyiyü Gathlei nyupü jempü jat shennyakei yemhimak gühhen peija shingkü jütük.
Jiji nangkü chepa Ephraimi nyih longi mahng thep hatü büpalei shem ami büpa mong nyiushem meihühen peiteke.
Hapheikü büpai chenyüha mü jem, hatü pinnyü büm nekongi lei, hatü yeshang hük büh. Büpai naü kü Beriah shei men; mehenangkü jomei shemong kü vongshüh pongteke.
Ephraimei yiükha Sheerah nyu. Pinnyüi Dokpa hatü Maaipa Beth-Horon, hatü Uzzen-sheerah jilathü agteke.
Shao Ephraimei cheha hük Rephah shei mentü nyu, hatü ha kübü hühihathü hapakei: Reseph, Telah, Tahan,
Ladan, Ammihud, Elishama,
Nun hatü Joshua.

Jomi yahpü kahmük kü Bethel hatü ha kü shonpü jilathü; heong philei Naaran, heshü philei Gezer hatü haleipü jilathü, hatü Shekhem hatü haleipü jilathü kübü heihpü Ayyah hatü haleipü jilathü thahshi nyuteke.
Manasseh am mü baongpü viongthüyü Beth-Shean, Taanakh, Megiddo hatü Dor hathü mü jomei jilathü nyu. Jakobei cheha Josephei hühihathü hathü jila kü nyupeih.
Asherlei hühihathü: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, hatü chenaü (nyüha) Serah nyuteke.
Beriahlei hapeüthü: Heber hatü Malkiel. Malkiel-ü Birzaithlei chepa nyu.
Heberyü Japhlet, Shomer, Hotham hatü jomphongei chenaü (nyüha) Shua, hathülei chepa nyu.
Japhletlei hapeüthü: Pasakh, Bimhal, hatü Ashvah. Hathüyü Japhletlei hapeüthü khih.
Shomerlei hapeüthü: Ahi, Rohgah, Hubbah, hatü Aram.
Büpalei chenaü Hothamei hapeü ali nyu: Zophah, Imna, Shelesh hatü Amal.
Zophahlei hapeüthü: Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran hatü Beera.
Jetherlei hapeüthü: Jephunneh, Pispa hatü Ara.
Ullalei hapeüthü: Arah, Hanniel, hatü Rizia.
Hathü peü Asherlei hühihathü, shemdep kü shangjingthü, men-e vehokpü shennyakthü, hatü mübü meipüthü nyu. Veshan dousho kü shüaokhen mü jomei nanglak 26, 000 thahshi nyu.
Benjaminei hashongpa Bela, nyipabü Ashbel, jempabü Aharah,
alipabü Nohah hatü ngapabü Rapha.
Belalei hapeüthü: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan hatü Huram.
Hathüyü Ehudei hühihathü (jomphongü Gebalei nyupü phangthülei shangjingthü nyuteke, hatü jomphongü Manahath wüpküpei yah-ei daiteke):
Naaman, Ahijah hatü Gera. Gerayü Uzza hatü Ahihud nyilei chepa nyu hatü büpai jiji müei dai.
Shaharaimi chenyüha Hushim hatü Baara nyi mü yanei Moablei nyushi,
chenyüha Hodesh-i Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malkam,
Jeuz, Sakhia hatü Mirmah hathü bühjateke. Hathüyü büpalei hapeüthü shemdep ieyei kü shangjingthü nyu.
Hushimi Abitub hatü Elpaal nyi bühjateke.
Elpaalei hapeüthü: Eber, Misham, Shemed (büpai Ono hatü Lod hatü shonpü jilathü ling).
Beriah hatü Shema, (jijinyiyü Aijalonei nyupü shemdepthülei shangjing nyu, hatü Gathlei nyupüthü changtükpeih).
Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Mikhael, Ishpah hatü Joha hathüao Beriahlei hapeüthü nyuteke.
Elpaalei hapeüthü: Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Izliah hatü Jobab.
Shimeilei hapeüthü: Jakim, Zikhri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, hatü Shimrath.
Shashakei hapeüthü: Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikhri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
Iphdeiah hatü Penuel.
Jerohamei hapeüthü: Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah hatü Zikhri.
Hathüyü shemdepthü kü shangjingthü, shongnyü phangthü. Jomphongü Jerusalemei nyuteke.
Jeiel-i Gibeon ching ag, hatü halei nyu. Chenyühayü Maakah nyu,
hatü hashongpayü Abdon, hapheikü Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zeker
hatü Mikloth, hatü büpayü Shimeahlei chepa nyuteke. Jomphongao jomei shem am yopailei Jerusalemei nyu.
Ner-ü Kishlei chepa, Kish-ü Saulei chepa nyu, hatü Saul-ü Jonathan, Malkishua, Abinadab hatü Esh-Baal hathülei chepa nyu.
Jonathanei hapeüthü: Merib-Baal-ü Mikahlei chepa nyu.
Mikahlei hapeüthü: Pithon, Melekh, Tarea hatü Ahaz.
Ahaz-ü Jehoaddahlei chepa, Jehoaddahyü Alemeth, Azmaveth hatü Zimrilei chepa, Zimriyü Mozalei chepa,
Mozayü Binealei chepa, Bineayü Raphahlei chepa, Raphahyü Eleasahlei chepa hatü Eleasah-ü Azelei chepa nyu.
Azelei hapeü jom vokei menthü: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah hatü Hanan. Jom peü Azelei hapeüthü nyu.
Azelei chenaü Eshekei hapeüthü jem nyu: Ulam, Jeush, hatü Eliphelet.
Ulamei hapeüthüyü monglongpü vehokbüthü, jomphongi lahhilaong longi meishi kapaokteke. Büpalei hüpeü hapeü peüshep 150 thahshi nyu. Hathü kemei Benjaminei hühihathü nyuteke.
Israel am peü bülem aimü nyangei nyüke, hatü hapayü Israel am ongpathülei Laitap kü nyangei nyüpeih.
Judah nanglakthüyü hingnelempü nangkü Babylon wüpküpei yah-ei daipeih.
Laophülei jilathülei leiyei laophülei mükjüp shing kü shongei uohenü Israel am, ngongpathü, Levi am hatü phopshemei chongphopüthü nyuteke.
Judah, Benjamin, Ephraim hatü Manasseh leipü Jerusalemei nyupeyü hathü nyuteke:
Judahlei cheha Perezlei hapeüthü kübü Banilei cheha Imri, Imrilei cheha Omri, Omrilei cheha Ammihud hatü Ammihudei cheha Uthai nyu.
Shilon am kübü: Hashongpa Asaiah hatü büpalei hapeüthü.
Zerah am kübü: Jeuel. Judah am nanglak bhei-ie 690 nyu.
Benjamin am kübü: Hassenuahlei cheha Hodaviah, Hodaviahlei cheha Meshullam, Meshullamei cheha Sallu;
Ibneiahlei cheha Jehoram; Mikrilei cheha Uzzi, Uzzilei cheha Elah; hatü Ibnijahlei cheha Reuel, Reuelei cheha Shephatiah, Shephatiahlei cheha Meshullam.
Benjamin jat kübü nanglak bhei-ie 956 nyu, hatü jom peü shemdep kü shangjingthü nyuteke.
Ngongpathü: Jedaiah; Jehoiarib; Jakhin.
Hilkiahlei cheha Azariah büpayü phopshemei lakchongbü longpü nyu, hatü büpalei bühipathü hapakei: Meshullam, Zadok, Meraioth, hatü Ahitub;

hatü Malkijahlei cheha Pashhur, Pashhurlei cheha Jehoram, Jehoramei cheha Adaiah, hatü Immerlei cheha Meshillemith, Meshillemithlei cheha Meshullam, Meshullamei cheha Jahzerah, Jahzerahlei cheha Adiel, Adielei cheha Maasai.
Ngongpathü shemdep kü shangjingthü nanglak bhei-ie jom 1, 760 nyuteke. Jomphongü
Levi am kübü: Merari am Hashabiahlei cheha Azrikam, Azrikamei cheha Hasshub, Hasshubei cheha Semaiah;
Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal hatü Asaphei cheha Zikhri, Zekrilei cheha Mika, Mikalei cheha Mattaniah;
Jeduthunei cheha Galal, Galalei cheha Shemaiah, Shemaiahlei cheha Obadiah; hatü Netophath amei jilathü kü nyupü Elkanahlei cheha Asa, Asalei cheha Berekhiah.
Shaden yombüthü: Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, hatü chenaüthü. Shallumü jomei mübü vaipü nangkü,
ongpalei shaden heong philei yomei nyu. Hathüyü Levi amei baümtap shaden yombüthü nyu.
Korelei cheha Shallum, Ebiashaphei chehü, Korahlei hüshom hatü jempü Kohath am shemthüyü jomei bühipai
Sheleiyü Eleazarlei cheha Phinehasyü shaden yombüthü kü mübü nyu, hatü
Meshelemiahlei cheha Zekhariah-ü Ashakshem shaden yombü nyu.
Shaden yomhen jepüthü peüshep 212 nyu. Jomphongü jom nyupü ching aimü men nyangteke. Jom hapa shaden yompü dousho kü nyuhenü David hi Samuel thibü nyi-i hanteke.
Jomei bühipathü
Shaden yombüthüyü shing ali kü heong, heshü, apsha hatü pehe shei nyu.
Jomei jeihinaüthü ching leipü hepak hepak kü peiyei nyih nyet shingvaishi dousho kü sheühteiyei dükhamteke.
Shejao shongnyü shaden yompü Levi am jom ali keyü phopshem leipü dungthü hatü dou tuhshing yomhen dousho shuoh.
Jomphong yanüngao Kahvangei shem shinei yomei paümhamteke; mehenangkü jomü ha yomhen jiüpü nyu, hatü hapa phopshem nepjeih aphen sabi jomei lakei tuh.
Levi am haneiyü phopshemei noteipü dükhi-ümthü kü veihen dousho han. Yah-ei daishingkü hatü leishingkü jomi ietü ietü tuhhamteke.
Lebüthü keyü uoshing yaongshing, daülangpü dükhi-ümthü, atta, yiü, mainga, ayingshü hatü hetnyai kü veihen dousho han.
Shejao ngongpathü hanei keyü hetnyai vukhen dousho shuoh.
Levi am Mattithiah shei menpü Korah am Shallumei hashongpa keyü moila aan oukhen dousho han.
Kohath am hanei keyü Sabbath nyih ieyei kü haüdülei aan temei haühen dousho han.
Kesho lokbüthü, Levi shemdep kü shangjingthüyü phopshem dung haneilei nyu, hatü jomphong keyü lebü dousho kü shoti shuohteke; mehenangkü nyakhingai thüngei jomei dousho nyuteke.
Hathüyü Levi am shemdep kü shangjingthü, jomei bülem aimü nyangpü nyüke, hatü jomphongü Jerusalemei nyu.
Jeieli Gibeon ching ag hatü halei nyu. Büpalei chenyühayü Maakah nyu,
hatü büpalei hashongpayü Abdon hapheikü müpü Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekhariah hatü Mikloth nyu.
Mikloth-ü Shimeamei chepa nyu. Jomphongao jomei shem am yopailei Jerusalemei nyu.
Ner-ü Kishlei chepa, Kish-ü Saulei chepa, hatü Saulü Jonathan, Malkishua, Abinadab hatü Esh-Baal hathülei chepa nyu.
Jonathanei hapeüthü: Merri-Baalü Mikahlei chepa nyu.
Mikahlei hapeüthü: Pithon, Melekh, Tahrea, hatü Ahaz.
Ahaz-ü Jarahlei chepa, Jarah-ü Alemeth, Azmaveth hatü Zimri hathülei chepa, Zimriyü Mozalei chepa,
Mozayü Binealei chepa, Bineayü Rephaiahlei chepa, Rephaiah-ü Eleasahlei chepa, Eleasah-ü Azelei chepa nyu.
Azelei hapeüthü jom vok nyu, hatü men hapakei: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah hatü Hanan. Jomphongü Azelei hapeüthü nyuteke.
Shaang Philistia ami Israel am khüei hok; Israel am thepju kübü nyai hatü Gilboa Kahshangei longi mah.
Philistia ami Saul hatü chehathü phei thah, hatü jomi Saulei cheha Jonathan, Abinadab hatü Malkishua hathü jü.
Saul shonei vehok longi mangshi hok hatü vepathüi lah kaptü nemei-i ma yahhü.

Saul-i büpalei lahhilaong kobü kü, “Nüngei yan yah-ei ngei jütüktuh; hei nevaijema nejaptükpüthü peiyei ngei kü deyeinaamei lingphahen khih” shei e. Shejao büpalei lahhilaong kobüi nyemei deih, hatü ha nedükshuoh; hanangkü Sauli laophü nyingi yan yah-ei baphahtü di.
Mechem lahhilaong kobüi Saul dipü eepa, büpaiyao büpalei yan yah-ei baphahtü di.
Hanangkü Saul hatü chehathü jom jemphen hatü büpalei shem am peü chemi di.
Mechem kahjilei nyupü Israel am peüi veshanthü nyaidaipü hatü Saul hatü chehathü didaipü eepa, jomi laophülei jilathü tuhtü nyaidaikem, hatü Philistia am peiyei kaamlang.
Nyihphei, mechem Philistia ami dipü mahngthü leipü büm bomei yahhen peijapa, jomphong kü Saul hatü chehathü Gilboa Kahshangei diyei shükshi chongjateke.
Jomi büm kemei bomei yah hatü büpalei shangjing dakei lahhilaong peü yahtü Philistia kahdok peü lemei jomei lajei hatü nanglakthü touei hapa shahjang koei shahjang kobüthü shom.
Jomi büpalei lahhilaong jomei kahvangei phopshemei tuh, hatü büpalei shangjing Dagon kahvang khümshemei sheüshi tuh.
Mechem Jabesh-gileadei nyupüthüi Saul kü Philistia ami dükpü jung lemphü danpa,
jomei monglongpü veshanthü heih-ei Saul hatü chehathülei mahng Jabeshlei yahei leiteke. Hapheikü jomi hathülei mahng longkhampü phangei vüei tuh hatü nyih nyet shüaeiyungle.
Saul-ü
shejao
Israel am peü Hebronei David touei thai hatü büpa kü, “Hamphongü nüngei iy hatü phai.
Peihdaipü nyih kao mechem Saul ong vaipa, nüngi Israel nanglak vehokei müei daipeih, hatü
Mechem Israel am behethü peü Hebronei David touei peipa, büpai Hebronei jomphong mü
David hatü Israel am peü Jebus sheiyao epü Jerusalemei heih.
Halei nyupü Jebus ami David kü, “Nüng ha mongei teshükei” shei e. Shejoongpa Davidi Zion penyüsha kaamei yah hatü ha kü “David Chingnyü” shei nyük.
Davidi hathü kü, “Üpai shongei Jebus am jühenshang, büpayü veshan kü longpü hatü mübü vaihen” shei etüktü nyu. Zeruiahlei cheha Joab shong aongei jü hatü mübü leiteke.
Davidi penyüsha touei shem vetü nyu, hatü hapa kü “David Chingnyü” shei nyük.
Kahshang kü heongphi kü kahdok shaokpü Millo shing kübü pangei büpai chingnyü ling hatü Joabi aopü chingnyüthü lingei lei,
hatü Davidü nyeinya wong kohpüba lei; mehenangkü
Hathüyü
Hapayü Davidei wong kohpü veshanthü jung nyangpü nyüke: Jashobeamü Hakhmoni am phang kübü “Jem” khongkü mübü nyuteke. Büpai laophülei phungi shennyak kho jem shan hük kü jü.
Jem khongkü nyipabü Ahoh am Dodolei cheha Eleazar nyu.
Philistia am hoknüng hatouei thaiyei nyushingkü büpa David mü Pas-Dammimlei nyu. Shaang barley hah mon maei nyupü kah hük nyu; Philistia am kü nyemei veshanthü nyaidai.
Shejao büpa hatü David nyi hapa kah jiamei show lingtü Philistia am jü, hatü
Philistia veshanthü Rephaim kahjilei baümtap vetü nyupü hepak kü veshan longpü hapüan khong kübü jom jem Adullam yaongsha yopai leipü David nyupü yaongnyü touei yiü.
Hahepak kü Davidü pe showtükpü kahshangei nyu, hatü Philistia amü Jerusalemei küpshi nyu.
Davidi yahyangei, “Oh, hanei ami Bethlehem penyüsha yopai leipü yungkuk leipü yung yinghen yahphülangmeyo!” shei e.
Hanangkü veshan jom jemi Philistia amei show benei shüei Bethlehem penyüsha yopai leipü yungkuk leipü yung shoei David touei leijateke. Shejao büpai ha nenyingi

Büpai e, “Ngei ha yinghenü Kahvangi nemongnyih; ngei ha yingjema hapa leihen nangkü yangnyu lanei shuoh-ei daipüthülei iy yingpükei vamhen khih. Davidi ha neying; mehenangkü hathüi ha leihen yangnyu lanei shuohpeih. Veshan jom jemi hapa dou dükteke.”
Joabei chenaü Abishaiyü jom hapüan khongkü longpü nyu. Büpai phung mon notü shennyak kho jem mü hok hatü hathü jüteke. Hanangkü büpayü “Jem” keiha men-e lei.
Büpayü “Jem” mao nyeinya men-e lei, hatü jomphongei mübü vaiteke; shejao büpa “Jem” mü omei nenyu.
Kabzeel leipü Jehoiadalei cheha Benaiahyü men-e veshan hük nyu; büpai dou longpü dük; büpai Moab am veshan meipü nyi jütük. Büpai shü vüpü nyih kü kahshalei shüei mailang hük jü.

Shao büpai Ijip am shennyak hük feet nyet mü bhaoei nyupü jü. Hapa Ijip naühalei phungü miyaung kei nyulangmao Benaiah-i lenshuoh mon notü büpa jütük. Büpai hapa Ijip naühalei phung aetei yahtü büpalei phungi-üng hümei jü.
Hathüyü Jehoiadalei cheha Benaiah-i dükpü douthü; büpayao wong kohpü shennyak “Jem” keiha men-e lei,
shejao “Jem” kei payü nethü. Davidi büpayü büpalei bümyom veshan vaishi tuh.
Wong kohpü veshanthüyü Joabei chenaü Asahel, Bethlehem leipü Dodolei cheha Elhanan,
Harod am Shammoth, Pelon am Helez,
Tekoa leipü Ikkeshlei cheha Ira, Anathoth leipü Abiezer,
Hushath am Sibbekai, Ahoh am Ilai,
Netophath am Maharai, Netophath am Baanahlei cheha Heled,
Benjamin kahdok Gibeah leipü Ribailei cheha Ithai, Pirathon am Benaiah,
Gaash Kahjilei leipü Hurai, Arbath am Abiel,
Baharum am Azmaveth, Shaalbon am Eliahba,
Gizon am Hashemei hapeüthü, Harar am Shageelei cheha Jonathan,
Harar am Sakharlei cheha Ahiam, Urlei cheha Eliphal,
Mekerath am Hepher, Pelon am Ahijah,
Karmel am Hezro, Ezbailei cheha Naarai,
Nathanei chenaü Joel, Hagrilei cheha Mibhar,
Ammon am Zelek, Beroth am Naharai, Zeruiahlei cheha Joabei lahhilaong kobü,
Ithri am Ira, Ithri am Gared,
Hit am Uriah, Ahlailei cheha Zabad,
Reuben am Shizalei cheha Adina; büpayü Reuben amei mübü nyu; büpa mü hapüan thahshi nyu,
Maakahlei cheha Hanan, Mithni am Joshaphat,
Ashterath am Uzzia, Aroer am Hothamei cheha Shamma hatü Jeiel nyi,
Tiz am Shimrilei cheha Jediael hatü Joha nyi,
Mahavah am Eliel, Elnaamei cheha Jeribai hatü Joshaviah nyi, Moab am Ithmah,
Mezoba am Eliel, Obed hatü Jaasiel hathü nyuteke.
Kishlei cheha Saul toueipü laongei daiyei nyushi Ziklagei David touei peipü shennyakthü hathü nyu, hatü jomi büpa kü vehok kü sheühteke.
Jomphongü pülah kaphen nevaijü yaong dungtü laknyong lakdah kü shükhen manpüthü nyu; jomphongü Benjamin jat Saulei shem am nyu:
Gibeah am Shemaahlei cheha Ahiezer jomei mübü hatü Joash, Azmavethlei cheha Jeziel hatü Pelet; Anathoth am Berakah hatü Jehu;
hatü Gibeon am Ishmaiah, Hapüan khongkü wong kohpü, Hapüan khongkü mübü; Gederah am Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan, Jozabad;
Huphath am Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Shemariah hatü Shephatiah;
Kohath am Elkanah, Isshiah, Azarel, Joezer hatü Jashobeam;
hatü Gedor leipü Jerohamei cheha Joelah hatü Zebadiah hathü nyuteke.

Bhih kahdok leipü penyüshalei David nyushingkü Gad am hanei David mü om. Jomphongü monglongpü veshan, vehok hokhen temtüktü nyupü, hatü ii hatü phung nohen manpüthü nyu. Jomei dheyü mailangei dhe keiha hatü jomphongü vakhi-ong kü meiyah kei mokaokpüthü nyu.
Peü mü shopeyü Ezer, nyipabü kü Obadiah, jempabü kü Eliab,
alipabü kü Mishmannah, ngapabü kü Jeremiah,
vokpabü kü Attai, nyetpabü kü Eliel,
shetpabü kü Johanan, shüpabü kü Elzabad,
anpabü kü Jeremiah hatü anpühükpabü kü Makbannai nyuteke.
Hathü Gad amü veshan mübüthü mon nyu; maanpeih shei kho hük shak kü hatü longpeyü haja shak kü mübüthü nyu.
Jordan phang küppei yung longpü kü shongei yung homei heihpeyü jom nyuteke, hatü jomi heong heshü kü kahjilei nyupüthü peü changtük.
Benjamin am hanei hatü Judah am David touei Penyüshalei heihteke.

Davidi jom mü pongteinüng heih-ei jom kü, “Ammi ngei mü mongjem ponghen, ngei kü sheühhen peiküpü vaijema, ngei am mü mongdang hük leihen; shejao ammi ngelei vepathü touei ngei kü lueilemhen peiküpü vaijema, ngelei laki ten meheyao nedükjao jenei bühipathülei Kahvangi ha eehen hatü am kü shahphenhen.” shei e.
Hahepak kü “Hapüan” khongkü mübü Amasai touei Kahvang laangha pei hatü e:
“Hamphongü nüngei, Oh David!
Ham nüng mü nyüpeih, Oh Jesselei cheha!
Aokpü dangtuh, nüng aokpü dangtuh,
hatü nüng kü sheühpüthü aokpü danghütuh!
Mehenangkü nüngei Kahvangi nüng kü sheühhen.”
Hanangkü Davidi jom yah, hatü büpalei veshanthü shak kü lakchongbüthü leihü.

Mechem Saul khüei hokhen shingvaishi Philistia am mü David daipa, hahepak kü Manasseh am hanei David mü shepteke. Büpa hatü veshanthüi Philistia am kü nesheüh; mehenangkü büpai büpalei shembü Saul touei jen deiyei luphahen khih shei jomei ongthüi nyemei deih; hanangkü jomi shah shuohteitü büpa Ziklag lemei shomtük.
Mechem David Ziklagei heihpa, hathü Manasseh ami büpa mü shepteke: Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Mikhael, Jozabad, Elihu hatü Zillethai. Jom peü Manasseh kü haja dok kü mübüthü nyu.
Jomi vehok kü David kü sheüh; mehenangkü jom peü monglongpü veshanthü nyu, hatü jomphongü büpalei veshan mübüthü nyu.
Kahvangei veshanthü kei veshanthü longi manglei thahshi nyihjeih shennyakthü David touei peiyei sheüh.
Judah am jom 6, 800
Simeon am 7, 100;
Levi am 4, 600,
Aaron am shem mübü Jehoiada mü shennyak 3, 700,
hatü monglongpü nethe veshan Zadok mü jomei shemdep kübü lakchongbüthü jom hapünyi;
hapa shan thahshi Saul kü mong kemei shuohshi nyupü Saulei jeihinaü Benjamin am 3, 000;
Benjamin phang kü monglongpü men-e veshanthü 20, 800;
Heshüphi Manasseh kübü David ong vaihühen nangkü men yepei jepü shennyak 18, 000;
Issakhar am hepak vangpan nyingpü hatü Israel ami mepa dükhen nyingpü longpüthü jom 200 mü jom phang kübü shem am peü;
Zebulun am veshan dousho lekei nyingpü hokhen lahhilaong changshi temtü ajükiyao mong aampü neshiüi lanei shuohpü jom 50, 000;
Naphtali am lakchongbüthü 1, 000 mü ii hatü phung temei kotü jom 37, 000;
Dan am hokhen temtüktü jom 28, 600;
Asher am veshan dousho lekei nyingpü hokhen temtüktü jom 40, 000;
Jordan heongphi leipü, Reuben, Gad hatü Heongphi leipü Manasseh am lahhilaong lemphüli temtü 120, 000 nyuteke.
Hathü veshanthü peü hokhen temtüktü Israel am peü shak kü David ong vaihühen nangkü Hebronei pei. Aopü Israel am peü David ong vaihühen shei mong hük mü nyu.
Hathü shennyakthü peü halei nyih jem thahshi David mü hah-ei yingei nyu; mehenangkü jomei shem ami hahying shomteke.

Shao jomei chingyowthü Issakhar, Zebulun, hatü Naphtali thahshi kübü gadu, ut, koyei hatü mohohthü kü hahying kohütü pei. Halei atta, adhajük, nyalingngupai van, yiü, olive mainga, mohoh hatü mi changshi shuohteke; Israel kü mongongmongle maei nyu.
Davidi haja shak kü, kho shak kü veshan mübüthü hatü lakchongbüthü peü mü danteipü longpü nyu.
Büpai hahepak kü Israel am thaipü khong peü kü, “Am kü ha meipü khih shei deihjema, hatü hapayü
Jeni jen touei jenei Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela leishah; mehenangkü Sauli vanglem lempü hepak kü hapa baong neyemi tuhtükpeih” shei e.
Thaipü nanglakthü peüi hapa kü mong; mehenangkü hapayü nanglak peüi jiüangke shei deihteke.
Hanangkü Davidi Israel am peü Ijip leipü Shihor Yungyen kübü Lebo-hamath thahshi Kiriath-Jearim leipü Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela leihen shingvaishi thaihü.
David hatü büpa mü Israel am peü cherubim nyi aa kü uoshi nyupü
Jomi Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela Abinadabei shem leipü mohoh khari ja hük kü shihtü Uzzah hi Ahio nyi-i ha mütü lei.
David hatü Israel am kemei jomei wong kempai Kahvang kü harp, cymbal, phaam hatü amit vüngei kesho lok.
Mechem jom Kidon leipü hah tenshing ngoipa, mohohbaongi huluh shuohpü nangkü Uzzah-i hapa Vangpüshuwpü Pela kü laki dük.
i Uzzah kü mongshih, hatü Vangpüshuwpü Pela kü laki dükpü nangkü büpa jütük. Hanangkü büpa hatou mü Kahvang touei di.
i mongshihpai Uzzah kü mongshih-ei jütükpü nangkü David mongshih, hatü hapa shingkü shaang thahshi Perez-uzzah shei nyüknyüke.
Ha nyih Davidi
Büpai hapa Vangpüshuwpü Pela büpa mü David Chingnyülei koei nelei, shejao Gath am Obed-Edom shei epülei shemei leiyei tuh.
Lenyang jem thahshi hapa Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela Obed-Edomei shemei tuh, hatü
Shaang Tyre am Hiram ongpai David touei phongmokbüthü mü cedar pü, yaong mistri, hatü büpa shing ongshem vehen mistrithü shomteke.
Israel shak kü ong vaihen shingvaishi
Jerusalemei Davidi nyüha longi yah, hatü hapeüthü longilei pa leiteke.
Büpa kü halei nyushi angjapü hapeüthülei men hathü nyüke: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Beeliada hatü Eliphelet.
Mechem Israel shak kü ong vaihen David jeteke shei Philistia ami danpa, jomei veshanthü kemei büpa yephen aong, shejao Davidi ha danei jom mü hoknüng dai.
Shaang Philistia am peiyei Rephaim kahji hah;
hanangkü Davidi Kahvang kü, “Ngei Philistia am mü hoknüng dai-üla? Nüngi ngelei lak kü jom shuoh-üla?” shei phe.

Hanangkü Davidi Baalperazimei aongei halei jom neütük. “Yungnyü büngi bhümpü keiha Kahvangi ngelei lak homei ngelei vepathü khüei beneilangei dükteke.” shei Davidi e. Hanangkü hapa shingkü Baal-perazim shei nyüknyüke.
Philistia ami jomei kahvangthü halei yakphong; hanangkü Davidi hathü aw kü jaktükhen ngeükhüam shuoh.
Shao chem Philistia ami hapa kahji hahteke;
hanangkü shao chem Davidi Kahvang kü phe, hatü Kahvangi büpa kü, “Nüngi laülüki te-aong, shejao jom shinei yaongtuh, hatü balsam pü lemeipü jüei pangtuh.
Mechem nüngi balsam pümoungei nyaiteipü ngeü danhenshang, hokhen vamei daituh; mehenangkü hapayü Philistia veshanthü jühen am shekü Kahvang dainyu khih shei nyingtuh” shei jangei e.
Hanangkü Kahvangi epükei Davidi dük, hatü jomi Philistia am veshanthü Gibeon kübü Gezer thahshi jü.
Kahdok peülei Davidei men baongeiyaüei dai, hatü
David Chingnyülei Davidi laophü shing shem veyei tempheikü, büpai Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela tuhhen shing hük ling, hatü hapa shing ashakshem hük ve.
Hapheikü Davidi, “Üpaiyao nevai, shejao Levi ami hapa Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela kohen; mehenangkü
Davidi
Büpai Aaronei hühihathü hatü Levi am chemi nyük:
Kohathlei hühihathü Ariel mübü mü jom shem am 120;
Merarilei hühihathü, Asaiah mübü mü jom shem am 220;
Gershonei hühihathü, Joel mübü mü jom shem am 130;
Elizaphanei hühihathü, Shemaiah mübü mü jom shem am 200;
Hebronei hühihathü, Eliel mübü mü jom shem am 80;
Uzzielei hühihathü, Amminadab mübü mü jom shem am 112 nyu.
Hapheikü Davidi Zadok ngongpa Abiathar, hatü Levi am Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel hatü Amminadab hathü kü nyük.
Büpai jomphong kü, “Amphongü Levi phangthü kü mübüthü khih; amphong hatü jempü Levi am küphüthü am nyingi daütüktuh, hatü
Hapayü am Levi ami shelei mebü-üng ne-anpü nangkü
Hanangkü ngongpathü hatü Levi ami laophü nyingi
lei shah aimü Mosai epü keiha Levi ami Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela pü shatü bhagchongei paiyei anteke.
Davidi Levi am mübüthü kü kesho lokhen nangkü jomei jeihinaüthü jehen hatü lyre, harp hatü cymbal vüngei mongong kesho lokhen e.
Hanangkü Levi ami Joelei cheha Heman; hatü büpalei jeihinaüthü Berekhiahlei chenaü Asaph; hatü jomei jeihinaüthü Merarilei hapeüthü, hatü Kushaiahlei cheha Ethan;

hatü jom mü nyipabü laphen kübü jomei jeihinaü Zekhariah, Jaaziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah, hatü shaden yompü Obed-Edom hatü Jeiel hathü jeteke.
Kesho lokbü Heman, Asaph hatü Ethan hathüyü cymbal vünghen;
Zekhariah, Aziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseiah hatü Benaiah hathüyü Alamoth aimü lyre vünghen jeteke;
hatü Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah, Obed-Edom, Jeiel hatü Azariah hathüyü Sheminith aimü harp vünghen jeteke.
Levi am shangjing Kenaniah-ü kesho nyahhai kü khei vai; hapayü büpalei dousho nyu; mehenangkü büpai hapa manei nyu.
Berekhiah hatü Elkanah nyiyü Vangpüshuwpü Pela yomhen je.

Shebaniah, Joshaphat, Nathanel, Amasai, Zekhariah, Benaiah hatü Eliezer hathü ngongpathü peü Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela touei amit vünghen je. Obed-Edom hatü Jehiah nyiyao Vangpüshuwpü Pela yomhen je.
Hanangkü David, Israel am behethü hatü haja khongkü mübüthü peü Obed-Edom amei shem leipü
Mehenangkü Kahvangi Levi am
Shaang Levi am Pela kopüthü, kesho lokpüthü, hatü kesho lokpü mübü Kenaniah am keiha Davidi meipü nyemin bhagthuh thuhtü nyu. Davidi nyemin bhagthuh longbenüngao thuhteke.
Hanangkü Israel am peüi
Jomphongi Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela Davidi vepü ashakshem mongei shüei tuh, hatü jomphongi Kahvang kü jakpü moila hatü mongjempü moila shuoh.
Davidi jakpü moila hatü mongjempü moila shuoh-ei tempheikü Davidi
Hapheikü büpai Israel am nyüha baha peü kü aan, phai shukpü hatü nyalingngupai vani lingpü aan shuoh.
Büpai
Asaph-ü peü mü shopü, nyipabü kü Zekhariah, hapheikü Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed-Edom hatü Jeiel nyu. Jomphongü lyre vünghen, Asaph-ü cymbal vünghen,
hatü Benaiah hatü Jahaziel ngongpa nyiyü Kahvangei Vangpüshuwpü Pela touei nedoh-i amit vünghen jeteke.
Hapa nyih Davidi shongei Asaph hatü büpa mü sheühteipüthü kü hapa menvih kesho
büpalei men kü nyüktuh;
Büpai mehe dük ha jatthü kü nyinghütuh.
Büpa kü lokeishuoh,
büpa kü menvih kesho lokeishuoh;
Büpalei yashanyale douthü jung etuh.
Büpalei daülangpü men müknyinshekhang;
büpalei wong kü düngei büpalei dhe yemtuh.
Büpai dükpü thamapü douthü,
büpalei yashanyale douthü,
hatü büpai shahphenpü deih-ei dangtuh,
Oh büpa chongphopü Israelei hühihathü,
Oh büpai jepü Jakobei hapeüthü.
Büpayü
Büpai shahphenpü kahdoknyü peü lemei nyüke.
Büpai vangpüshuwpü düngei deihnyüpeih,
büpai epü shahthü denshem haja haja deihnyüpeih,
Büpai Abraham mü vangeishuwpü
hatü Isak mü lahteipü deihnyüpeih.
Büpai hapayü Jakob kü shahkung hük keiha,
Israel kü nedohnetenpü vangpüshuwpü keiha lingpeih:
Am kü ngei Kanan kahdokü
ammei mükjüp vaishi shuohhen.
Mechem jom nanglak bhei-ie maani mon nyupa,
maani mon yenpa keiha nyupa,
jom jat hük kübü hük shei,
hatü ongching hük kübü hük shei longteihampeih.
Büpai üam kao jom kü shüveihen nehan;
hathülei men kü loh-ei e,
“Ngei jepüthü kü laki tehong;
ngelei thibüthü kü ten tedük.”
nyihjeih büpa yemleipü jung baongeishuoh.
Jatthü kü büpalei müknyinshekhang;
büpalei thamapü douthü jung hangku peü kü nyinghütuh.
Mehenangkü
hatü duei-ouhen shangpü;
kahvangthü peü shak kü büpa kü dhüm shuohtuh.
Mehenangkü jatthülei kahvangthü kemei lajei monha,
shejao
Müknyinshekhang hatü dhüm büpa mü nyüke;
wong hatü mongong büpa nyushingei nyüke.
Oh jatthü phanghiyang kemei
Büpalei men müknyinshekhang
shei
moila koei büpa touei peikei.
Büpa daülangshemshepü
müknyinshekhang kü
Kahdoknyü peüi büpa touei kheütuh!
kahdoknyü-ü wong kohshi chonglingei nyüke;
hapa shinei nedaipeih.
Vangshothü mongongtuh, kahdoknyü mongmeituh;
Yungching hatü halei nyupü lemphüi ngeü antuh;
Kah hatü halei nyupü lemphüli mongongtuh!
Yinghilongi mongongpai
mehenangkü büpai kahdoknyü
shahphenhen yiükünyüke.
mehenangkü büpa meipü nyüke;
büpa bampü hüdenhalenshi nyüke.
“Ham yangtuh, Oh Kahvang ham yemleipüba;
hami nüngei daülangpü men menvih,
hatü hami nüng men vih-ei
müknyinshekhanghen nangkü jatthü
toueipü ham thaiyei leitü yangshih” shei lentuh.
Nedohnetenpü kübü nedohnetenpü
thahshi
shaang hatü dohpü neshiüi men longtuh.
Hahepak kü nanglak peüi, “Amen”
hatü “
Davidi Asaph hatü büpa mü sheühteipüthü
Büpai shao Obed-Edom hatü büpa mü sheühteipü jom pejempüshet hathü mü chongphohen tuhphong. Obed-Edom Jeduthunei cheha hatü Hosah nyiyü shaden yombü nyuteke.
Davidi Zadok ngongpa hatü büpa mü jempü ngongpathü Gibeonei
Israel am kü shuohpü
Jomphong mü Heman hatü Jeduthun hatü
Heman hatü Jeduthun nyiyü daülangpü kesho lokpü amit, cymbal hatü lebü kesho lokpü hadirthü vünghen jeyei tuh. Jeduthunei hapeüthü shaden yomhen je.
Hapheikü nanglakthü peü laophülei shem yemei leidaikem, hatü Davidao büpalei shem am kü moihimanhen shemei lei.
Davidi büpalei ongshemei uopheikü büpai Nathan thibü kü, “
Nathani David kü, “Nüngei mongei mehe deihshi nyu, ha düktuh; mehenangkü Kahvang nüng mü nyüke” shei jangei e.
Ha ya
Ngelei chongphobü David kü hapakei heih-ei etuh, “
Ngei Israel am Ijip leipü müei leipü nyih kübü shinnyih thahshi ngei shem hükeiyao nenyuangpih. Ngei ashakshem kü nyupeih, hatü shing hük kübü hük shei kamteiyei nyupeih.
Ngei melei shangkü Israel am mü kamteiyei nyujao ngelei nanglakthü yomhen jepü mübü üpa kü dangkao, ‘Mehekei nüngi ngei kü cedar püi ngei shing shem nevepa?’ shei chemao ephüla?”
Nüng melei dai halei ngei nüng mü nyupeih, hatü nüng toueipü nüngei vepathü neütükpeih. Shaang ngei nüngei menü kahdoknyü kü peü mü longpüthülei men kei leihühen hih,

hatü ngei ngelei nanglak Israel am shingvaishi shing hük shuohhen; shejüang jomi jom lompü bükhishem anghen hatü üamiyao nebaoknehenghen. Nemeipü shennyakthüi sheleipü kei hajük kü jom kü neshüveihen,
hatü ngei Israel nanglak shangkü mübüthü jehinüng henüng keipü nevamhen. Ngei ammei vepathü peü neütükhen. Anyei vaishi
Mechem nüng diyei ambü ampa mü mahng vühenshang, nüngei uoshing jeihen shingvaishi ngei nüngei li, hapeüthü khong kübü hük vamhühen hatü ngei büpalei ongching chonglinghühen.
Büpai-üng ngei shing shem vehen, hatü ngei büpalei ong uoshing linghen.
Ngei büpalei pa vaihen hatü büpayü ngelei hapeü vaihen. Ngei ammei bühipathü toueipü ngei bampü yahlangpükei ngei büpa toueipü ngei bampü neyahlanghen.
Ngei büpayü ngelei shem hatü ngelei ongching kü den kü tuhhen; büpalei ong uoshing den kü nyuhen.
Hapa shakei vamei epü shahthü peü Nathani David kü ejateke.

shejüang ha linghen hatü nüngei men düngei longpü vaihen. Shejüang shennyakthüi, “Jeiyong

Hepak shohük pheikü David ongpai shao Philistia am mü hok hatü neüteke. Büpai Philistia amei lakmongei nyupü Gath hatü ha kü shonpü chingthüao omei yah.
Davidi Moab am kao neü hatü jomi büpa kü bom üh-ei büpa phangkü nyu.
Anyei vaishi mechem Davidi Euphrates Yungyen yangkemei büpalei lakmongei chonglingei tuhhen shei daipa, büpai Zobah ong Hadadezer mü hatü Hamath thahshi hokteke.
Davidi koyei khari haja hük, koyei khari müpüthü haja nyet, hatü veshanthü haja kukha thahshi yepei lei. Büpai koyei khari kho hük mon tuhtü aopü kemei lakhila bhagtükkem.
Mechem Damaska leipü Aram am Zobah ongpai Hadadezer kü sheühhen peipa, Davidi jom haja hapünyi thahshi jütük.
Büpai Damaska leipü Aram ongching kemei kü veshanthü shomei tuh, hatü Aram am büpa phangkü bom ühshi nyu.
Davidi Hadadezerlei lakchongbüthüi koei peipü hon inyüshung peü yah-ei Jerusalemei leiyei tuh.
Hadadezeri vanglem lemei nyupü Tibhath hatü Kun chingnyü nyi leipü Davidi melangnyiam longi lei, hatü ha yah-ei Solomoni melangnyiam shung, shemnyü hatü lebü douthü longi ling.
Mechem Davidi Zobah am Hadadezer ongpa neütüktekeja shei Hamath am Tou ongpai danpa,
büpai cheha Hadoram David ongpa touei shomei büpa kü mongmeipü selam eshuoh; mehenangkü büpai Hadadezer am mü hokei nyu. Hadorami hon, ngin hatü melangnyiami lingpü dou lemphü koei peiteke.
David ongpai Edom, Moab, Ammon, Philistia hatü Amalek am jatthü leipü yahpü hon hatü ngin kü dükpü keiha büpai hathü dou peü
Zeruiahlei cheha Abishai-i Hüm Kahjilei Edom am jom haja anpüshet thahshi jü.
Büpai Edomei veshanthü shomei tuh hatü Edom ami David phangkü bom üh-ei nyu. David daipü lem peü kü
Davidi Israel am peü shak kü nanglak peü shingvaishi mehe shahhing hatü jiüpü nyupa, ha dükei vanglem lem.
Zeruiahlei cheha Joabü veshanthü mübü nyu, Ahihudei cheha Jehoshaphatü nyangbü nyu;
Ahitubei cheha Zadok hatü Abiatharlei cheha Ahimelekh nyiyü ngongpa vaiteke; Shavshayü laknyangbü nyuteke;
Jehoiadalei cheha Benaiahyü Kereth hatü Peleth am shak kü mübü nyu, hatü Davidei chehathü peü ongpa touei chongphopü longpü lakchongbüthü nyuteke.
Hepak shohük pheikü Ammon amei ongpa Nahash didaitü büpa kü jeiyei cheha ong vaiteke.
“Ngei Nahashlei cheha Hanun kü bampü huhen; mehenangkü chepai ngei kü bampü hupeih” shei Davidi deih. Hanangkü Davidi shahjang kobü hanei chepa nangkü Hanun kü bampü jung ehen shom.
Mechem Davidei shennyakthü heih-ei Ammon kahdok ngoiyei Hanun kü bampü jung ehen peijapa,

Ammon am longhiongthüi Hanun kü, “Davidi nüng kü bamnyeih shei shennyakthü shomei epai ampa kü dhüm shuohnyeih shei nüngi deihnyu je? Büpalei shennyakthü peipeyü kahdok dokei gühshoukei temtü baoh-ei haitükhen peipeih shei nedeihnyu je?” shei eteke.
Hanangkü Hanuni Davidei shennyakthü yepei sho kuptük, shüngbaong kü jiüei ashak kemei shaaktüktü leishihteke.

Mechem hanei ami David kü hathü nang ejapa, büpai hathü mü pongnüng phongmokbüthü shom; mehenangkü jomphong kü longi veühen mü ne-ienelemi dükteke. Ongpai hathü kü, “Jumum manglu thahshi amphong Jerikolei chongkei; hapheikü mon nyokei leikei” shei e.

Mechem Ammon ami sheyü David mü ve leiteke shei nyingpa, Hanun hatü Ammon ami Dokpa Mesopotamia, Aram-Maakah hatü Zobahlei koyei khari hatü hapa mühen shennyakthü phuoei yahhen shingvaishi ngin dok haja hapüanpüali shom.
Jomi koyei khari hatü hapa mühen shennyakthü haja hapüanpünyi mü Maakah ong mü büpalei veshanthü peiyei Medeba yopailei baümtap ve, hatü Ammon amao ching kübü laoei hokhen vam.
Ha danei Davidi Joabi mütü hokhen veshanthü peü shom.
Ammon amao vamei jomei chingnyü penyüsha touei hokhen show lingei uo, hatü peipü ongthü peü koshoyalei vamei nyu.
Ngaümphei shelang kemeilei vepathü show lingdaipü Joabi eeteke. Hanangkü büpai Israel kü peü mü meipü veshan hanei jetü Aram am khüei hokhen show lingei tuhphong.
Aopüthü kemei chenaü Abishai phang kü tuh, hatü jomphongü Ammon am khüei hokhen show ling.
Joabi hathü kü, “Ngei neaokhen mü Aram am wong kohshi chongküjema, am peiyei ngei kü sheühtuh; amphongi neaokhen mü Ammon am longi wong kohshi chongküjema ngei peiyei sheühphahen.
Amphong wong kohtuh hatü jenei nanglak hatü jenei Kahvang chingnyüthü med kü monglongshi hokshah.
Hanangkü Joab hatü büpa mü nyupü veshanthü Aram am mü hokhen heih, hatü hathü büpa toueipü nyaidai.
Mechem Ammon ami Aram am nyaidaikemi eepa, jomphongao chenaü Abishai toueipü nyaiyei chingnyü mongei shüdai. Hanangkü Joab Jerusalemei nyokei leidai.
Mechem Aram ami Israel ami neülangteke shei nyingpa, jomi Euphrates Yungdangei phongmokbüthü shomei veshanthü müei leiyei Zobah am Hadadezerlei veshan mübü Shophakh phangkü tuhphong.
Mechem Davidi hapa jung danpa, büpai Israel am veshanthü thaitü Jordan homei heih-ei jom mü khangteiyei show ling. Mechem Davidi show lingei tempa, büpai jom khüei hok.
Shejao Israel am toueipü jom nyai; hatü Davidi koyei khari müpüthü jom haja nyet hatü veshanthü haja pinyi thahshi jü. Büpai veshan mübü Shophakh-ao jütük.
Mechem Hadadezerlei ong naü-eethüi jom kü Israel ami neüteke shei nyingpa, jomi David mü chingmei ling, hatü büpa phangkü nyu. Hajük kü Aram ami Ammon am kü sheühhen nemong.

Hapa bong ongpai vehokei daiteipü sheileilila hepak kü Joabi veshanthü müei dai. Büpai Ammon kahdok hah, hatü Rabbahlei heih-ei hapa chingao shümei hah. David ongpayü Jerusalemei nyu. Joabi Rabbah hahtü lavüngtoiyei tuhphong.

Davidi Ammon amei Molekh kahvang Milkom lajei shangjingei hon athen hük dokshuohjü hon dok hapüanpüali nyu. Halei douvang yaongthü nyu. Büpai hathü yah-ei büpalei athen kü shih. Büpai hapa ching leipü mophimo longi yah-ei lei.
Büpai halei nyupü shennyakthü müei an hatü pü vetei, nyiamdou dükhüei hatü ay noshi dou dükhüei ang, Davidi hapakei Ammon jilathü peü kü dük. Hapheikü David hatü veshanthü peü Jerusalemei nyokei lei.
Hepak shohük pheikü Gezerlei Philistia am mü vehok vam. Hahepak kü Hushath am Sibbekai-i Rapha am Sippai jü, hatü Philistia am neütük.
Philistia am mü lebü vehok kü Jairlei cheha Elhanani Gath am Goliathlei chenaü Lahmi jü; büpalei lakei phung hük miyaung kei nyuteke.

Shao lebü vehok hük Gathlei vam. Halei longi longpü shennyak hük lak nyiphen kü lakjaang vok baong, la nyiphen kü lajaang vok baong kohtü lakjaang lajaang peüshep hapüali nyu. Büpayao Rapha am lihila nyu.
Mechem büpai Israel am kü deyeinaamei eshuohpa, Shimealei cheha Jonathan, Davidei chenaüi büpa jü.
Jom jemphen Gath leipü Rapha amei hühihathü nyu, hatü jom peü David hatü büpalei veshanthülei lak kü mah.
Israel am khüei Kahshih yaong, hatü Israel amei shangkuk iehen Davidei mong kü peihü.
Hanangkü Davidi Joab hatü veshan mübüthü kü, “Daituh hatü Beer-sheba kübü Dan thahshi Israel am ietuh. Hapheikü mon meshük nyüpa ngei nyinghen shingvaishi shah-om koei leikei” shei e.
Shejao Joabi jangei, “
Shejao Joabi epü kü ongpalei shah-i neü; hanangkü Joabi Israel kemeilei daitü Jerusalemei nyokei lei.
Joabi Israel kü veshan vaiaokhen shennyak 1, 100, 000 hatü Judah kü 470, 000 nyüke shei shah-om shuoh.
Shejao Joabi Levi hatü Benjamin am bhei-ie kü neom; mehenangkü ongpalei ngeükhüam Joabi nelümi deih.
Hapa ngeükhüam Kahvang touei mang nyuteke; hanangkü büpai Israel am kü hanghi shuoh.
Hapheikü Davidi Kahvang kü, “Ngei hapa dou dükpai longi mang thahteke. Shaang ngei nüng kü khümei enyeih, nüngei chongphobüi pungpü mang yahlangshih. Ngei ahshi-üng ngadou dükteke” shei e.

Davidi Kahvang kü, “Veshanthü shangkuk iehen ngeükhüamü ngei shuohpeih. Mang thahpü hatü nejiüpü dou dükpeyü ngei hih. Shejao hapa mithüi mehe pungpü dükpa? Oh
Hahepak kü vangsho phongshani Gad kü aongtuh hatü David kü Jebus am Araunahlei hahten shingei

Mechem Araunah-i hah tenei nyupa, büpa yaakei veishuohjü vangsho phongshan ee; büpa mü nyupü hapeüthü peü jodaikem.
Hapheikü David hatou ngoi; Araunah-i veishuohjü büpa eeyei hahten shing leipü heih-ei büpalei dhe kahdok kü shüshi aümei sha.
Davidi büpa kü, “Nanglakthü kü cham ngoipü dohhen shingvaishi ngei

Araunah-i David kü, “Yahhahtuh! Ngelei shembü ongpai mehe lümpüshang ha dükhahtuh. Veituh, ngei hah tenteipü mohohbaong nyi jakpü moila vaihen yahphahen hih, hatü hahlüng kemei pü vaihen, hatü haleipü wheat hahying moila vaishi yahphahen hih. Hathü peü yahphahen hih” shei e.
Shejao David ongpai Araunah kü, “Hei nevai, lop kü yahshih shei e. Ngei nüngei dou yah-ei
Hanangkü Davidi hapa hah tenshing nangkü Araunah kü hon kho vok shuoh.
